54b7(mdo sde): srog gi rim gro byas pas sku che zhing drang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / na ba rnams kyi rtsi sman dang rim gri dang nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pas/ ro bro ba'i mchog thob pa'i mtshan
54b8(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yun ring po nas tshig kyal pa spangs shing / dus su smra bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam
55a1(mdo sde): par snyoms pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtsod pa rnams bsdum pa la dga' bas tshems thags bzang ba'i mtshan dang
55a2(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rin po che'i sbyin pa byas pas tshems mnyam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / lus dang ngag yid yongs su dag pas tshems shin tu dkar ba'i mtshan dang ldan
55a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / ngag gi nyes pa bsdams pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams la rtag tu tshig 'jam po smra bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs
55a4(mdo sde): kyi mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / byams pa'i sems pa sgoms te/ rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis blta bas spyan dkar nag 'byed pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 
55a5(mdo sde): sems thag pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsgrubs pas/ ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang // gzhan la bsod nams dang yon tan yod pa rjes su yid
55a6(mdo sde): rang zhing bsngags pas zhal mdzo sbas brgyan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / pha ma dang mkhan po dang slob dpon la sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul bzhin du/ rim gro dang / btsun par
55a7(mdo sde): byas pas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po'i chos bstan pa la mos pas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bstan dang
55a8(mdo sde): gos dang khang bzang gnas bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi gtam sna tshogs te smra ba spangs pas ba spu re re nas/ g.yas phyogasu
55b1(mdo sde): 'khyil pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mkhan po dang bla ma rnams kyi bstan pa'i tshig yang dag par blangs pa dang bzung ba mngon tu spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas// 
55b2(mdo sde): yan lag gi spu gyen tu 'khyil pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yon tan dpag tu med par bsgrubs pas zhabs legs par thob pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams ting 'dzin
55b3(mdo sde): bsgom par bskul bas shing n+ya grong ltar chu zheng gab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar dpag tu med pa'i yon tan bsgrubs na/ 
55b4(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis de lta bu dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// zhes de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
55b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag bdag gis brtags na gang / yang dngos po dang mtshan mar ma grub ste/ ma mchis/ la de bzhin gshegs pa la brtags na yang de bzhin gabye
55b6(mdo sde): pa'i spyod lam de ma lags na/ ci'i slad du spyod lam rgya cher bsgrub ces gsungs/ dkon mchog gsum dang bden pa bzhi dang phung po dang / skye mched dang rten 'brel bcu gnyis dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i
55b7(mdo sde): chos rnams la bdag gis brtags na yang phyi nang gi rgyu 'bras kun stong pa nyid de/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ smon pa ma mchis/ skye zhing 'byung ba yang ma mthong / 'gag cing nub pa yang ma mthong / sgyu ma dang
55b8(mdo sde): 'dra ba sprul pa dang 'dra ba/ 'bar ba dang 'dra ba/ brag ca dang 'dra ba/ chab kyi zla ba dang 'dra ba/ ru sbal gyi spu dang 'dra ba ri bong gi rwa dang 'dra ba/ na mkha'i me tog dang 'dra ba mo sham gyi bu dang 'dra ba/ gzugs
56a1(mdo sde): brnyan gyi gos gyor zhing / sgyu ma'i glang po chel 'tshal ba dang 'dra ba/ mchis pa yang 'dra ma mchis pa yang 'dra ba/ de dag ni mchis pa dang ma mchis pa/ mchis pa yang ma lags/ 
56a2(mdo sde): ma mchis pa yang ma lags// rtag pa ma lags/ chad pa mi lags/ skye ba ma lags/ 'gag pa ma lags/ nang du ma lags/ slad rol ma lags/ mthong ba ma lags/ shes pa ma lags/ dper na
56a3(mdo sde): namakha' dang 'dra ba la/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ngas ni spyod pa de dag spyad ces gsungs de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis brtags na/ bdag ma lags/ sems ma lags/ srog ma
56a4(mdo sde): lags gso ba ma lags/ skyes bu ma lags/ gang zagadam lags/ shed can ma lags/ shed bdag ma lags / byed pa po la sogs pa ma lags/ mig ma lags// gzug
56a5(mdo sde): ma lags mig dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ rna ba ma lags// sgyu ma lags/ rna ba dang sman/ mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ sna ma lags/ dri ma
56a6(mdo sde): lags sna dang dri'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma legs/ lce ma lags/ ro ma lags/ lce dang ro'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma logs/ lus ma lags/ rag bya ma lags/ lus dang reg pa'i
56a7(mdo sde): mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags// yid ma lags/ chos ma lags/ yid dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/ rnam par shes pa ma lags// gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi nga/ 
56a8(mdo sde): yul 'ang ma lags/ gzugs ma lags/ sdug bsngal ma lags/ gzugs dang sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/ bdag ma lags/ bdag gi ma lags/ dz+ra
56b1(mdo sde): ba ma lags/ gzugs can ma lags/ phung po ma lags/ bden pa ma lags/ brdzun pa ma lags/ bsdus pa ma lags/ gtor ba ma lags/ 'byung ba ma lags/ 'jug pa ma lags te/ tshor ba
56b2(mdo sde): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin te/ par bzhud pa ma lags/ tshur byon pa ma lags/ bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang mi mnga'/ sems dang yid dang rnam
56b3(mdo sde): par shes pa yang mi mnga'/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyang mi mnga'/ gcig pa'ang ma lags/ tha dad pa'ang ma lags/ 'das pa'ang ma lags/ ma byon pa ma lags/ da ltar byung ba ma
56b4(mdo sde): lags/ dri ma can ma lags/ yongs su dag pa ma lags/ bdag ma lags/ sems can ma lags/ srog dang skyes bu dang gang zag la sogs pa yang ma lags/ rtag pa
56b5(mdo sde): ma lags/ chad pa ma lags/ skye ba ma mchis/ 'gag pa ma mchis/ bsgom du ma mchis/ spyod du ma mchis/ dor du ma mchis/ blang du ma mchis/ mtha' las 'das pa
56b6(mdo sde): yun du zhugs pa la/ gang gi slad du spyod lam rgya cher bsgrubs shes gsungs zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i
56b7(mdo sde): snying po la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod sngon 'das pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
56b8(mdo sde): bskrun pa dang / yun ring po nas theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i don chub par shes te/ chos so cog kun kyang stong pa nyid du mngon par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i
57a1(mdo sde): mtha' las 'das te/ yun du gnas pa ra yang shes pas/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i nor bu shin tu dang ba gsal ba 'dam rdzab kyi nang du lo
57a2(mdo sde): stong gi bar du bzhag kyang / rang bzhin yong gis dag pas phyir phyung na yang snga mkho bzhin te/ khyod kyang de dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid mngon par rtogs la rang bzhin rnam par dag pas khyed
57a3(mdo sde): rnams da ltar khams gsum na/ snyigs ma can rnam lnga'i 'dam rdzab du gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang sems can gyi don byas kyi kyang 'dam rdzab kyis ma gos pas na/ don 'di lta bu dag
57a4(mdo sde): 'dri nus pa yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod yang nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ chos so cog thams cad yang dag par na/ dngos po med de yi ge yod pa'i phyir chos bshad/ chos kyi nang du yig
57a5(mdo sde): med la yi ge'i nang du yang chos med do// kun tu spel ba'i phyir/ yi ger bstan to// yi ge'i nang du ni byang chub kyang med// byang chub kyi nang du ni yi ge yang med mod kyi// don dam par
57a6(mdo sde): ni yi ge med kyang kun rdzob du yi ge yod par bshad pas/ sems can la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang yi ge las gud na mi snyed do// rigs kyi bu khyod zer ba'ang bden te/ 
57a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la zad pa med/ skye ba med mi sgom mi spyod/ sgom spyod rnams dang bral ba/ yang dag pa'i chos la mi 'jug/ de las ldog cing 'gyur ba yang ma yin/ skye ba gcig gis dga'
57a8(mdo sde): ldan gyi gnas su yang ma skyes/ de las babs te yum gyi lhum su yang ma gnas/ chos thams cad la sems mi gnas pas/ nga ni skye rga na 'chi las 'das so zhes kyang ma byas/ phyogs bzhir
57b1(mdo sde): gom pa bdun bdun yang ma bor/ nga ni 'jig rten na bla na med pa btsun pa yin no zhes kyang ma brjod/ grong khyer mchog tu na cung bzang mo dang yang ma brtsen/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba yig rtsis la sogs pa yang / 
57b2(mdo sde): ma bslabs/ stobs dang 'bong rtsal yang ma bskrun to// sems can yongasu mya ngan bzla ba'i phyir/ rgan po mngon sum du bstan pa ni lus la chags pa rnams bkag pa'o// nad pa mngon sum du bstan
57b3(mdo sde): pa ni tshe la chags pa rnams bkag pa'o// shi ba'i mtshan ma mngon sum du bstan pa ni/ 'dod chags dang nga dang ngar 'dzin pa rnams bkag pa'o// dge slong mngon sum du bstan pa ni/ sems
57b4(mdo sde): can rnams tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyi lus su mi smon par 'jig rten las 'das pa/ bla na med pa'i chos la brtson da par bsgrub par bya ba'o// grong khyer mchog nas phyung ste/ 
57b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni khams gsum gyi btson ra las thar pa dang / 'bras bu ma yin pa rnams bstan pa'o// slar gzigs pa ni byams sdang mi mnga' bar bstan pa'o// de'i phyir mtshan
57b6(mdo sde): phun sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku rnam par brgyan cing / sems can gyi bsod nams kyi zhing du bya ba'o// dbu skra bregs pa dang rgyan rnams spangs pa dang / rta tsan ta ka zha 'bring dad pa can la slar
57b7(mdo sde): bskur ba ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar bstan pa'o// kha spa bregs pa ni chos thams cad la mi chags par bstan pa'o// ka shi ngur spyir gyon pa ni sems can gdul bar bstan
57b8(mdo sde): pa'o// drang srong u ta ka dang a ran da la chos 'dri rtog bya ba ni rang gi nga rgyal gyi sems 'joms par bstan pa'o// lo drug gi bar du bka' thub spyad pa ni mu stegs 'dul ba'o// zhal
58a1(mdo sde): zas blangs pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o// DA swa sti ka blangs pa ni cho ga shes par bstan pa'o// rtswa bting ba'i steng du bzhugs pa ni nyam rangs dang / 
58a2(mdo sde): g.yel ba rnams 'joms par bstan pa'o// lha klu kun gyis bstod cing bsngags pa dang bsnyen bkur bya ba ni yon tan gyi 'bras bu la bkod par bstan pa'o// bdud rnams btul ba ni dpa' ba'i
58a3(mdo sde): mthu bstan pa'o// phyag g.yas pa sa la bstan pa ni bsod nams kyi mthu bstan pa'o// sa chen po kun tu g.yo ba ni drin gyi lan ldon par bstan pa'o// de ltar mtshan ma med par sgoms pa'i
58a4(mdo sde): phyir bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob pa yin no// 'di da ltar chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid mngon tu mkhyen nas/ chos kun mnyam pa nyid du bstan pas ni sangs rgyas zhes
58a5(mdo sde): bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la thub med de// chos bstan to cog la sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i don bstan pas na// de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// dus gsum gyi bya ba
58a6(mdo sde): dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos mngon tu gsal bar gzigs shing mkhyen pas na/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o// bden pa dang yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir// lha dang mi'i mkhan po zhes
58a7(mdo sde): bya'o// gang zhig de ltar slob cing rtogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de la log par rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bslu ba can zhes
58a8(mdo sde): bya'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad ni mi 'byung mi 'jug mi skye mi 'gog ste/ sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas mya
58b1(mdo sde): ngan las 'da'o// zhes brjod pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang yang dag par na/ chos thams cad
58b2(mdo sde): kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ stong pa nyid du rtogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'byung ba 'am/ nub pa yang mi mnga' bas/ rgyal po'i pho brang du yang ma bltam/ byang chub kyi shing drung du yang mya ngan las ma 'das
58b3(mdo sde): mtha' las 'das te// yun tu gnas pa sems can yongs su bsgral bar mdzad pa'i slad du/ bka' thub spyad cing mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan kyang / yang dag par na 'gyur ba 'am/ spros pa
58b4(mdo sde): mi mnga' de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul yun tu gnas te/ khams gsum na sku 'byung ba yang chos kyi sku rnam pa de lnga 'byung ngo // lnga po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sku yang dag pa'i
58b5(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid dang / sku yon tan can dang sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid la sa skyes pa dang / sku sprul cing 'byung ba dang / sku na mkha' lta bu lnga ste/ de la sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi ba
58b6(mdo sde): ni yang dag pa'i 'bras bu'i mchog/ mtshan ma thams cad las 'das pa/ rang gi dbyings la yun tu gnas pa na/ sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi'o// sku yon tan zhes bgyi ba ni sems can
58b7(mdo sde): mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du/ spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing / dge ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par mdzad pas nas/ sku yon tan can zhes bgyi'o// sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes shes/ 
58b8(mdo sde): bgyi ba ni/ chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad thugs su chud de/ mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'/ spyod yul de la yang dag par mkhyen pa'i steng pa nyid las skyes te/ yang dag par rdzogs pas na/ sku chos
59a1(mdo sde): kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes shes bgyi'o// sku sprul cing 'byung ba zhes bgyi ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung yang / lam rgyud lngar dge sdig kun la mngon par
59a2(mdo sde): bstan cing / skyabs su mdzad pa ma mchis te/ sprul pa'i rdzas las mtshan du 'gyur bas na/ sku sprul cing 'byung ba zhes bgyi'o// sku na mkha' lta bu zhes bgyi ba ni nam mkha' mtha' yas pas na/ chos
59a3(mdo sde): kyi sku yang mtha' yas so// nam mkha' la dpag pa dang gzhal du ma mchis pas na/ chos kyi sku yang dpag cing gzhal du ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang na mkha' chen po dang 'dra ba/ 
59a4(mdo sde): sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du/ sku rnam pa lngar ston pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skye ba mi mnga'/ 'gag dpa mi mnga' bar mngon no// chos thams cad kyang de bzhin
59a5(mdo sde): te/ sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas mngon tu sprul cing / chos rnam par spel ba lags so zhe/ sa gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
59a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pas/ spyod yul thams cad la rab
59a7(mdo sde): tu chod pa 'am/ thogs pa med de rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa stong rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten longs spyod can zhes bya ba der/ byang chub sems dpa'
59a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sha dag thag pa chen po 'ba' shig spyod de/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming rna ba'i thog mar yang mi grag na/ ngan song lta zhig ci smos/ khyod bskal pa de
59b1(mdo sde): dang 'jig rten der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'jig rten gzhan nas skyes bu chen po dag kyang der phyin
59b2(mdo sde): cing / theg pa chen po thar pa phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde mnyan pa dang / blangs pa dang bcangs par 'gyur ro// de bas na sems can gang la las/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po'i
59b3(mdo sde): ming thos te/ phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byas na/ 'jig rten longs spyod can gyi khams der yang skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang la las theg pa chen po'i chos sgrub na yang / mi skye ba'i
59b4(mdo sde): chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad blang zhing bcangs pa des ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba bcu ma 'das par lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe
59b5(mdo sde): de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la byang chub/ sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis/ bdag dang sems can/ thams cad kyi don phyir zhus nas/ bcom ldan 'das
59b6(mdo sde): kyis phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun rnams kyi mtshan bstan nas yang
59b7(mdo sde): seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs te/ seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i tshig bstan pa'o// nges pa'i tshig bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag par 'tsho skyong zhing gzhes te/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar
59b8(mdo sde): rig pa'o// yang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do zhes bstan pa dang / lha'i bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa spa gong ste/ skyabs kyi dbang du gyur pas na seng ge'i sgra
60a1(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// de ltar bstan nas ljags kyi mtshan rgya chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i khams kun khebs par g.yogs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa
60a2(mdo sde): drug du g.yos so// rnam pa drug du g.yos shes bya ba ni shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma' nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho
60a3(mdo sde): phyogs dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma' ba ni sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos shes bya'o// ljags kyi drung nas 'od gzer chen po btang ste/ phyogs bcur snang ba chen po
60a4(mdo sde): byas so// snang ba chen po des mi rtag pa ni rtag par byas/ ma dag pa ni dag par byas sdug bsngal can ni bde bar byas/ mi rig pa ni rig par byas/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis
60a5(mdo sde): reg cing snang ngo cog la ri dang nags tshal dang yul sa dang chu bo'i/ klung dang / rgya mtsho dang lcags kyi ri khor yug dang / dmyal ba la sogs pa thams cad kyang mtho dman med
60a6(mdo sde): par mnyam par gyur cing / nyal nyil dang ldan ljin med de kun kyang yongs su dag par gyur nas 'di lta ste/ dper na shar phyogs na 'jig rten zla gang rnam dag yongs su brgyan dang 'dra'o// / 
60a7(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku sprul pa ni/ nam mkha' nas bab pa ni me tog gi char bab pa dang 'dra'o// 'og nas byung ba ni sprin dang na bun byung ba dang 'dra bar na mkha'
60a8(mdo sde): yongs su gang ste/ na mkha' stong pa cung zad kyang med do// sprul pa'i zhal so so nas tshig 'thun par de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag par 'tsho zhing gzhes te/ mya ngan 'das mi 'da'o// sems
60b1(mdo sde): can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do zhes gsungs// yang chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid do zhes gsungs so// spyod lam de dag gi rgyu 'bras ni theg pa gcig tu zad pa las sems can
60b2(mdo sde): gyis theg pa rnam pa gsum du mthong zhes bshad nas/ de ma thag tu kun mi snang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan la bzhugs pa nyi tse snang ste/ de'i tshe tshogs mang po thams cad sku sprul pa de
60b3(mdo sde): dag mthong ba ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu ste/ shAkya thub pa yab byams pas/ 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang gzi brjid mngon par sprul pa de'i tshe/ tshogs kyi nang nas
60b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi des ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// nyan thos da brgyad khri zhig ni theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do// 
60b5(mdo sde): dge slong stong phrag bcu zhig gis ni/ dgra bcom pa'i lam thob bo// dge slong ma khri brgyad stong zhig gis ni phyirami 'ong ba'i lam thob bo// dge bsnyen khri phrag bzhi bcus
60b6(mdo sde): ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i lam thob bo// dge bsnyen ma 'bum phrag bcus ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i lam thob bo// lha dang mi grangs med pa zhig ni chos kyi mig rdul med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba rnam par
60b7(mdo sde): dag pa thob ste/ rang gi tshe lnga phyi shes pa dang 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad mi rtag par mthong ngo // de nas tshogs kyi nang nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i sgra stan
60b8(mdo sde): las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bo gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis
61a1(mdo sde): gong du bstan pa bzhin na ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos na yang sdig 'byung / chos kyi mtshan thon sang sdig 'byung / dge 'dun gyi mtshan thos na yang sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung
61a2(mdo sde): na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/ chos kyi mthu lags sam/ dge 'dun gyi mthu lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags na ni sangs rgyas la gsol ba bgyi/ chos kyi mthu lags na ni chos la gsol
61a3(mdo sde): ba bgyir dge 'dun gyi mthu lags na ni dge 'dun la gsol ba bgyi ba lags na/ gsum car la gsol ba bgyi ci 'tshal/ gong du gsungs pa theg pa gcig la so so'i skye bos rnam pa gsum du mthong
61a4(mdo sde): ngo zhes 'byung na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang gsum du bsha dang na sems can lta zhig ci smos/ zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
61a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po seng ge'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// leg so legs so// rigs kyi bu sems can la phan pa/ dang bde ba'i phyir/ don de lta bu 'dri ba yang shin tu legs
61a6(mdo sde): te/ nyon cig ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bshad do// sangs rgyas kyi mthu 'ba' shig kyang ma yin/ chos kyi mthu 'ba' shig kyang ma yin/ dge 'dun gyi mthu 'ba' shig kyang ma yin te/ 
61a7(mdo sde): kun tshogs pa'i mthu bas sangs rgyas ni sems can gyi mgon skyabs kyi pha ma byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no// sems can bslad pa can sems stor pa slar
61a8(mdo sde): rnyed de 'khor ba la skyo nas/ dran pa'i mthu mang pos khams gsum na nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar 'dod na/ phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dis bsgral ba'i gru chen po byed do// 
61b1(mdo sde): de bas na rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyang chos so// chos kyang dge 'dun no// dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas pa ni stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi stong pa nyid dang / nang gi stong pa nyid dang / phyi'i stong pa nyid
61b2(mdo sde): dang / chen po'i stong pa nyid dang / chu ngu'i stong pa nyid du 'dra ste/ de las gzhan med do// rigs kyi bu khyod zer ba lta na/ rnam pa gcig tu bsgrub pa'i rigs kyi bus rnam pa gsum du bsgrub ci dgos
61b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mi gcig cig na mkha' stong pas skrag ste/ gar phyin dgur gab kyang na mkha' dang yong ma bral lo// rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs
61b4(mdo sde): bas bshad pa dang / ngas bshad do cog dge ba thams cad kyi rgyu dang rkyen dang / dkon mchog gsum dang / theg pa gsum yang gcig las mi 'da'o// byang chub
61b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' seng ge sgras gsol pa/ legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pas bstan pa ltar/ ni bdag snga nas 'tshal te/ sems can rnams kyi slad du
61b6(mdo sde): don de zhu ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du mi gnyis mi gsum mo// thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni
61b7(mdo sde): yum/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shul chen po/ rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mig ste/ lta ba log pa rnams sdud pa dang / sems bstor ba rnams skyong pa dang / ngan song gsum gyi sgo
61b8(mdo sde): gcod pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sgo 'byed pa dang / nyan thos rnams bzlog ste/ theg pa chen por 'dzud pa'i slad du/ bdag gis gzungs chen po'i sngags kyis bsrung zhing
62a1(mdo sde): bskyab par bgyi'o// sdom pa ma nyams pa dang / mdo sde 'di la sgom zhing bslab par bgyid pa de la yang srung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o// gal te gang zag la las mdo sde
62a2(mdo sde): 'di la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing / dgung bdun gyi bar du spyad pa spyod pa la/ bdud sdig can gyis 'khrug cing 'tshe ba'i glags lta ba mchis na/ bdud sdig can gyis glags kyi skabs mi rnyed par
62a3(mdo sde): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag mdo sde 'di la rim gro bgyis te/ yun ring por gnas par bgyi ba yang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
62a4(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod mdo sde 'di la rim gro bya ba ni/ dkon mchog gsum la rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o// ston pa la yang rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o// de nas
62a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' seng ge sgras/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gzungs 'di skad ces so// na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+ha ra mA ya/ na maHsang g+hu ya/ a dan d+hi d+ha ra ni/ 
62a6(mdo sde): tad+ya thA ha A kA sha ni ba bI/ sarba d+ha ra ma ni ba bI/ a sha ma d+ha/ pi pa sha na/ bi ma la su pa ri dar ma ni kha na/ ba ru ni tsa ya ta ma le tsa le/ hu lu hu lu/ shi bi de man tra man tra/ swA hA/ 
62a7(mdo sde): sngags 'di dus gcig la lan rtsa brgyad bzlas shing / mchod rten la lan bdun bskor ba bgyi/ de ltar gdugs bdun gyi bar du mdo sde gzhan la mi bsam par/ gdugs gcig kyang dus
62a8(mdo sde): gsum du phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di la sems rtse gcig tu bgyis te/ sems gzhan du mi g.yeng bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzung sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas khri phrag brgyad
62b1(mdo sde): brgyas gsungs pa ste/ deng 'dir bdag gis kyang brjod pa lag so// gal te 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di la spod pa mchis na/ sangs rgyas de dag la smod par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di la spong ba ni tshe
62b2(mdo sde): rabs du ma'i bar du byang chub tu bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ srid pa gsum las kyang mi 'da'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sngags 'di ni sems dran pa nyams pa rnams sems slar rnyed par
62b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / gzungs 'di lan cig tsam rna bar thos sam/ thos nas yi ger bris te/ sha dang chang mi 'tshal bar sdom pa la gnas shing / bdag nyid rtse 'jo la sogs pa spangs te/ 'du 'dzi'i
62b4(mdo sde): nang du mi 'jug la/ rgyun tu byams pa chen po spyod cing bsam gtan la gcer bar 'dzin na/ gang zag de dpag tu dam mchis pa'i sgrib pa gsum gyi sdig lci ba rnams
62b5(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu sems/ thag pa nas/ blang ba dang bcang ba dang nyin re zhingaklog pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / yi dam du mi
62b6(mdo sde): bskyed par bgyid na/ gang zag de mngon par byang ma chub kyi bar du ngan song gsum du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i
62b7(mdo sde): sgra la bka' stsal pa/ legs so lags so// rigs kyi bu khyod dkon mchog gsum gyi rim gro bya ba dang / byams pa'i sems kyis sems can rnams srid pa gsum las gdon pa dang
62b8(mdo sde): bslab pa mang po grangs med pa la phan pa dang / bde ba chen po bya ba'i phyir/ ston pa'i sgo 'byed cing log par lta ba rnams bzlog ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba la 'dzud pa'i phyir/ gzungs
63a1(mdo sde): sngags 'di bshad pa ni shin tu'ang legs so// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag khyod kyi ming dang / sngags kyi sgra thos nas/ dad pa dang gus pa bskyed de mi smod na/ gang zag
63a2(mdo sde): de tshe 'di nyid la'ang bde la 'chi 'phos na yang rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing / nga yang mthong la khyod la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// mngon par
63a3(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar yang nges par rang gis rig ste/ the tsom med do// kun nas nyon mongs spangs pa dang // dge ba kun gyis lam bsgrubs te// sangs rgyas rang bzhin mthong ba yang // rnam dag dad pa'i dbang gis
63a4(mdo sde): so/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las nyin gcig gam/ dus gcig
63a5(mdo sde): gam/ mtshan gcig gam/ skad cig ma gcig la/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
63a6(mdo sde): chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing theg pa chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa la bsams na/ gang zag de ni skad cig ma se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis mi dge ba
63a7(mdo sde): bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las thams cad yongs ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gal te dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ 
63a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ dge sbyong mas sems kyi rang bzhin stor nas/ sdom pa brgyad nyams pa dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga byas pa dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur
63b1(mdo sde): pa rnams/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal na/ 'di lta bu'i las ngan pa kun ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de skad bka' stsal ma thag tu
63b2(mdo sde): sngon sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur gyi dus na/ rgyal bu dge mthong zhes bya ba de'i tshe mi sum stong dang lhan cig tu skad cig ma der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phag
63b3(mdo sde): 'tshal nas/ tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa nas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las bgyis pa lta zhig bshad kyis mi rdzogs
63b4(mdo sde): ter mi dge ba bcu dang mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la bskur ba'i sdig grangs ma mchis par bgyis/ pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la brten
63b5(mdo sde): nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi spyan sngar 'thol te/ 'gyod tshangs su gsol zhing mchis na/ skabs dbye bar ci gnang zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das
63b6(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu 'jigs pa'i sems bskyed pa'ang dka' la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'ang dka' ste/ mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga 'thol zhing
63b7(mdo sde): 'chags par 'dod pa ni/ log spyod la sogs pa yang sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid mthong du nye bas/ yid la dran pa bzhin du 'thol zhing shags shig/ de nas rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa mi sum
63b8(mdo sde): stong gis/ bcom ldan 'das skabs dbye bar gnang ba byams pa'i gsungs thos nas/ gos tshags bcos te thal mo sbyar cing phyag 'tshal nas/ bla gos phrag pa g.yas su gzar te/ pus mo
64a1(mdo sde): g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchis/ phyogs bcur/ 
64a2(mdo sde): chos la skyabs su mchi'o// phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// yang 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'khrug mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// lho phyogs kyi sangs
64a3(mdo sde): rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas don yod
64a4(mdo sde): grub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// bla ma phyog/ sa kyi sangs rgyas dri brtsegs la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs/ su gsol lo// 'og ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas gzungs
64a5(mdo sde): brnyan 'bum la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// yang shar phyogs na skyes bu chen po kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo// lho phyogs na skyes bu
64a6(mdo sde): chen po 'jig rten 'dzin la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// nub phyogs na kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// byang phyogs na zla gang la
64a7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu gsol lo// bla ma phyogs na na mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// 'og ma phyogs na skyes bu chen po brtan dpal la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu
64a8(mdo sde): gsol lo// yang bdag cag gi mkhan po de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur ba la yang phyog 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing
64b1(mdo sde): skyabs su gsol lo// phyogs gzhan na sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// da ltar bdag cag gi mkhan po bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la yang phyag 'tshal zhing / 
64b2(mdo sde): skyabs su gsol lo// skyes bu chen po dri ma med par grags pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nu la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// 'phags pa dga' bo dang / 'od srung la yang skyabs su
64b3(mdo sde): gsol lo// 'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam bzhi mngon par byung ba rnams la yang skyabs su gsol lo// byang chub kyi sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la yang skyabs su gsol lo// sde snod chen po gsung
64b4(mdo sde): rab mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / mnyam pa nyid yang dag pa'i mdo sde gzhan bzhugs so 'tshal la yang phyag 'tshal zhing sgrubasu gsol lo// cha brgyad du bgos pa'i sku gdungs
64b5(mdo sde): ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// da ltar ni sku gzugs pa/ zhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol
64b6(mdo sde): lo 'phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / sum bcu gsum gyi lha'i dbang phyug dang / bar snang na gnas pa'i lha dang / sa'i lha dang / ri dang nags 'tshal dang
64b7(mdo sde): shing drung gi lha dang / drang srong dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i spyan mnga' ba rnams dang / lha'i snyan mnga' ba thams cad kyi snyan gyis gsan cing mkhyen par mdzod cig/ 
64b8(mdo sde): kun dbang du gsol te sems can thams cad la ma mthol ma bshags pa zhig mchis na yang / sdig pa thams cad byang bar gyur cig/ yang 'di skad ces smras te/ bdag cag thog ma ma
65a1(mdo sde): mchis nas/ da ltar gyi lus ngan pa 'di thob kyi bar du nor cing 'khrul pa'i sems kyis phyin ci log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mchis/ nyon mongs pa dang / mi dge ba'i
65a2(mdo sde): las bgyis pa brjod kyis mi lang ste/ sdig pa'i tshogs bgyis so 'tshal/ rang gis ma tshar ma rig pas ngan sems rab tu rgyas te/ tshe phyi ma ma mthong zhing tshe 'di 'ba' shig mthong bas/ nyon mongs
65a3(mdo sde): pa'i bag chags la mos te dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ring du gyur cing / las ngan pas bar du chod nas/ sdig pa'i grogs po dang bsten cing / dge slong dang / dge slong ma la mi rigs mi tshul ba'i las bgyis
65a4(mdo sde): pa dang / pha dang ma la mi rigs mi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa da dang / yang bdag nyam rangs kyi dbang gis/ dge 'dun dgyi dkor nor thugs thub du spyad pa dang / dge 'dun sde lnga la mi
65a5(mdo sde): rigs mi tshul bar bgyis pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu ma mchis par bag pa 'am/ byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems
65a6(mdo sde): can bkum pa 'am/ chos kyi slob dpon la skur te/ chos la chos ma lags pa la chos lags zhes brjod/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi rtag ces bgyis/ dam pa'i chos la yang mi rtag go zhes
65a7(mdo sde): bgyis/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang mi rtag go zhes bgyis/ sbyin pa dang shes rab la ni ma mos/ log pa'i chos la dad cing 'dzin pa de dag gi slad du/ deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma
65a8(mdo sde): mchis/ khrel zhing ngo tsha ba yang dpag tu ma mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang / thugs rje mnga' ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i
65b1(mdo sde): yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag gis sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa 'thol zhing bshags par
65b2(mdo sde): 'tshal na/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol zhing sran cad kyang mi bgyid par smon to// yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun cad/ mtshams ma mchis
65b3(mdo sde): pa lnga bgyis pa dang / sangs rgyas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i bslab pa zhig par bgyis pa dang / log spyod kyi spyod pa spyad pa dang / ngag rtsub mo gtong ba dang / dam pa'i chos la skur pa 'debs pa'i
65b4(mdo sde): las ngan pa de dag 'gyod cing 'thol ma myong ste/ sems la gnong ba 'am/ ngo tsha ba ma mchis par mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa mi
65b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i las lci ba nges par bgyis par rang gis 'tshal kyang / nongs pa bcabs nas/ 'jigs shing skrag pa dang gnong zhing ngo tsha ba'i sems thog ma nas ma mchis par/ 
65b6(mdo sde): dad pa can gyi mchod pa blangs nas/ 'thol zhing bshags ma myong ste/ dam pa'i chos yun du btsugs te/ rim gro bgyi ba'i sems ma mchis par rtag tu smod cing / brnyas pa dang / ngag gi sgo nas
65b7(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nongs pa mang po bgyis pa dang / ched na dkon mchog gsum yang med do zhes brjod pa dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa'i sdig de dag bgyis pa'i
65b8(mdo sde): slad du/ deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ gnod zhing khrel ba dpag tu ma mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni
66a1(mdo sde): byams pa dang / thugs rje mnga' ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag gi
66a2(mdo sde): sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa/ mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis 'thol zhing bshags par 'tshal na/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ slan cad kyang mi bgyid
66a3(mdo sde): par smon to// yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa tshun cad phyin ci log tu lta lta ste/ rtsa ba bzhi ni sbom por bshad/ sbom po ni rtsa ba bzhir bshad/ zhig
66a4(mdo sde): pa rnams ni ma zhig par bshad/ ma zhig pa rnams ni zhig/ dpar bshad/ lci ba rnams ni yang bar bshad/ yang ba rnams ni lci bar bshad/ dag pa rnams ni ma dag par
66a5(mdo sde): bshad dam dag pa rnams ni dag par bshad pa dang / yang log pa lta bas 'jig rten pa'i gtsug la la bstod cing / bsngags nas/ chos dang mdo sde la ni ma gus te/ sme dang
66a6(mdo sde): gyi gtam rtag tu gleng zhing brjod pa dang / ma brtags pa'i rnam pa brgyad po 'chang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa ni bdud kyi tshig go zhes bgyis pa dang / bdud kyi tshig yang
66a7(mdo sde): dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bgyis pa dang / mu stegs mkhan gyi tshig la yid ches par 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthar mya ngan las 'das te med pas/ dkon mchog
66a8(mdo sde): gsum yang mi rtag go zhes bgyis nas lus dang sems 'khrul cing / phyin ci log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa yang dpag tu ma mchis/ gnong zhing ngo tsha
66b1(mdo sde): ba yang dpag tu ma mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje mngara' ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab sum lags byang chub
66b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag gi sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa de dag mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis 'thol zhing bshags
66b3(mdo sde): par 'tshal na/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol// sman bcad kyang mi bgyid par smon to// yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas/ tshe lus 'di la
66b4(mdo sde): thug gi bar du/ dge 'dun gyi spyi'i nor ram/ phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram/ da ltar bzhugs pa'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram/ dge 'dun sde lnga'i nor ram/ dge slong gang
66b5(mdo sde): zag gi nor ram/ yon bdag thams cad kyi nor rdzas la ban+d+ha sa pa 'am/ rang nyam du spyad pa dang / yang rang smos te/ bdag gis dam pa'i chos bsam gtan bzhi 'am// 'bras
66b6(mdo sde): bu bzhi ma thob po zhes smras pa la sogs pa/ skyen de lta bu'i las ngan pa mi dge ba'i rgyu rkyen tu gyur te/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na yang / pham pa bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad dang / 
66b7(mdo sde): drug dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum dang / ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang / spang ba'i ltung ba sum cu dang / ltung ba dgu bcu dang / so sor bshags pa bzhi dang / bslab pa mang po
66b8(mdo sde): dang bdun shin tu zhi bo'i chos rnams te/ tshul khrims de dag re re la nyes byas nas/ pham pa la thug gi bar du nyams pa dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang / dam pa'i
67a1(mdo sde): chos dang mdo sde zab mo la skur pa dang / log spyod kyi spyod pa spyad nas/ nongs pa bcabs te/ 'gyod cing 'thol ma myong bas nyin mtshan du 'phel zhing skye ba sngon
67a2(mdo sde): rgyal ba dag gis bshad pa las thos pa ni/ dam pa'i chos la skur pa 'am/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa 'am/ rtsa ba bzhi pham par gyur pa rnams ma gshegs ma 'thol na/ sems
67a3(mdo sde): can dmyal bar nges par ltung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang skabs mdzad par mi 'gyur/ dge 'dun dang pa ma dang / 
67a4(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyis kyang skyabs dang 'or ba bgyid da mi nus so zhes 'byung bas na/ de'i slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ gnong zhing ngo tsha ba dpag
67a5(mdo sde): tu ma mchis te/ de'i slad du deng dkon mchog gsum dang / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas stong dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
67a6(mdo sde): sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa la skyabs su gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje'i mnga' bdag ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems
67a7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag bskal pa bdag tu ma mchis pa'i tshun pad ci nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / pham pa
67a8(mdo sde): bzhi dang / mtshams ma mchis pa dang / mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i sdig lci ba rnams 'thol zhing bshags par 'tshal na/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan
67b1(mdo sde): 'das deng bdag cag gis sems can rnams dang / bdag cag gi rang rang gi slad du/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i spyan sngar 'thol zhing bshags par 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad kyis
67b2(mdo sde): bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / pha ma'i drin glo bar ma chud pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos ma 'tshal te/ mi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa dang / 
67b3(mdo sde): rang gi rigs bsnyams te/ dregs shing rgyags pa'i tshe/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las nyam bag du bgyis kyang / nongs par ma mthong bas/ skye bo blun po'i las bgyis pa dang / sdig
67b4(mdo sde): pa'i bshes gnyen la bsten cing / nyon mongs pas sems 'khrugs pa dang / 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan la cho ga ma 'tshal te/ mi dge ba'i las rnams bgyis pa dang / 'gro ba
67b5(mdo sde): bzang mos bslus te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti/ mug gi nyon mongs pas gzir cing / sems 'khrug/ sa te/ spros pa dang / lus dang ngag dang / yid gsum gyi sgo
67b6(mdo sde): nas bsags pa'i las mi dge ba bdag gis bgyis pa dang / gzhan bgyid du bstsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad deng so sor 'chags so// 'thol lo
67b7(mdo sde): mi 'chab bo// sangs rgyas dang chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa yang deng so sor 'chags so// 'thol lo/ mi 'chab bo// byang chub sems dpa' dang
67b8(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas la yang bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa yang deng so sor 'chags so// 'thol lo// mi 'chab bo// ma rig pa'i dbang gis dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa dang / 
68a1(mdo sde): pa ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi drin glo bar ma chud pa'i slad du/ bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag kyang deng so sor gshegs so// 'thol lo// mi
68a2(mdo sde): 'chab bo// blun zhing rmongs pas bsgribs te/ nyams rangs dang rgyags pas/ mi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag kyang deng so sor 'chag so// 'thol lo// mi 'chab bo// slan chad
68a3(mdo sde): kyang mi bgyid do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bdag cag gi yon phul zhing mchod pas ni/ ma lus pa'i sems can de dag kun sa bcu la 'khod de/ de bzhin gshegs
68a4(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal bu dge mthong la 'di
68a5(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to// legs so// skyes bu chen po rang / gi las legs nyes kyi rtog pa la mkhas te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las la 'jigs pa dang
68a6(mdo sde): skrag pa skyes nas/ nyes pa rnams mngon par 'thol ba'i stong du/ sems can gyi sdig pa mang po yang / khyod kyis 'thol zhing bshags pa'i phyir/ khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang
68a7(mdo sde): dag pa zhes bgyi'o// rang gi nyon mongs pa yang spong ba'i steng du/ sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa yang ring du dbral bar byas pas/ de'i phyir khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa
68a8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yin te/ rang gi don tu smon pa yin gyi/ thog mar sems can thams cad kyi don tu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
68b1(mdo sde): smon lam btab pa'i phyir/ khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o// de nas rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa mi sum stong gis 'gyod tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigs/ 
68b2(mdo sde): su bshad de 'di skad ces bstod do// bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig gtso bo'i mchog khams gsum pa ma thams cad mkhyen// thams cad mi mnyam mnyam pa nyid// bcom ldan dkon la phyag
68b3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// skye bo sbyin gtong rang gi phyir// nor rdzas byin cing lan yang re// byams chen rgyal ba de min te// dgra gnyen byams sdang phan snyoms mdzad// rkang gnyis nang na rgyal ba btsun// shes
68b4(mdo sde): rab spun gyis mkhyen gzigs la// brtson 'grus che bdag skyabs su mchi// lha rnams shes rab de ma 'tshal// 'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs// rgyal ba kun la bdag
68b5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal// de bzhin rgyal la skyabs gsol ba'ang // dus gsum rgyal ba mchod bu bzhin// de nas phyogs pa/ cu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis// rgyal bu dge mthong dang // 
68b6(mdo sde): stong la tshig su bcad de bstod pa// gang zhig sangs rgyas 'grub 'dod pa// mang du thos la 'brang bar byos// slob dpon dge la bkur byas na// sangs rgyas grub pa yun mi ring // gang zhig tshul
68b7(mdo sde): khrims rnam dag spyod// de ni dge slong yang dag yin// gang zhig stong par sgom nus pa// de ni ting 'dzin thob ces bya// gang zhig brtson 'grus spyod nus pa// de ni byang chub spyod pa'o// gang zhig mya
68b8(mdo sde): ngan 'da' 'gyur ba// de ni dga' ba yang dag pa'o// tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang // rnam dag khrims 'dzin dge slong ma// zla ba phyed cing gas sbyong byos// chos gos rnam pa lus gyon te// 
69a1(mdo sde): srung bzed sreg sheng thogs nas su// rnam dag bsod snyoms 'gro byas na// lha rnams can kyang dgar 'byung bas// bral mo sbyar cing kus phyag 'jas// ngas kyang lha nga / 
69a2(mdo sde): mi rnams kun// de yi bya ba byed du bzhugs/ dper na lha bran thams cad kyis// lha yi dbang po brgya byin la/ rim gro gus pas byed pa bzhin/ da ltar 'bral du'ang yin thob ste// phyi ma'i dus su 'ang
69a3(mdo sde): dpag tu med// rab tu byung zhing khrims 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas drin lan yon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// nga dang sems pa ma gtogs par// 'jig rten pa'i mi kun gyis// rnam dag dang
69a4(mdo sde): pa'i sems bskyed do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag kun // mya ngan mi 'da' rtag tu bzhugs// chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin te// de ltar mngon par shes pa ni// sangs
69a5(mdo sde): rgyas drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// 'jig rten pa'i mi dag kun// rnam par 'byed pa'i sems med cing // theg pa gcig lam mngon par shes// 
69a6(mdo sde): 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa// phyogs bcu dang ni da lta'i rnams// sangs rgyas theg pa gcig pu la// gnyis sam gsum zhes bya med par// de ltar yid la bskyed nas su// sems kyis rnam par
69a7(mdo sde): mi rtog na/ de lta bu'i mi rnams ni// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// gang zag la la 'ga' zhig gis// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyi na// rtag tu dad pa'i sems
69a8(mdo sde): bskyed de// sems can kun la sangs rgyas kyi// bdag nyid yod par bshad pa ni// de lta bu'i gang zag rnams// rgyal ba'i dran lan lon zhes bya// gang zhig skad cig dge spyod cing // lha yi 'bras
69b1(mdo sde): bu mi re ste/ cig car bla med lam bsgrubs na// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das byin// gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig gis// yud tsam mdo
69b2(mdo sde): sde 'di blags te// dkon mchog gsum la gus byas shing // mkhan la sri zhu mchod byas na// de lta bu'i gang zag rnams// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// gang zhig nor rdzas sna 'ga' 'am// kha
69b3(mdo sde): zas dang ni gos kyi rnams// kun la khyab par sbyin byas na// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// nga yi chos rnams 'jigs pa na// gang zhig 'ga' la blo bstan nas// yud
69b4(mdo sde): tsam mdo sde 'di mnyan na// byang chub sems dpa' 'bum brgya dal// mchod pa phul bas de lhag go// theg chen mdo sde 'di dag kyang // sangs rgyas byang chub kun gyi yum// sangs rgyas
69b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dang // mdo sde 'di la dran byas te/ snyoms sems phan tshun gnyis med na// rgyal ba'idrin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ 
69b6(mdo sde): gang zhig chos 'di 'jig pa'i tshe// rgyal ba'i drin lan blan 'dod pas// skad cig yud tsam sgom byed pas// stong khams gang ba'i sems can gyis// srog gi sbyin pa byin pa bas// bsam
69b7(mdo sde): gtan bsgom pa yon tan che// gang zhig bsgom la skur pa dang // dge 'dun 'khrugs par byed pa ni// stong khams gsum po gang ba yi// mi rnams kyi ni srog bcad dang // srog chags thams
69b8(mdo sde): cad bsad dang 'dra// bsgom dang dge 'dun dkrugs skur na// de yi sdig kyang de bzhin no// gang zhig dge sbyong mthong ba la// skur pa 'debs shing ma dad pa// dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs gcod
70a1(mdo sde): pa/ des ni rgyal ba'i lan mi ldon// de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang // mi sum stong po// bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan par gnang ga dga' bas tshim nas bstan pa
70a2(mdo sde): nyid spyi bos blangs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la// gang mad lags shing gang mi med// mad dang mi med gnyi ga yang // dngos por dmigs su yong
70a3(mdo sde): ma mchis// yang dag mtshan nyid de lta bu// chos rnams kun dang ma 'gal lo// sems can kun la byams slad du// thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'phags pa gang nas byon pa nas// de bzhin
70a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'ang de nas byon// yang dag mtshan nyid ji lta ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin no// 'phags pa kun gyi bden tshig ltar// de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin bshad// 
70a5(mdo sde): de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// de bzhin gshegs zhesabagyi ba lags// bzod pa'i go cha brtan pa'i sems// / sra ba'i gzhu stobs brtson 'grus che// rno ba'i mnga' ni shes
70a6(mdo sde): rab 'gyogs// le le'i dgra rnams 'joms mdzad cing // 'jig rten lha dang mi rnams kyi// mchod yon phul ba bzhes pas na// de yo slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba lags// rab
70a7(mdo sde): tu sdug bsngal mtshan nyid mkhyen// sdug bsngal rgyu yang shin tu mkhyen// sdug bsngal zhi ba'i mtshan nyid dang // zhi ba'i tshul yang rab tu mkhyen// 'phags pa'i bden bzhin mkhyen pa na/ 
70a8(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ma mchis bden par nges// de bas phyogs bcu'i nang na yang // mtshan ni yang dag rdzogs shes bgyi// rig pa gsum po mchog brnyas pas// spyod lam rnam dag dang yang ldan// de
70b1(mdo sde): slang mtshan ni bcom ldan 'das// mkhyen dang zhabs su ldan zhes bgyi// chos rnams thams cad kun mkhyen cing // dam pa'i chos nyid rab brnyes pas// thams cad kun la byams slad du// 
70b2(mdo sde): dus skabs sbyar ba thabs kyis bshad// skye rga na 'chi rab bsal cing // bde ba'i gnas su phyin par mdzad// de yi slang du rgyal ba'i mtshan// bde bar gshegs shes bgyi ba lags/ 
70b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gang nas mchis pa dang // 'jig rten bas pa'i mtha' yang mkhyen// de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// 'jig rten mkhyen ces bgyi ba lags// thugs rje chen pos sems can bsgral// 
70b4(mdo sde): mnyen des dge ba bstan cing btul// de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab spyan// thub cing bla ru 'da' ba med
70b5(mdo sde): de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// bla na med ces bgyi ba lags// nyon mongs mi mnga' shes rab ldan// rnam grol dam pa mchog bshad pas// de yi slad du rgyal ba'i
70b6(mdo sde): mtshanas lha dang mi yi ston ces bgyi// dus gsum g.yo 'am mi g.yo la// bas sam ma bas chos kun kyang // byang chub shing drung kun mkhyen pas// de yi slad du mtshan sangs rgyas// de nas
70b7(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i ting nge 'dzin tu zhugs nas// sku na mkha' la 'phags te/ zhal so ser nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye rgyal
70b8(mdo sde): buM dge mthong dang / mi sum stong po khyed rnams kyi sdig gi rang bzhin ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ bar na yang mi gnas so// sems brtan pa'i phyir dge ba'i mthu
71a1(mdo sde): yang brtan no// sems rnam par grol ba'i phyir// sdig gi rang bzhin yang rnam par grol lo// shes rab stong pa nyid kyi phyir// sdig gi rang bzhin kyang stong pa nyid do// dang / 
71a2(mdo sde): pa'i mthu che ba'i phyir// bsod nams kyi mthu yang che'o// de bzhin du mthol bshags te// 'gyod tshangs nus pa ni/ nged rnams mthong ba'i steng du/ sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang / sprul pa'i sku
71a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs pas// rgyun tung yang mthong la// deng byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan bcos pa dang 'dra bar// de bzhin du 'gyod tshangs
71a4(mdo sde): byas pa ni// nga dang sprul pa'i sku rnams dang / 'das pa'i sa ngas rgyas rin chen mang la sogs pa thams cad kyang dgyes/ par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mthong
71a5(mdo sde): ba dang // mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de dag kyang dgyes pa/ ra 'gyur te/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di'i rjes su bya chub tu chud par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
71a6(mdo sde): zham 'bring ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/ sdig can rnams kyis sdig bshags par 'dod na/ rgyal bu dge mthong bzhin du dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
71a7(mdo sde): dge 'dun chen po rnams la re re nas dmigs te phyag 'tshal ba/ nga dang phrad pa dang 'dra ba 'am/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed de// sangs rgyas gcig gam/ sangs rgyas gnyis sam/ sangs
71a8(mdo sde): rgyas bcu 'am/ sangs rgyas brgya'am/ sangs rgyas stong ngam/ sangs rgyas khri 'am/ sangs rgyas grangs med pa'i 'du shes bskyed de/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar dmigs la/ de bzhin du re re nas dmigs
71b1(mdo sde): tete sems kyis phyag 'tshal na/ de dag gis bsod nams dpag tu med pa yang thob par 'gyur la/ 'khor ba'i sdig ba thams cad kyang sel bar byed do// bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du ngan song
71b2(mdo sde): gsum du lhung bar mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur bar yang nges te/ the tsom med do// de'i phyir sdig pa rnams 'thol zhing bshegs par byas la/ sems thag pa nas dang
71b3(mdo sde): pa bskyed na/ gdon mi za bar sdig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang / mi stong gis cig car du skad bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de bstod pa/ 'di skad ces gsol
71b4(mdo sde): to/ bcom ldan byams shing thugs rje che// shAkya'i gdung rigs chos kyi rje// tshogs kyi nang na seng ge'i sgras/ khyab par sems can bsdus pa ni// pha la gzigs pa bu cig
71b5(mdo sde): bzhin/ rnam par 'byed pa yong ma mchis// de lte bu yi bla med pa// mthong nas de slad gus phyag 'tshal// de nas ba ma ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu dge mthong dang / mi sum stong rnams
71b6(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed rnams 'di ltar 'gyod tshangs byas te/ mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis 'thol zhing bshags pas/ da ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// khyed
71b7(mdo sde): rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas su 'grub bo// rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/ nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gang zhig sems thag pa nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs
71b8(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal bar nus pa ni/ dkon mchog gsum gyi drin gyi lan lon zhes bya ste/ de ma thag tu mi dge ba bcu
72a1(mdo sde): dang mtshams med ba lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la bskur ba'i sdig 'byung bar gyur nas/ rgyun tu zhugs par 'os pa ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no// lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'os
72a2(mdo sde): pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no// phyir mi 'ong bar 'os pa ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no// dgra bcom par 'os pa ni/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no// rang sangs rgyas su 'os pa ni// 
72a3(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu sbyin no// byang chub sems dpar 'os pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu sbyin no// da ltar mdo sde 'di'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams skye
72a4(mdo sde): ba gcig gis yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa yang / phyog sa bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gnyis kyi chos
72a5(mdo sde): kyi dbyings thob pa yang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes thob pa yang dus
72a6(mdo sde): gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la las don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud pa yang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i
72a7(mdo sde): yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la la dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la las/ 
72a8(mdo sde): nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la la/ phyir mi
72b1(mdo sde): ldog pa'i bzod pa dang / chos sbyin gyi bzod pa dang / chos bzhin gyi dbyings dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la la/ gzungs
72b2(mdo sde): dran pa chen po'i sems dang / rang gis rigs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum na gzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la la/ 
72b3(mdo sde): seng ge sgra'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes lnga'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// 
72b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la la mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / de/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam dang
72b5(mdo sde): ldan pa yang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rje 'jam dpal
72b6(mdo sde): gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad nor cing 'khrul pa/ sems 'khrugs te/ mi dge ba dang / mtshams ma mchis pa bgyis pa rnams
72b7(mdo sde): ci ltar bgyis na sdig 'byung bar 'gyur zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ gong du bstan pa yin te/ gang la las phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam
72b8(mdo sde): grangs 'di dang / phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan thos nas/ dga' ba rab tu dga' ba skyed la/ dang pa dang / gus pa
73a1(mdo sde): dpag tu med pas blangs sam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ 'don tam/ yi ger bris sam/ kun chub par byas te/ dben pa'i gnas khang pa gcig gi nang du/ dkyil 'khor
73a2(mdo sde): byas la/  dri chus chag cag btab te/ phan gdugs bzang pos brgyan cing pog spos zhim po bsregs nas/ rgyal ba rnams spyan drang zhing gshegs su gsol ba mang yang rung / nyung yang rung / 
73a3(mdo sde): spyan drangs nas/ bdag khrus dag par byas la gos gtsang ma gyon cing / lan cig phyi rol che chung ngu 'gro na/ khrus lan cig byas te/ seng ge'i khri gtsugs nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du
73a4(mdo sde): bsgoms la/ chos kyi mtshan nyid la bdag dang / gang zag/ dang / sems can la sogs pa'i lta ba med par mngon par rtogs par bya ste/ dang po bas bye brag phyed cing gsal
73a5(mdo sde): bar brjod par bya'o// de nas dri spos zhim po bsregs la/ 'khrug sems bsal cing / dran pa yang dag pa dang / bsam pa yang dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sems
73a6(mdo sde): rtse gcig tu bsam mo// de ltar spyod pa rnams 'thun zhing 'don pa ni mchog ste/ de la mi mthun zhing rtsod pa ni 'thol tshangs su mi 'gyur ro// khro ba des kun 'jigs par byed de// spyod lam dang
73a7(mdo sde): yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po dran zhing don dam pa bsams la/ nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du nyal zhing gnyid log tu mi rung ngo // nyin gcig kyang dus gsum du mdo sde 'di kha
73a8(mdo sde): ton tam/ klog pa nyin mtshan dus drug du byas la/ dri bsung gis mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas/ 'thol tshangs su byas te/ mdo sde 'di nyid nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 
73b1(mdo sde): mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan brjod cing / sems thag pa nas mi 'khrugs pa dang / sems thag pa nas mi nor ba dang / sems thag pa nas mi g.yeng ba dang / sems thag pa nas dus kyis 'grus pa dang / 
73b2(mdo sde): sems thag pa nas nyin cig pas nyin cig 'grus pa dang / sems thag pa nas dad pa skyed pa dang / sems thag pa nas dga' ba bskyed pa dang / sems thag pa nas rim pa bskyed pa dang / sems thag pa
73b3(mdo sde): nas rgyun mi gcad pa dang / sems thag pa nas gza' ba dang / sems thag pa nas mi 'bral ba dang / sems thag pa nas sdig mi bsam pa dang / sems thag pa nas sangs rgyas dran pa dang / sems thag
73b4(mdo sde): pa nas chos dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas dge 'dun dran pa da dang / sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas gtong ba dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas don dam
73b5(mdo sde): pa'i lha dran pa ste/ de dag de bzhin du klog pa dang / de bzhin du phyag bya ba dang / de bzhin du sems thag pa nas so sor 'chags shing 'thol ba/ thog ma'i nyin par nas/ zhag drug tu
73b6(mdo sde): lon pa'i nang par dri chus yang chag chag btab ste/ lus la yang spos chus bkru bar bya'o// pog spos bzang po bsregs cing / sems thag pas mchod pa byas pa/ de dag de lta bur sems thag pa nas
73b7(mdo sde): so sor 'thol zhing bshags pas/ phyogs bcur bskul bar 'gyur te/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na// sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa/ 
73b8(mdo sde): gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed dang 'grogs te/ sgra dbyangs kyi rjes su khang bu de'i nang du phyin cing mngon tu 'grub pa'i dbang bya'o// de bzhin du nyon mtshan bdun gyi bar du byas na/ gdon mi za bar sdig
74a1(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar sdig 'byang bar shes zhe na/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyis don dam par da dung ma grub pas/ rmi ltas kyi mtshan ma la rtags su byas te/ rmi lam rnam
74a2(mdo sde): gcig rmis na/ mtshams med pa rnam gcig 'byung ngo // rmi lam rnam lnga rmis na mtshams med pa rnam lnga 'byang ste/ des nub mo rmi lam na chu klung chen po rgal bar 'dod de/ zam pa chen po'i steng du
74a3(mdo sde): 'gro bar rmis na/ des ni nges par rnam par grol ba thob pa yin no// gal te de'i rmi lam na gzhan gyis bdag la khrus byas pa dang / lus la tshar bab par rmis na/ de nges par rnam par dag pa thob
74a4(mdo sde): pa yin no// gal te de'i rmi lam na/ bdag dge 'dun mang po'i nang du zhugs te/ gral du 'dug par rmis na/ de ni/ nges par sangs rgyas kyi slob ma yang dag par gyur to// gal
74a5(mdo sde): te de'i rmis lam na/ bdag mchod rten nas/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs te// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzu gas brnyan mthong bar rmis na/ de ni chos kyi sgo mo dam par zhug
74a6(mdo sde): par gyur to// gal te rang gis shing thog rnyed cing za bar rmis na/ de ni tshe 'di nyid la yon tan gyi 'bras bu 'grub par mngon no// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ gal te
74a7(mdo sde): dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge sbyong ma 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' dad pa can gang la las dran pa nyams te/ nor cing 'khrul pas sdom pa'i tshul khrims re re nas zhig pa'am/ 
74a8(mdo sde): nyams pa de bzhin du so sor 'chags shing 'thol na/ sdig mi 'byang mi srid de/ sems thag pa nas ma byas pa ni ma gtogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces zhus
74b1(mdo sde): so/ bcom ldan 'das cho ga 'di ltar bgyi ba'i tshe/ mi mang na rung ngam mi rung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi gcig yan cad nyi shu man cad rung ngo // cho ga 'di ltar spyod pa'i tshe/ mdo
74b2(mdo sde): sde gzhan mi bsam mo// de ltar 'thol tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu phyin chad nyes pa mi byed na/ de ni 'thol tshangs zhes bya'o// de ltar dran par gyis shig/ bdag cag rnams da ltar 'chi ba las slar
74b3(mdo sde): 'tshe ba dang 'dra bas/ da ni bdag tshul khrims srung ngo // da ni bdag brtson 'grus su spyod do// da ni bdag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde klog pa dang / kha don bgyi'o zhes de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dran pa de
74b4(mdo sde): ltar gyis shig/ bdag deng nas sdom pa bzung ba ni rdo rje dang 'dra bar sran thub par smon to// des de ltar dran pa'i tshe/ skyes bu dam pa dri ma med par grags pa yang // byang chub
74b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang lhan cig tu de'i mdun tu/ 'greng ste/ dbang du byed de// 'phags pa kun tu bzang / po yang / 'gyod tshangs kyi mkhan po byed do// 'phags pa
74b6(mdo sde): 'od srungs kyang zhu gnas kyi rten byed do// 'jam dpal 'di ni sdig sbyangs pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni gnas
74b7(mdo sde): thob pa zhes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang la la zhig gis rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom pa
74b8(mdo sde): brgyad dang / sdom brgyad dang / sdom pa phyed can dang / khrims bcu dang / gsum la skyabs su song ba dang / khrims lnga dang / dge ba bcu dang / tshul khrims dang / 'dul ba re re nas zhig pa
75a1(mdo sde): 'amang nyams pa 'am/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa 'am/ mnyam pa nyid la skur pa'i sdig byas pa zhig yod pa de log spyod ma gtogs par/ so sor ma bshags ma
75a2(mdo sde): 'thol na/ mi de tshe 'phos ma thag tu gdon mi za bar mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ mnar ma mchis
75a3(mdo sde): pa'i dmyal ba zhes bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/ de ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ltung ba dang / dmyal ba'i dbyibs che chung dang / rnam par smin pa'i sdug bsngal
75a4(mdo sde): bskal pa'i grangs ci tsam gyi bar du gnas par 'gyur ba dbashad du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang / bcom ldan 'ad ngas kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal shin tu'ang mkhas so/ 
75a5(mdo sde): shin tu'ang mkhas so// don 'di lta bu 'dri ba yang shin tu mkhas te/ legs par nyon la pal mang po rnams kyi/ nga legs par soms shig/ ngas bye brag phyed par bshad do// 
75a6(mdo sde): ci ltar na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya zhe na/ skad cig kyang mnar zhing bstir med pa'i phyir/ mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o// gcig tu na 'gag pa 'am/ 'ong bar bya ba'ang med
75a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yang med de/ tsha ba ni rab tu tsha/ sdug bsngal ba ni shin tu'ang mi bzad pa/ skad cig kyang mi dal/ skad cig kyang mi sdod cing bar skabs med pa'i phyir/ mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o// / 
75a8(mdo sde): yang rnam pa gcig tu na/ me chen po 'bar ba/ rab tu tsha ba/ kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar zhing mched pa/ khong du zhugs pa'i phyir/ mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
75b1(mdo sde): yang 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i dbyibs ni/ gru bzhi lham pa/ dpag tshad brgyad khri yod de/ lcags kyi rab rim pa bdun gyis bskor cing / steng du
75b2(mdo sde): yang lcags kyi dra ba rim pa bdun gyis g.yogs te/ 'og tu bar chad bco brgyad do// de'i kho ra khor yug tu ral gri tshal rim pa bdun gyis bskor to// lcags kyi rab rim pa bdun gyi nang logs su
75b3(mdo sde): nags tshal ral gri'i lo ma can yod do// lcags kyi khang pa bar chad bco brgyad po rtseg mar 'dug ste/ rim pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do// de'i grwa bzhir zangs kyi khyi chen po bzhi 'dug pa/ lus kyi bong
75b4(mdo sde): tshetshod ni 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi bcu la/ mig ni klog gi 'od ba bzhin/ mche ba ni ras kyi sdong po dang 'dra/ so ni spu gri so gta dmas pa'i ri dang mtshungs/ lce ni lcags kyi mchil ba bzhin/ 
75b5(mdo sde): sder mo ni lcags kyi gsal shing dang mtshungs/ mjug ma ni lcags kyi sbrul dang 'dra/ spu'i bu gu re re nas/ 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched cing / kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ste/ 
75b6(mdo sde): de'i dud pa mnam pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi rdzas gnam pa gang dang yang bskrun tu med do// dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhi la/ sgo re re nas dmyal ba'i srungs ma bco brgyad 'dug go// mgo ni srin po'i mgo/ kha ni srin por
75b7(mdo sde): kha dang 'dra ste/ mgo la ra bco brgyad yod pa/ lag na lcags kyi gsal zhing thogs so// ra ba rims pa bdun gyi nang log su/ lcags kyi rgyal mtshan grangs med pa zhig yod de/ rgyal mtshan gyi mgor me
75b8(mdo sde): 'byung ba ni/ chu mig pa dang 'dra bar 'byung ngo // lcags 'ju ba'i khu ba 'bab pa ni/ kun tu khyab par 'bab ste/ dmyal ba'i sgo bzhir sgo re re'i steng na/ zangs po che bco brgyad yod pa'i nang na/ lcags
76a1(mdo sde): khol ba'i khu ba khar ldud cing / sgo bzhir 'bab pa/ dmyal ba'i nang du gang bar 'bab po// khang pa bar chad re re'i nang du yang / lcags kyi sbrul chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pas/ 
76a2(mdo sde): khar gdug pa'i me skyug cing ra ba kun tu gang bar gtong ngo // sbrul gyi sgra sgrogs pa ni 'brug sgra chen po zer ba bzhin no// lcags kyi thu lum chen po'i char bab yang mnar med pa kun tu gang ngo // der sdug bsngal
76a3(mdo sde): mi bzad pa ni 'bum phrag brgyad khri ste/ sdug bsngal gyi nang na sdug bsngal/ mi bzad pa'i nang na mi bzad pa/ kun kyang der 'dus pas dpe zla med do// mnar med pa'i dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhir/ sgo re
76a4(mdo sde): re'i phyi rol tu 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched cing 'bar ba/ lho byang shar nub bsnol zhing phyang bar rgyu'o// 'bar ba yang lcags kyi ra ba kho ra khor yug dpag tshad brgyad khri nas/ steng
76a5(mdo sde): lcags kyi dra ba las thug gi bar du/ yal thal mar thal zhing bla za 'og dang / phyogs bzhir kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/ sdug bsngal cig car ldang ba ni/ gong du
76a6(mdo sde): smos pa bzhin no// rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad 'jigs pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la bskur pa 'debs pa rnams/ mdo sde 'di las 'byung ba bzhin 'thol tshangs ma byas
76a7(mdo sde): la/ gnod bkur ba 'am/ khrel pa med na mi de tshe 'phos ma thag tu/ stobs chen po che'i dpung pa g.yas pa brkyang zhing bskums pa tsam gyis mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// lus
76a8(mdo sde): kyang de'i nang du gang ste/ tsha ba'i bzir pas phongs nas/ kha gdangs mig btsums/ mig gdangs kha btsums kyang kha 'thams pas smra ma nus so// de sdig mang ba'i phyir ral gri 'khor lo grangs
76b1(mdo sde): med pa'i du ma zhig na mkha' nas char bzhin 'bab ste/ glad par phog cing rkang par byung ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni sngar gong du bshad pa bzhin brgya stong khri phrag tu bsgyur ba'o// gang la la rtsa ba
76b2(mdo sde): bzhi po tshang bar zhig par gyur na/ sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong ba ni/ bskal pa chen po lnga rdzogs kyi bar du'o// sdom pa brgyad 'jig pa ni de las gyur cig gis mang ngo // mtshams med pa lnga yang / 
76b3(mdo sde): gyur cig gis mang ngo // mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde la skur pa sdebs pa yang // gyur cig gis mang ngo // dkon mchog gsum la smod pa dang / dge 'dun gyi nor bsdus pa dang / dge slong dang dge slong ma
76b4(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod pa la/ dri ma can du spyod pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon la dbang za ba dang / ma g.yem pa rnam pa gong ma dag las kyang gyur cig gis bskyed do// log spyod kyi rnams
76b5(mdo sde): ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gtan chad pas/ nams kyang mnar medaba'i dmyal ba nas mi thar pa ni der ma gtogs so// de la sogs pa'i sdig can rnams/ sdug bsngal nyams su
76b6(mdo sde): myong ba'i tshe/ 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched pa khong du zhugs te rmugs nas 'chi'o// de nas srin po dmyal ba'i srungs mas/ lcags kyi gsal shing sa la brdabs te/ sos sos zhes bos pa dang
76b7(mdo sde): bos pa'i sgra bzhin du yang sos yang sos na/ nyin mtshan gcig la lan khri ni 'chi/ lan khri ni 'tsho ste/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chen po nyams su myong nagong du bstan pa bzhin no// nam zhig
76b8(mdo sde): mnar med pa'i dmyal ba nas slar phyin na yang tshul khrims bshig pa dang / yon bdag dad pa can gyi yon blangs pa'i las kyis/ yang dmyal ba chung ngu rnams kyi nang du 'jug ste/ de la
77a1(mdo sde): dmyal ba grang sbrebs pa dang / dmyal ba mun nag pa dang / dmyal ba rab tu tsha ba dang / dmyal ba spu gri so bsnams pa dang / dmyal ba ral gri 'khor lo dang / dmyal ba me'i
77a2(mdo sde): shing rta can dang / dmyal ba phyi sa'i 'dam dang / dmyal ba chu tshan dang / dmyal ba me mur klung dang / dmyal ba nags tshal ral gri lo ma can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor can dang / dmyal ba
77a3(mdo sde): lcags kyi sham ma li ka ba can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi khri can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khor lo can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi phug dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi thu lum dang / dmyal ba
77a4(mdo sde): bsdus 'joms thug ri can dang / dmyal ba zangs khu lu dad dang / 'di rnams so so re re'i nang du yang lo khri phra dag brgyad brgya'i bar du nyon mongs nas gdod thar te/ 'on kyang / 
77a5(mdo sde): rtag tu ma rabs su skyes la/ tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du da kon mchog gsum gyi sgra mi thos so// brgya la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa na ni/ byang chub tu sems bskyed
77a6(mdo sde): kyang srid / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma phrad na ni/ slar yang dmyal bar ltung ngo // nyes byas kyi sdig pa rnams ma 'thol ma bshags na/ dmyal bar sdug bsngal myong ba yang rgyal tshon
77a7(mdo sde): ris bzhi'i lha'i lo grangs lta bur/ lo khri phrag brgyad brgya'i bar du nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// de la ltung ba rnams kyi sdig pa ni de las nyis gyur du skyed do// dge 'dun gyi lhag ma yang de
77a8(mdo sde): las nyis gyur du bskyed do// sdig can de dag gis sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshe/ tshig gzhan mi phyin te/ a pa pa/ a ta ta/ a la la/ a ba ba/ 'ba' shig zer zhing 'dug go// 
77b1(mdo sde): de bas na sdig can rnams rings par so sor 'thol zhig bshags la/ dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs su song bar bgyis shig/ 'jam dpal yang 'di lta ste/ sdig pa byung du bsal cing 'byung
77b2(mdo sde): bar 'dod na/ mdo sde 'di'i nang nas 'byung ba bzhin du so sor 'thol bshags te/ 'gyod tshangs byos shig/ cho ga nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin cig za cig tu byas la/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang
77b3(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas su grub pa'i tshe/ mi chen po'o mtshan dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i mtshan dang / mi g.yo ba'i mtshan dang / rnam par grol ba'i
77b4(mdo sde): mtshan dang / 'od zer can gyi mtshan dang / ye shes yongs su rgyas pa'i mtshan dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i
77b5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i mtshan rnams bsam par bya'o// yang gcig tu na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po byams pa'i yid dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs
77b6(mdo sde): te/ yid 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o// yid 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ slar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting
77b7(mdo sde): nge 'dzin las langs te/ shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ shes rab sgron ma las langs te/ chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid las
77b8(mdo sde): langs te/ mtshan ma 'od zer can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ mtshan ma 'od zer can las langs te// seng ge'i nga ro'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ seng ge'i nga ro las langs te/ seng ge sprug pa'i ting
78a1(mdo sde): nge 'dzin la 'jug/ seng ge sprug pa las langs te/ rgya mtsho yid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ rgya mtsho yid las langs te/ kun tu ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ kun tu ye
78a2(mdo sde): shes las langs te/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya las langs te/ kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs
78a3(mdo sde): can las langs te/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ chos kyi dbyings nyid las langs te/ seng ge'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ seng ge'i rgyal po las langs te/ chos kyi rgyal
78a4(mdo sde): po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ chos kyi rgyal po las langs te/ bdud rnams kyi mtshan ma 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ bdud rnams kyi mtshan ma 'gog pa las
78a5(mdo sde): langs te/ stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'ju// stong pa nyid kyi shes rab las langs te/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ stong pa
78a6(mdo sde): nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa las langs te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las langs te/ gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus gzug
78a7(mdo sde): can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus gzugs can las langs te/ sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam
78a8(mdo sde): par rtog pa las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge
78b1(mdo sde): 'dzin las langs te/ rdo rje gtsug tor gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ rdo rje gtsug tor las langs te/ rgya mtsho thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ rgya mtsho thams cad las langs te/ gzungs
78b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ gzungs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho las langs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
78b3(mdo sde): spyod yul rgya mtsho las langs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par
78b4(mdo sde): grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgyu mtsho las langs te/ gdod thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin mtha' med pa'i rgya mtsho'i sbyor 'jug par bya'o// mtha' med mu med
78b5(mdo sde): pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgo nas blangs te/ yid 'gog pa dang / zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ yid 'gog pa dang zhi ba las langs te/ rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i rnam par grol ba chen
78b6(mdo sde): po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o// 'jam dpal nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las dad pa skad cig ma'i sems bskyed de/ mdo 'di yi ger
78b7(mdo sde): 'dri ba 'am/ klog pa 'am/ kha thon tu skad cig mar dran te/ bsam pa'i 'du shes dang / dran pa'i 'du shes dang / rtog pa'i 'du shes su dad pa'i sems grub na/ skad cig mar bskal pa bye ba
78b8(mdo sde): khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu'i gang ba'i bye ma snyed kyi 'khor ba'i sdig phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur ro// ma rig pa'i sgrib pa yang gtan bral bar 'gyur ro// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag
79a1(mdo sde): tu mtsho skyong zhing bzhes te/ mya ngan les mi 'da' bar mngon no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ yi dgas
79a2(mdo sde): mthu chen thams cad dang // dud 'gro glang po ma rungs dang // bud med g.ye ma dang ma rungs klu// dpag tu med pa'i ma rungs rnams// ba su dang ni ma skyes dgra// lha sbyin dang ni sor mo'i 'phreng // lus dang
79a3(mdo sde): sems kyis sdig spyad pas// dmyal ba mnar med ltung 'os kyang // phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la// dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal phyir// thub pa mya ngan 'da' ba'i khar// bskal pa grangs med phyir
79a4(mdo sde): bshol lo// ma ga d+ha'i skye bo dag/ kun kyang byang chub sem ngas skyed pa'ang // phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la// gus par phyag byas dbang gis so// ko'u di n+ya'i la sogs pa dang // 
79a5(mdo sde): nyan thos lnga brgya rnams dag gis// ma 'ongs dus su 'tshang rgya ba 'ang // phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la// gus par phyag byas dbang gis so// mu stegs dang ni bram ze dang // 
79a6(mdo sde): sngags 'chang chen po drang srong bcu// da ltar dgra bcom grub pa yang // 'das pa'i phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi// rgyal ba rnams la phyag byas yon// dam pa'i don la chad pa dang // phyogs bcu rgyal
79a7(mdo sde): ba'i zhing rnams na// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad// tshe dpag med par skyes pa yang // phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba lo// gus par phyag byas dbang gis so// rgyal bu dge mthong
79a8(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sngon nga rgyal po byed pa na// drang srong chen po sbyin zhes bya// de tshe sangs rgyas ma byung ste// bram ze lnga brgya rnam zhig la// kha zas dang ni gos rnams dang // khang khyim dang ni mal cha'i bar// 
79b1(mdo sde): lo grangs nyi shu chang bar du// rab tu byung ba'i mchod pa phul// ngas ni de tshe bsgo ba la// khyed rnams byang chub sems bskyed cig/ bram ze lnga brgya de dag gis/ mchod pa phul ba blangs kyis kyang / 
79b2(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum la ma dad pas// mod bzhin nga la slar smras pa// 'jig rten nang na byang chub dang // rnam par grol ba med do zhes// de skad smras pa ngas thos nas// mnyam nyid mdo sde bsrungs pa'i/ 
79b3(mdo sde): phyir bram ze lnga brgya'i srog bcad do// bram ze de dag tshe 'phos nas// dmyal ba mnar ming lhung bar 'gyur// sems can dmyal bar lhung nas su// dran pa rnam gsum g.yos nas kyang // dus
79b4(mdo sde): gsum rgyal la phyag byas so// mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde dang // byang chub dge 'dun dang skyed la// dran pa rnam gsum byas pas na// mod la dmyal nas byung ste dong // 'jig rten
79b5(mdo sde): zil dang ra rnga ru skyes// tshe ni bskal pa chung bcu thub/ de yang gus pa'i sems kyis su// phyogs bcu'i rgyal la phyag bya yon// bram ze de dag thams cad kyis// thog mar
79b6(mdo sde): skur bas dmyal lhung yang // phyis ni dad pas med la thar// byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams ni// khrel dang ldan pa smos ci dgos// sdig gi rang bzhin thog ma nas// med pas sems can
79b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi phyir// rtse ba bzhi po'i sdom pa dang // mtshams med lnga po'i sdig rnams kyang // log spyod bar du 'thol bshags so// so so'i skye bo la la zhig/ de lta bu'i sdig byas pa// de bzhin
79b8(mdo sde): 'thol 'tshangs byed nus na// rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams med lnga// log spyod par du sdig 'byung ste// sangs rgyas 'grub pa'ang gdon mi za// ma dad pa ni der ma gtogs// gang zhig dang pa'i sem
80a1(mdo sde): skyes te/ rgyal ba rnams la phyag byas na// chos lam mi 'grub mi srid do// de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang // mi sum stong po'i mi rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshig
