184b1(mdo sde): btsums par mi mngon no// 'di lta ste dper na/ phye ma'i phung po la mar ram/ 'bru mar ram/ chu zhugs na mi mngon pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe 'od zer de dag zhugs kyang phye ba 'am btsums
184b2(mdo sde): par mi mngon no// de nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa dang / pad+ma can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ 
184b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ 
184b4(mdo sde): bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya ba de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ theg pa gcig la/ 
184b5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ theg pa gcig la brtsams nas chos ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgya sa dag dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
184b6(mdo sde): kyi theg pa'i ming yang med sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rdzus te skye ba ma gtogs par bud med dang mngal na gnas te 'byung zhing skye bo'i sgra yang mi grag go// 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de
184b7(mdo sde): ngag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go// 'jig rten gyi khams de na bza' ba dang btung ba dang / zas kyi
184b8(mdo sde): bya ba yang mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas can dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba'i zas can dang / chos kyi dga' ba'i zas
185a1(mdo sde): can no// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi 'od kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams de khyab cing dri ma med par gyur pa ma gtogs par 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / 
185a2(mdo sde): skar ma dang gza' rnams kyi 'od kyang mi shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams de lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur pa las/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na rtswa dang / shing dang / bong pa dang / rtsig pa
185a3(mdo sde): dang / ri la sogs pa yang mi snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de 'dra ba de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba de'i ming thos pa
185a4(mdo sde): tsam gyis sems can gyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ ba zhig gnas te/ de 'od des reg ste bskul nas rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gash+ye
185a5(mdo sde): pa pad+ma'i spyan de ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcomaldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de ma
185a6(mdo sde): yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang 'od des reg ste bskul ba dang / rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan de ga la ba der song / 
185a7(mdo sde): te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ pad+ma'i snying po la so so ci rigs par 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams
185a8(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel ba stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad+ma'i snying po la gtsug nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i
185b1(mdo sde): spyan ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i 'od bzang po dri ma ma mchis pa rnam par dag pa yid
185b2(mdo sde): du mchis pa lus dang / sems shin tu dga' bar bgyid pa byung ba 'di su'i lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan des byang chub
185b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu nub phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
185b4(mdo sde): snyed 'das pa na/ mi mjed ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
185b5(mdo sde): zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom
185b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig bzhugs te/ 
185b7(mdo sde): des 'od bzang po dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa yid du 'ong ba lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa 'di phyung ngo de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
185b8(mdo sde): ba pad+ma'i spyan de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs
186a1(mdo sde): pa de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen
186a2(mdo sde): gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la
186a3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di ltar sems can su gang dag gis bdag mngon par rdzogs par
186a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pa'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog/ par shog shig ces smon lam btab bo// byang chub
186a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas ga/ sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'jig rten/ gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad phyir mi
186a6(mdo sde): ldog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan da / bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci
186a7(mdo sde): lags sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ma thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu thos so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i
186a8(mdo sde): ci'i slad du phyir mi ldog pa ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni phyir mi ldog pa'ang yin la/ phyir mi ldog pa'ang ma yin no// 
186b1(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang de lta bur de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa yang lags la/ phyir mi ldog pa yang ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs
186b2(mdo sde): kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pas sems can de dag gi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon skyes pa mthong nas sems can de dag phyir mi ldog par lung ston to// mtshan thos pa
186b3(mdo sde): kho nas de ma thag du de dag phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yang ma yin te/ de bas na rigs kyi bu don de nyid rab tu grub par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bshad do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper
186b4(mdo sde): na shing la la'i sa bon gyi rnam pa zhig yod de/ sa bon de la sa bon gyi nyes pa thams cad med pa/ myu gu skye rab nas rdzogs pa'i bar du rkyen rnams yod na/ rigs kyi
186b5(mdo sde): bu sa bon de la ji skad ces bya/ gsol pa/ bcom lnga na 'das nyes pa thams cad dang bral bas na/ de/ ni yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'o// bka' stsal pa/ 
186b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon yod pa'i sems can rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
186b7(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa
186b8(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de lta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/ 
187a1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la yang phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / btsun par bgyi ba dang / ri mor
187a2(mdo sde): bgyi ba dang / bkur bsti bgyi ba dang / mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan des/ byang chub sems
187a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyod song shig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
187a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan de la/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
187a5(mdo sde): khams de blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe/ gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang / sa rgyas shAkya thub pa de la yang phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen
187a6(mdo sde): bkur bgyi ba dang / btsun par bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyi ba dang / bkur bsti bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba'i slad du mtsho'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
187a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa bda'i spyan des/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyed deng shig/ 'jig rten gyi khams der
187a8(mdo sde): bag yod par gnas par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag ni/ rab tu 'dod chags mang gzhe sdang mang ba/ gti mug mang ba/ dge
187b1(mdo sde): sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ phar mi 'dzin pa/ mar mi 'dzin pa/ chos ma yin pa 'dod pa mang ba/ brlang ba/ gtum pa/ zhe gcod pa/ mu tshor smra ba/ pho theg can/ g.yengs
187b2(mdo sde): pa brkam pa/ le lo can/ tshul khrims 'chal pa/ sdig pa'i chos can/ phra dog dang / ser snas yongs su dkris pa/ nyon mongs pa du mas nye bar nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams te
187b3(mdo sde): sems can de 'dra ba de dag gi nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi
187b4(mdo sde): nang na chos ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dka'/ ba mdzad pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das desabaka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin
187b5(mdo sde): te gang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dga' ba mdzad pa yin no// rigs kyi bu dag gang de lta bur kun nas
187b6(mdo sde): nyon mongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ dge ba'i sems gcig tsam bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang dka' ba byed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang yongs su
187b7(mdo sde): dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can yongs su dag pa yod pa lta ci 'tshal gyi/ gang dag de ltar kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na se gol
187b8(mdo sde): gtogs pa srid du yang dad pa rnyed pa dang / se gol gtogs pa srid du yang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / chos la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dge 'dun la skyabasu 'gro
188a1(mdo sde): ba dang / se gol gtogs pa srid du yang tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ste/ spyod pa 'di ni ches ngo mtshar to// de bas kyang gang dag se gol gtogs pa srid du yang
188a2(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa'i sems yang dag par bzung ste gnas pa 'di ni ches ngo mtshar te// de bas kyang gang dag se gol gtogs pa srid du yang snying rje ba'i sems nye bar bzhag
188a3(mdo sde): ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni ches ngo mtshar to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar
188a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes
188a5(mdo sde): gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das de las 'di lta bu 'thun pa'i rjes su bstan pa de mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ rang rang gi
188a6(mdo sde): gnas nas dong ngo // dong nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i phyir/ la las ni rin po che'i shing me tog dang bcas pa/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa/ chu zhing du ldan pa rnams
188a7(mdo sde): mngon par sprul/ la las ni bai DUR+Ya'i shing rnams/ la las ni shel gyi shing rnams/ la las ni dpag bsams kyi shing rnams/ la las ni gser gyi shing rnams/ la las ni me tog
188a8(mdo sde): gi shing rnams/ la las ni 'bras bu'i shing rnams/ la las ni gos kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni rgyan gyi sprin rnams/ la las ni spos kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni 'phreng ba'i sprin rnams
188b1(mdo sde): la las ni phye ma'i sprin rnams/ la las ni gdugs kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni rgyal mtshan gyi sprin rnams/ la las ni sil snyan gyi sprin rnams mngon par sprul to// mngon par sprul nas gcig
188b2(mdo sde): tu 'dus te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang lhan cig tu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga la der dong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa'
188b3(mdo sde): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma'o grogs po dag mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngal/ 
188b4(mdo sde): lo// de bas na gang gis sems can de dag thams cad bde ba mchog gi bstabs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba legs par mngon par bya'o// byang
188b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de kun gyis legs so zhes smras nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par se la pa'i ltar mnyan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa
188b6(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par sel bas/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par byas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i lus las 'od dang ba dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa
188b7(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa byung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab cing snang bar gyur pa dang / gang stong gsum gyi stong chen
188b8(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus su gnas pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i lus su gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lus su gnas pa de
189a1(mdo sde): dag 'od des reg nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang bral te/ bde zhing khro ba dang / gnod sems dang yang bral te/ phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur pa dang / yang
189a2(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ 'jig rten gyi bar mun pa mun gshang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa/ 
189a3(mdo sde): 'di dag gis kyang lam ma lhan ne lhang nger ma gyur pa/ de dag kyang 'od des khyab nas snang bar gyur te/ gang der skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang gcig gis gcig mthong ba dang / stong gsum gyi
189a4(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gang khor yug gi/ ri rnams dang / khor yug gi ri chen po rnams dang / ri/ btang zung dang / ri btang zung chen po rnams dang / de ma yin
189a5(mdo sde): pa'i ri nag po gzhan de dag kyang 'od des khyab ste/ snang bar gyur pa dang / slar ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad/ 'og tu ni mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po yan chad/ de'i
189a6(mdo sde): bar du gang 'od des snang bar ma byas pa'i sa phyogs de gang yang med pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phral mngon par bya ba mngon par byaso// de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang ji lta bu'i rdza
189a7(mdo sde): 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas pas/ zas 'dod pa'i sems can rnams ni zas thob/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams ni btung ba/ gos 'dod pa rnams ni gos/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams
189a8(mdo sde): ni bzhon pa/ nor 'dod pa rnams ni nor thob/ long ba rnams ni mig thob/ 'on pa rnams ni sgra thos/ sgren mo rnams ni gos can du gyur/ myos pa rnams ni dran pa thob/ sdug bsngal ba
189b1(mdo sde): rnams ni bde bar gyur/ sbrum pa rnams ni bde bar btsas pa/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so// de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de
189b2(mdo sde): dag thams cad yul ga ya dang / ga yang mgo'i rig la ba der nye ba dang / skyes bu dam pa de dag nye bar gyur ma thag du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i dra bas khebs
189b3(mdo sde): par kun tu snang ngo // steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i pad+ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo// lha'i me tog gi sprin rnams dang / lha'i shing tog gi sprin rnams/ lha'i 'phreng ba'i sprin rnams dang / 
189b4(mdo sde): lha'i spos kyi sprin rnams dang / lha'i gos kyi sprin rnams dang / da lha'i phye ma'i sprin rnams dang / lha'i chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi sprin gyi char
189b5(mdo sde): mngon par rab tu bab bo// de dag mngon par rab tu bab pas sems can gang la reg pa de thams cad rab tu bde bar gyur/ yul ga la dang / ga ya mgo'i ri la/ shing tha ma la
189b6(mdo sde): pa dang / sa phyogs tha mal pa gang yod pa de dag thams cad kyang med par snang ngo // sa phyogs de dag na rin po che'i shing rnams dang / dpag bsams kyi shing rnams dang / me tog gi shing rnams
189b7(mdo sde): dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnams dang / tsan dan gyi shing rnams dang / a ga ru'i shing rnams kun tu snang ste/ de dag kun tu bzang por 'dug par gyur to// bar snang na lha'i sil snyan dag sgra 'byin
189b8(mdo sde): cing / sil snyan de dag las 'di lta bu'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo // lum pa'i tshal rab mchog tu gang skyes pa// mnyam med gzhar yang nyon mongs dbang mi 'gyur// nam mkha'
190a1(mdo sde): mtshungs mnyam de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// byang chub mchog sus byang chub shing rab drung // bdud kyi sde stobs bcom nas
190a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pa// dri med gzi ldan de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// chos tshul 'di dag sgyu ma smig rgyu dang // chu zla 'dra bar gang gis rtogs gyur pa// bsod nams
190a3(mdo sde): zhing rab de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// chos rnams sna tshogs 'ja' dang 'dra ba dang // gar la lta 'drar gang gis rab rtogs pa// mi g.yo bsod nams gter/ 
190a4(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// gang gis bskal pa brgya phrag mang porani// thugs rje'i thugs kyis tshogs kun rdzogs mdzad pa// 
190a5(mdo sde): dri med zla zhal de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya mang dang // lha'i tshogs kyis de bzhin gang mchod pa// gti
190a6(mdo sde): mug mun bral de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// gang gi mchog gis chos kyi gter brnyes shing // thugs rje nyid kyis 'jig rten dag la btang // mnyam
190a7(mdo sde): med phan mdzad de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// gang zhig thugs zhi rtag par byams pa'i yid// pad+ma chus ltar nyon mongs ma gos pa// yon tan mchog
190a8(mdo sde): rab mnga' la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// mtshan kyi me tog rgyas pa yongs su dag pa'i sku// dpe byad bzang po'i 'bru chags 'gro ba'i tsho ba gang // yal ga
190b1(mdo sde): mtha' yas rin chen shing la phyag 'tshal du// bdag cag thams cad lhan cig mchod pa thogs te lhags// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ma thag du// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu
190b2(mdo sde): chen po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
190b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngon ma thos sngon ma mthong ba'i snga ltas gda' ba 'di dag su'i lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis cha dang
190b4(mdo sde): ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u dgal gyi bu shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
190b5(mdo sde): snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya
190b6(mdo sde): ba da ltar bzhugaso// 'tsho'i gzhes so// chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
190b7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang skye bu dam pa de nyid dang lhan cig tu/ mi mjed
190b8(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs pa de dag gi snga ltas 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad
191a1(mdo sde): rnam par sel ba/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
191a2(mdo sde): mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
191a3(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod to// grags chen shes rab chen po pa// thub chen dpa' ba chen po pa// srid pa'i
191a4(mdo sde): mya ngan rgal ba po// nyon mongs rgal la phyag 'tshal lo// / thams cad du yang tha le ste// kun nas rab tu lhan ner rab zhugs// kun nas rnam par grol ba po// phyag 'tshal mi mtshungs
191a5(mdo sde): mtshungs med la// rab tu mi skul ri bo bzhin// gting tshod yang ba rgya mtsho 'dra// mu stegs kun nas mi bskyod/ pa// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
191a6(mdo sde): ba nas bzod nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa// rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa yin// chos rnams mgon po khyod kyis bstan// la la la na lam yang bstan// la la yang dag nyid bkod// la la yang
191a7(mdo sde): dag mya ngan bzlas// la la byang chub lung yang bstan// bag la nyal dang bsam pa mkhyen// khyod kyis mi mkhyen ci yang med// de phyir 'dul ba'i bya ba rnams// gzigs pas khyod kyi bka'
191a8(mdo sde): 'grub bo// byang chub snying por bzhugs pa na// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // dri ma sna tshogs gzhan rnams kyang // khyod kyi ye shes me yis bsregs// rgal nas sems can rnam sgrol
191b1(mdo sde): zhing // grol nas skye dgu grol mdzad de// srid pa'i mya ngan 'khyams pa yi// 'jig rten tshol ba khyod lags so// srid pa'i btson rar sems can dag/ yun ring mi shes gnyid log rnams// 
191b2(mdo sde): sad par mdzad pa mgon po khyod// gnyen gyur khyod la phyag 'tshalo// khyod kyi sras mchog 'di dag kyang // thams cad byang chub slad du zhugs// dam pa'i chos ni nyan 'tshal na// 'dren pas
191b3(mdo sde): de dag bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par
191b4(mdo sde): bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ pad+ma'i snying na dpo la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas
191b5(mdo sde): pad+ma'i snying po la so so ci rigs par 'khod do// de nasabyang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig du bzar
191b6(mdo sde): nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad+ma'i snying po la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btung te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal
191b7(mdo sde): te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
191b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
192a1(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rtag tu skabs phyes/ de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang / 
192a2(mdo sde): de nyid du lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
192a3(mdo sde): bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na tshul khrims phun sum chog
192a4(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa de rnams lags/ ji ltar na brtson 'grus phun sum chog das pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan phun sum
192a5(mdo sde): tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na shes rab phun sum chog/ sa pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na thabs mkhas pa rnam sa lags/ ji ltar na smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams
192a6(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sa dang mtshungs pa
192a7(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ji ltar na chu dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na me dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na rlung mar dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na na mkha' dang mtshungs
192a8(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na zla ba dang lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na nyi ma dang mtshungs pa lta bu lags/ ji ltar na seng ge lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na dul ba rnams lags/ ji
192b1(mdo sde): ltar na cang shes pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na pad+ma lta bu rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na sems rnam par dag pa rnams
192b2(mdo sde): lags ji ltar na sems nem nur ma mchis pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na blo zhib pa rnams lags/ bcom
192b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji ltar na grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji ltar na rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams
192b4(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na sems can thams cad mgu bar byedadapa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'ad/ sa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshig bzung ba rnams
192b5(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dang/ 'chos rjod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na chos kyi rjesu 'brang ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na chos kyi dbyings la mkhas
192b6(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na smon lam la
192b7(mdo sde): gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/ ji ltar na snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/ ji ltar na dga' ba la gnas pa
192b8(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ji ltar na btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams lags/ ji ltar
193a1(mdo sde): na mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na tshe rabs dran pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na
193a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
193a3(mdo sde): pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob par 'gyur/ ji ltar na lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon rnams lags/ ji ltar na lam la mkhas pa/ 
193a4(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ji ltar na lam ma log par ston pa rnams/ lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems// dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems mnyam par
193a5(mdo sde): bzhag pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na chos gos gsum pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na phying ba
193a6(mdo sde): can rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na stan gcig pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na zas phyis mi len pa rnams lag/ 
193a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na shing drung ba rnams lags/ dza ltar \u0f88\u0f90 na med rnams pag gang ltar dur rjod pa dam pa ga/ ji ltar na cog pu pa rnams lags
193a8(mdo sde): ji ltar na gzhi ji bzhin pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'dul ba
193b1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na cho ga dang spyod yul dang spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na ser sna dang phra dog dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na sems can thams cad la sems
193b2(mdo sde): snyoms pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bgyid mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na nga rgyal bcom pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na dad pa mang ba rnams lags/ 
193b3(mdo sde): ji ltar na kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na don dam pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na bdag shes pa
193b4(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'jig rten shes pa rnams lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye/ ji ltar na mngal gyi dri
193b5(mdo sde): mas ma gos par skye/ ji ltar na khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na yid yongs su mi skyo ba
193b6(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin bgyid pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer ma mchis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na mang du thos pa
193b7(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ji ltar na dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams lags/ ji ltar na brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong bas
193b8(mdo sde): bsu ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba 'tshal ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i chog 'tshal ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na
194a1(mdo sde): des pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'grogs pa bde ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na tshul du shis pa rnams lags
194a2(mdo sde): ji ltar na gnas bca' ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na bsod nams bgyi ba la brtson pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na sprul pa la mkhas
194a3(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
194a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la da'adi skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu leg so legs so// 
194a5(mdo sde): yang rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / 
194a6(mdo sde): phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod 'di lta bu'i don 'dri bar sems pa legs so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig
194a7(mdo sde): dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
194a8(mdo sde): kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos kyi sbyin pa pun
194b1(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun
194b2(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshigs pa
194b3(mdo sde): rnams yin/ mchod pa dang rim gro'o sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa
194b4(mdo sde): rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub se// mas dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa/ yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' zang zing
194b5(mdo sde): med pa'i sems kyis chos rnams 'dzin cing / kun chub par byed de/ rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti'i phyir ma yin/ shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin/ grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir
194b6(mdo sde): ma yin te/ gzhan du na de 'di ltar sems can 'di dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad ji ltar zad par bya snyam ste/ chos de dag kyang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis gnyis su med par gzhan
194b7(mdo sde): dag la yang yang dag par ston to// ji ltar rgyal po 'am blon po la yang dag par ston pa de ltar gdol pa 'am/ gdol pa la yang yang dag par ston na/ de ma yin pa grong rdal gyi mi dang / 
194b8(mdo sde): yul gyi mi gzhan dag la lta ci smos/ chos kyi sbyin pa des khengs par yang mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji
195a1(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis dbyig pa bor ba
195a2(mdo sde): dang / mtshon cha bor ba yin te/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la gzhog go/ de sems can thams cad la phar 'du shes pa yin/ mar 'du shes pa yin bur 'du shes pa yin/ rtsa
195a3(mdo sde): lag du 'du shes pa yin/ nye du 'am/ snag gi gnyen mtshams dag kyang rung bar 'du shes pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang skye ba 'pho ba
195a4(mdo sde): de dang de dag du/ sems can gyi ris su gang khyed kyi pha 'am/ da ma 'am/ bu 'am/ rtsa lag gam/ nye du 'am/ snag/ gi gnyen mtshams gang yang rung ba'i gnas su ma gyur
195a5(mdo sde): pa'i sems can de la bu med do zhes gsungaso snyam nas/ de srog chags su gyur pa phra mo'i phyir yang bdag gis sha dag gis kyang phan 'dogs pa na/ srog chags chen po
195a6(mdo sde): che ba gzhan dag la lta ci smos te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs
195a7(mdo sde): ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang dag mi dge ba'i las rab tu byed pa mthong na/ de dag zang zing gis sdud cing zang zing gis bsdus nas mi dge ba'i
195a8(mdo sde): gnas de nas blangs te dge ba'i gnas su 'god do// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub bo// byang chub sems
195b1(mdo sde): dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ mi dge ba'i chos phrag dog dang ser sna dang / ngan sems gsum spangs pa yin no zhes gsungs te/ de bas na bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab cing
195b2(mdo sde): sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o snyam ste/ de sbyin pa yang sbyin zhing sbyin pa des khengs par yang mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar
195b3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' la lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa yang / 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa mi sbyin/ phan
195b4(mdo sde): 'dogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/ don gyi phyir ma yin/ g.yog gi phyir ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi tshul gyi phyir ma yin dgyi gzhan du na 'di snyam du sems te/ gang byang chub sems
195b5(mdo sde): dpa' sbyin pa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur ba 'di ni chos nyid yin// snyam ste de rgyu de dang rkyen de dang / gzhi des phan bta gas pa'i lan du phan 'dogs pa thams cad la mi re
195b6(mdo sde): bar sbyin pa/ sbyin par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' len du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje ba'i
195b7(mdo sde): sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can sdug bsngal ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / gcer bu dang / gos ngan pa dang / bgo ba ngan pa dang / 
195b8(mdo sde): mgon med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / rten med pa lta bu bsod nams med pa dag mthong mthong na/ de dag la snying rje ba'i sems rab tu
196a1(mdo sde): skyed cing de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can gang dag gi phyir/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag
196a2(mdo sde): ni sdug bsngal ba mgon med pa/ dpung gnyen med pa/ skyabs med pa/ gnas med pa/ rten med pa 'di dag yin te/ kun tu 'khyam na nam zhig bdag sems can de dag gi mgon dang / 
196a3(mdo sde): dpung gnyen dang / skyabs dang / gnas dang / rten du 'gyur snyam nas/ de snying rjes rab tu mi zad de/ bdog cing yod pa'i dngos pos sems can de dag la phan 'dog so// phan btags
196a4(mdo sde): ba'i mod la skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des kyang / khengs par dmi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dasnying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na
196a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rmyi/ na ba sbyin pa ni// bor ba'i sbyin pa mi sbyin/ brnyas shing sbyin pa
196a6(mdo sde): mo sbyin/ gshe zhing sbyin pa mi sbyin/ skyon spangs shing sbyin pa mi sbyin/ phyug pas rgyags shing dregs te sbyin pa mo sbyin/ grags pa 'dod cing sbyin pa mi sbyin/ mang du thos pas rgyags
196a7(mdo sde): shing dregs pas sbyin pa mi sbyin gyi/ ci sbyin pa de yang bsti stang du byas shing / sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// btsun par byas shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de// ri mor byas te mchod cing / 
196a8(mdo sde): rang gi lag nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyes pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ste stang gi sbyin pa
196b1(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon dang / mkhan po dang / bla ma lta bu dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag mthong na/ lus kyis gus pa dang bcas pa yin/ 
196b2(mdo sde): sems kyis ri mo dang bcas pa yin te/ des gus pa skyed ri mo bskyes nas gus par smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsdu ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / gdud pa'i las dag byed do// de dag
196b3(mdo sde): gis dge ba dang ldan pa'i bya ba de dang de dag la'ang grogs su 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
196b4(mdo sde): mchod pa dang ri gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhedan/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la bya ba de dag byed de/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas
196b5(mdo sde): la bya ba dag byed ce na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'i sku gzugs la spos sam/ me tog gam/ gdug pa'i
196b6(mdo sde): phyag pa 'am/ skyang nul lam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa dag gis te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas la bya ba dag byed do// ji ltar na chos la bya ba dag byed ce na/ de
196b7(mdo sde): chos nyan to 'chang ngo // klog go// yi ger 'dri'o// kha thon byed do// kun chub par byed do// sems so// ma log par bsgom pa'i sbyor bar goms par byed de/ de ltar na chos la bya ba dag byed
196b8(mdo sde): do ji ltar na dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed ce na/ chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / tha na chu grang mo phor gang tsam yang dge
197a1(mdo sde): 'dun la 'bul te/ de lta na dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed de/ de lta na byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang
197a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa 'dis/ bdag lha 'am/ lha la la zhig tu shog shig ce 'am/ 
197a3(mdo sde): rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po la la zhig tu shog shig ces de ltar sems mi bskyed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na/ 
197a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum chog sa pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sem das dpa' sbyin pa 'di dag ji skad du bshad pa la so sor
197a5(mdo sde): rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ de sbyin pa tsa dang ci sbyin yang / sbyin pa de dang de la so sor rtogs pa'i rang bzhin can yin no// de de ltar so sor rtog pa la gang 'di sbyin pa'i
197a6(mdo sde): nyes pa dang sbyin pa'i dri ma dang / sbyin pa'i bar du gcod pa de dag mi 'byung ste/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu
197a7(mdo sde): chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams
197a8(mdo sde): yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa rnams yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi
197b1(mdo sde): yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ las kyi 'jigs pa rnams yin/ kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa rnams yin/ 'jigs par
197b2(mdo sde): lta ba rnams yin/ yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa rnams yin/ mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims pa rnams yin/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de
197b3(mdo sde): la ji lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa rnams yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas/ mdo sde 'am/ 'dul ba 'am
197b4(mdo sde): gnas gang yang rung ba la la ngag tu bslab pa'i gzhi 'di dag gang bcas pa de dag ston pas bstan pa'o snyam du bsam das te/ gnas de dang de dag la shin tu legs par slobs kyi
197b5(mdo sde): rigs la 'dod chags pas ma yin/ lta ba la 'dod chags pas/ ma yin/ 'khor la 'dod chags pas ma yin/ gang zag gi skyon gyi phyir bslab pa'i gzhi de dang de dag la
197b6(mdo sde): ri mo byed pa ma yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdam
197b7(mdo sde): pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du so sor thar pa'i sdom pa tsam gyis ni/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
197b8(mdo sde): mi nus kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde de dang de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par spyad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas 'di dag gang bcas pa de dag la
198a1(mdo sde): bdag gis bslab par bya'o zhes rnam par dpyod do// byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par spyad pa de dag ni gang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas de rnams kyang gang zhe na/ 
198a2(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang gi phyir de la sems can rnams dad par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma yin par mi spyod/ dus ma yin par mi spyod/ yul ma yin par mi spod/ dus ma yin par mi smra ba yin// 
198a3(mdo sde): dus mi shes pa ma yin/ yul mi shes pa ma yin/ tshod mi shes pa ma yin te/ de sems can rje su srung ba dang / bdag gi byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ spyod lam phun
198a4(mdo sde): sum tshogs shing 'jam par smra ba dang / dal bus smra ba dang / da'ang 'dzi mi mang ba dang / rab tu dben pa la mngon par phyogs pa dang / bzhin gyi mdangs rab tu dang ba yin te/ de
198a5(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' cho ga phun sum tshogs pa yin/ no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin
198a6(mdo sde): gshegs pas mdo sde de dang de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'di dag gang bcas pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi de dag la gus par byed pa yin/ brtson par byed pa yin te/ de
198a7(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba
198a8(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdung ba 'am/ zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba 'am/ gti mug gi yongs su gdung ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa'i yongs su
198b1(mdo sde): gdung ba gang yang rung ba la la 'am/ yo byad kyis phongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba gang yang rung ba la las yongs su gdung ba gang yang rung ba la las yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur te/ 'dod chags kyi
198b2(mdo sde): gnyen po la rten cing / 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong ngo // 'dod chags kyi gnyen po de ni gang / 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen de dag ni gang zhe na/ mi sdug pa bsgom pa ni 'dod
198b3(mdo sde): chags kyi gnyen po'o// yul gyi bzang mo ni 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen to// mi sdug pa bsgom pa de gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / so dang / rdul dang / dri ma
198b4(mdo sde): dang / lpags pa dang / sha dang / rus pa dang / rgyus pa dang / rtsa dang / mkhal ma dang / snying dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / pho ba dang / sul mangs
198b5(mdo sde): dang / long ka dang / lgang ba dang / mcher pa dang / phyi sa dang / mchil ma dang / rdul dang / snabs dang / ngang snabs dang / zhag dang / chu ser dang / rkang dang / tshil dang / 
198b6(mdo sde): mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / klad pe dang / klad rgyas dang / gcin dag yod de/ dngos po de dag la byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rtogs pa'i rang bzhin can
198b7(mdo sde): yin te/ yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can de 'di snyam du/ byis pa blun po mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa de yang dngos po 'di dag shes nas/ 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed na/ shes
198b8(mdo sde): rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi sdug pa bsgom pa yang mang ba yin no// yul gyi bzang mo de gang zhe na/ 'di la
199a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas chags par 'gyur ba'i bud med kyi gzugs bzang ba yid du 'ong ba/ mdzes pa mig tu sdug pa sems 'phrog pa mthong yang des de lta bu dag
199a2(mdo sde): mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su rtog ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi kyang yul ni rmi lam dang 'dra ba dag ste/ byung nas med par 'gyur ba yin na/ mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig rmi lam lta bu'i
199a3(mdo sde): yul dag la 'dod chags skyed par byed ces gsungs so snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la sten cing / 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong
199a4(mdo sde): ngo/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi gnyen po de la sten cing / zhe sdang skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la
199a5(mdo sde): byams pa mang ba yin te/ de gzhi gang dang rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis khro zhing gnod sems su 'gyur ba dang // khon du 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dag dang rkyen de dag yongs
199a6(mdo sde): su spong ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi gnyen po la sten cing / zhe sdang skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi gnyen
199a7(mdo sde): po la sten cing / gti mug skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong zhe na/ de de ltar yongs su rtog pas gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gti mug dang bral bas 'dod pa ma 'byor tam po
199a8(mdo sde): byad ma 'byor kyang yongs su yi chad pa med de/ de lta na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul
199b1(mdo sde): bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gcig po lkog tu song ste/ rab tu dben pa na gnas shing 'di ltar bdag ma 'dres par gnas pa ste/ bdag
199b2(mdo sde): ni rab tu dben pa na 'dug pa'o// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la zhugs pa'o// dge sbyong ma bram ze gzhan dag ni kun kyang 'dres par gnas pa 'du 'dzi mang ba/ de bzhin gshegs
199b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dul ba las nyams pa'o snyam du sems mi skyed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
199b4(mdo sde): las kyis 'jigs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / dge slong rnams bsod nams dag gus par bya'o// tshul khrims gus
199b5(mdo sde): par bsrung ngo // shes rab gus par sgom mo// de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ bsod nams gus par byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ 'dod pa dang 'thad pa dang / dga' ba dang yid du
199b6(mdo sde): 'ong bar nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so snyam du dpyod do// de de ltar mngon par yid ches pas mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na las kyis
199b7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba phra mo tsam dag la'ang 'jigs par lta zhing / sdig
199b8(mdo sde): pa chung ngu yang khyad du mi gsod pa yin te/ 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / dge slong rnams dug chung ngus kyang skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams dug chen pos kyang
200a1(mdo sde): skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sdig pa chung ngus kyang ngan song rnams su phyin par byed do// sdig pa chen pos kyang ngan song rnamasu phyin par byed do zhes
200a2(mdo sde): gsungs so snyam du sems so// de de ltar yongs su rtogs pas kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub
200a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'jigs par lta ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis yid brtan du rung ba yin te/ bram ze
200a4(mdo sde): dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu gnyis su med pa la 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / 
200a5(mdo sde): DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru la sogs pa nor dang / yo byad kyi rnam pa dag 'dems kyang / de la/ byang chub sems dpa' brnab sems kyang mi bskyed do// 
200a6(mdo sde): gal te byang chub sems dpa' mchod rten gyi 'am/ dge 'dun gyi dngos po'i phyir las su bskos na yang / dngos po des kyang nye bar mi 'tsho ste/ de 'di snyam du sems shing bcom ldan
200a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpas ni bdag gi lus las sha zos kyang bla'i/ gzhan gyi zas sam sgom 'am/ yo byad kyi rnam pa gang ci yang rung ba dag ma byin la ma gnang bar spyad
200a8(mdo sde): pa ni mi rung ngo zhes gsungs so snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs par lta ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin zhe na/ 
200b1(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyis lha rnams kyis gtses sam/ nor dang 'khrig pa'i yan lag gis brjod kyang mi g.yo mi 'gyur zhing nyams par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na
200b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims srung na
200b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims 'dis bdag lhar shog shig ce 'am/ lha la lar shog shig ce 'am/ rgyal por shog shig ce 'am/ rgyal po la lar shog shig ces sems mi skyed do// de ltar na byang chub
200b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims pa yin no// / rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims pa yin zhe na/ 'di
200b5(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin// ngag dang yid kyis yongs su dag pa yin te/ ji lta/ ra na lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ de gang lus kyi
200b6(mdo sde): nang du spyod pa 'di dag thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ lus kyi ngan du spyod pa de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par
200b7(mdo sde): g.yem pa ste/ de ltar na lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin no// ji ltar na ngag gis yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ de gang 'di dag ngag gi ngan du spyod pa dag thams cad du thams cad yongs su
200b8(mdo sde): spong ste/ ngag gis ngan du spyod pa de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig kyal ba ste/ de ltar na ngag gis yongs su dag pa yin no// ji ltar
201a1(mdo sde): na yid kyis yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ de gang 'di dag yid kyi ngan du spyod pa de dag thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ yid kyi ngan du spyod pa de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 
201a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'o// de ltar na yid kyis yongs su dag pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag
201a3(mdo sde): pa'i tshul khrims can yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang
201a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams mi na no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang gi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ phyi'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa
201a5(mdo sde): rnams yin/ chos kyi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum// tshogs pa rnams yin/ nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun
201a6(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tha dad pa med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ dgos pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i
201a7(mdo sde): bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ dam bcas pa nyams su lon par byed pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// 
201a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nang gi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag nang gi mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa/ 
201b1(mdo sde): dang sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa de dag bzod cing dang du len la yongs su yi mi 'chad de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nang gi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// 
201b2(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ma las smos pa 'am/ pha las smos pa 'am/ nye du las smos pa 'am/ mkhan
201b3(mdo sde): po las smos pa 'am/ slob dpon las smos pa'i tshig gi lam ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du smra ba pha rol las thos sam/ sangs rgyas sam/ chos sam/ dge 'dun la mi snyan par
201b4(mdo sde): brjod pa thos na/ mi khro zhing gnod par mi sems la/ khon tu mi 'dzin te/ de bzod cing dang du len la// / gnod sems mi mang ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sem
201b5(mdo sde): dpa' phyi'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di
201b6(mdo sde): dag mdo sde zab mo zab mo dag las de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa rgyun chad pa/ mtshams sbyor ba las rnam par grol ba bsdur med pa/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad thog
201b7(mdo sde): ma nas zhi ba'o// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes bstan pa de dag thos kyang mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur te/ de 'di ltar chos 'di dag ma shes/ 
201b8(mdo sde): sam ma thos par ni/ bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so snyam du sems te/ de'i phyir gang chos de dag 'dzin pa dang / 
202a1(mdo sde): sems pa dang / sgom pa dang yongs su rtog pa dang / mos pa 'di ni chos kyi bzod pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi bzod pa phun sum
202a2(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khro ba'i bsam pa skyes sam/ gnod
202a3(mdo sde): sems kyi bsam pa skyes na/ 'di ltar khro ba 'di gang nas byung gang du 'gag/ gang la 'byung zhing ji ltar 'byung / ci'i don tu 'byung zhes yongs su rtog ste/ des de ltar yongs su brtags na// 
202a4(mdo sde): khro ba'i skye ba 'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'gag/ pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gang la skye ba de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ji ltar skye ba de'ang
202a5(mdo sde): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rkyen gang gis skye ba'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de de'i phyir ba zod cing dang du len la/ kun nas ldang ba mi mang ba yin te/ 
202a6(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nye tshe ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa
202a7(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni nyin par bzod la/ mtshan mo mi bzod pa 'am/ mtshan mo bzod la nyin par mi bzod pa 'am/ bdag gi yul na bzod la gzhan gyi yul na mi
202a8(mdo sde): bzod pa 'am/ gzhan gyi yul na bzod la bdag gi yul na mi bzod pa 'am/ bshes pa la bzod la mi bshes pa la mi bzod pa 'am/ mi bshes pa la bzod la bshes pa
202b1(mdo sde): la mi bzod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dus thams cad du'ang bzod/ yul thams cad du'ang bzod/ thams cad la'ang bzod pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba
202b2(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tha dad pa med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ba dang ma dang // 
202b3(mdo sde): bla ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang / nye du 'am/ snag gi gnyen mtshams la bzod la/ gzhan la mi bzod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na gdol pa gzhon nu yan
202b4(mdo sde): chad la'ang bzod de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' / dad pa med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgos pa la mi lta ba'i
202b5(mdo sde): bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chubab sems dpa' don gyi phyir bzod pa ma yin/ 'jig sa pa'i phyir ma yin/ phan thogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin// 
202b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis ma yin/ ngo tsha bas bzod pa ma yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par yang bzod pa mang ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgos pa la mi lta
202b7(mdo sde): ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nam de
202b8(mdo sde): la khro ba skye ba'i rkyen gang gis zil gyis non na khu tshur gyis 'chog par 'gyur ba 'am/ thal mos 'tshog par 'gyur ba 'am/ dbyig pas rdeg par 'gyur ba dang / mtshon gyis
203a1(mdo sde): / 'debs par 'gyur ba 'am/ mi gtsigs pa'i tshig gis ngan du brjod pa de lta bu'i rkyen ma byung gi bar du bzod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te la la
203a2(mdo sde): zhig brdegs sam bajigs sam/ spyos sam brgyan na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bdag nyid kyis las 'di dag byas te/ bdag nyid la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// mas ma byas
203a3(mdo sde): phas ma byas nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams gang yang rung ba dag gis ma byas te/ las 'di dag bdag nyid kyis byas pas/ de'i phyir bdag nyid la rnam par smin par 'gyur gyi/ phyi rol gyi
203a4(mdo sde): sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams da la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nang gi
203a5(mdo sde): sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ de bzhin du/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi kham sa la rnam par smin par mi 'gyuraro// snyam du sems
203a6(mdo sde): gzhag par bya'o// de de ltar ma log par rtogs pas de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis rnam par dkrugs par kyang bzod / rnam par ma dkrugs kyang bzod de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
203a7(mdo sde): rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po/ 
203a8(mdo sde): 'am/ blon po chen po phyug cing nor mang po longs spyod che ba/ sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi bdag por gyur la/ de la sems can de dag gis mi snyan par brjod kyang rung / 
203b1(mdo sde): bkyil kyang rung gtses kyang rung ste/ mi khro zhing gnod sems su mi byed la/ bdag por gyur pa lta bur mi ston gyi/ gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems can 'di dag ni bdag nyid kyis bzung ba ste/ 
203b2(mdo sde): sems can 'di dag ni bdag nyid kyis yongs su bskyang bar bya ba yin la/ de ltar yongs su srung ba na brlag par bya ba ni bdag gi mi cha'o zhes de de'i phyir snying rje'i sems nye bar bzhag ste/ bzod
203b3(mdo sde): cing dang du len la gnod sems mi mang ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam bcas/ 
203b4(mdo sde): pa nyams su lon par byed pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
203b5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdze na par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i
203b6(mdo sde): 'dam du bying ba'i sems can rnams bsgral bar bgyi'o zhes seng ge'i sgra bsgrags kyis de ltar sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can
203b7(mdo sde): thams cad dul ba dang zhi ba la rab tu dgod par brtson pa la bdag nyid khro ba mang ba dang / gnod sems mang ba dang / mi bzod pa mang ba dang / phog snya med pa ni bdag gi mi cha'o snyam du
203b8(mdo sde): sems so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sman pa thur ma can zhig yod la/ sems can rnams kyang rab rib kyis mdongs par gyur nas/ sman pa des 'di snyam du bdag gis sems
204a1(mdo sde): can 'di dag gis rab rib kyi skyon bstsal bar bya'o zhes bsams la/ de nas sman pa de bdag nyid kyang mdongs par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ ji ga sman pa
204a2(mdo sde): des sems can de dag gis rab rib kyi skyon thams cad stsal bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du
204a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di ltar 'jig rten mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis mdongs pa'i gti mug gi dri ma shes rab kyi mig gis bstsal bar 'dod la/ bdag nyid kyang mi shes pa'i rab rib
204a4(mdo sde): kyis mdongs na/ bdag gi mi cha'o snyam du sems te/ de de'i phyir bzod cing dang du len la/ gnod sems mi mang ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam bcas pa
204a5(mdo sde): pa nyams su lon par byed pa bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa/ yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams
204a6(mdo sde): yin no// 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin/ bam po gnyis pa// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ljon na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs
204a7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'gras can rnams yin/ mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can
204a8(mdo sde): rnams yin/ rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ 'bar ba'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ rgyun tu chud pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus
204b1(mdo sde): can rnams yin/ thun mongs ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ snyems pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la
204b2(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla
204b3(mdo sde): ba dang / ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang / me grol ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir/ 
204b4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ de de ltar na brtson 'gru/ sa brtsams pa yin te/ de de ltar na brtson 'grus pa/ dertsams shing gnas pa'i drung du bdud sdig to can 'ongs nas/ 
204b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de la rigs kyi bu 'di lta bu'i brtson 'grus thong shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bung sa kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan las 'das
204b6(mdo sde): pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa dbug dbyung ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa
204b7(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus 'di lta bu brtsams te/ de ni brdzun dang / 'drid pa'i chos can byis pa'i skye bo slu ba'o// rigs kyi bu ngas ni sems can
204b8(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pa gcig 'gag kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma shes// rigs kyi bu ngas ni sems can bye ba du ma nyan
205a1(mdo sde): thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ de'i phyir brtson 'grus zlos shig/ don med par
205a2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa la sten pa por gyur ta re zhes dad pa dang bral bar byed cing / rkyal ka byed kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma 'di ni bdud sdig can bdag la kyal ka byed par
205a3(mdo sde): 'dod do snyam ste/ des de ltar shes nas/ bdud sdig can de la 'di skad du/ sdig can khyod bya ba nyung ngu gyis shig/ 'jig rten gyi sgo sham gyis khyod la ci zhig bya/ sdig can bcom ldan 'das
205a4(mdo sde): kyis kyang las bdag gir bya ba ni 'jig rten pa yin te/ las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa'o// las kyi skye gnas dpa'o// las la ston pa'o zhes gsungs te/ sdig cen khyod kyang
205a5(mdo sde): las bdag gir bya ba yin te/ las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/ las kyi skye gnas pa/ las la ston pa yin gyis sdig can khyod gang nas 'ongs pa'i lam nas song shig
205a6(mdo sde): nga la kyal ka byas pas khyod yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal du gyur te re zhes sgo'o// bdud sdig can de yang bdag gi sems ni sems kyis tshor ba rig nas/ yib
205a7(mdo sde): yib ste/ de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyi kyal ka byas te/ 'dun pa bzlog kyang mi 'gyur mi 'jum zhum par
205a8(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/ de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems
205b1(mdo sde): dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i rnam pa ji lta bus yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de la grangs su yang nye bar
205b2(mdo sde): mi 'gro/ cha dang bgrang ba dang dpe nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad lta ci smos te/ de'i sems 'byung ba re re la brtson 'grus kyi stobs bskyed
205b3(mdo sde): bas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spong ba de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs
205b4(mdo sde): pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ha cang brtun
205b5(mdo sde): ngas pa 'am/ ha cang zhan pa'i brtson 'grus mi rtsom ste/ de ci phyir zhe na/ ha cang brtun ngas pa'i brtson 'grus ni yab yab por 'gyur/ ha cang zhan pa ni le lor 'gyur
205b6(mdo sde): te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang
205b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'di ltar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra bar bdag gi lus kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug ltar mi
205b8(mdo sde): mthong ba dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dang / ye shes thogs pa med cing mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang
206a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog nyid de yang bdag la yod par 'gyur ro zhes brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can
206a2(mdo sde): yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ gser ram nor bu rin po che dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba ni/ 
206a3(mdo sde): lha ma me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ste/ de ni a la la 'bar ba'i gser ro// a la la 'bar ba'i nor bu rin po che zhes bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyang brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang
206a4(mdo sde): skyon thams cad dang bral ba yin no// brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang / skyon de dag gang zhe na/ le lo ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no// snyoms las ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no// 
206a5(mdo sde): zas la tshod mi shes pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no// bdag mi shes pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no// tshul ma yin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no// tshul
206a6(mdo sde): bzhin ma yin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no// 'du 'dzi ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon te/ de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang brtson 'grus kyi skyon zhes bya'o// de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
206a7(mdo sde): la med pa yin te/ de'i phyir de'i brtson 'grus de 'bar zhing dri ma med pa dang / 'od gsal zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su byang ba yin no// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i brtson
206a8(mdo sde): 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyun tu chud pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' spyod lam thams cad du brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ ci nas kyang
206b1(mdo sde): lus skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sems skyo bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar brtson pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rgyun tu chung ba zhes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyun tu chung pa'i brtson
206b2(mdo sde): 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ de ltar rgyun tu chud pa'i brtson 'grus can de'i gang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi lam gyi
206b3(mdo sde): bar du gcod pa/ gnod pa dang ldan pa de dag spangs pa yin/ gang yang 'di dag dge ba'i chos mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'thun pa/ byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs pa dang 'thun pa byang chub kyi phyogs byang
206b4(mdo sde): chub tu 'brang ba de dag 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / yangs pa dar 'gyur te/ de la mi dge ba'i sems skye ba phra zhing chung ba 'ga' yang mi skye na/ che ba lta ci smos te/ de ni rnam par dag
206b5(mdo sde): pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// rdza/ ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson
206b6(mdo sde): 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig mnar med pa'i phung po chen pos
206b7(mdo sde): byur bur gang yin gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das pa na/ sems can gcig cig sdug bsngal zhing skyabs med mgon med de/ gnas dang rten med pa zhig yod na'ang / sems
206b8(mdo sde): can gcig po de'i don gyi phyir/ me'i phung po de la rkang gis 'bogs te/ 'jig rten gyi khamams de dag 'das nas/ sems can gcig po de thar par bya bar bdag spron/ sdug bsngal phal
207a1(mdo sde): lta ci zhig smos snyam ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / mu stegs can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa
207a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
207a3(mdo sde): 'di snyam du mir gyur pa ni/ byang chub thob par dga' ste/ bdag gi brtson 'grus 'di ni chungs shing zhan la bdag kyang le lo can te/ byang chub ni mgo thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du bskal pa mang po
207a4(mdo sde): bskal pa brgya phrag mang po/ bskal pa stong phrag mang po/ bskal pa brgya stong phrag mang por bsgrub dgos pas/ bdag ni de lta bu'i khur bkur bar mi spro'o snyam du sems mi
207a5(mdo sde): skyed de/ byang chub sems dpas ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang mngon par sangs rgyas pa de dag dang / gang mngon par
207a6(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshul 'di dang 'dra ba dang / lam 'di dang 'dra ba dang / brtson 'grus 'di dang 'dra bar/ mngon
207a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa sha stag las
207a8(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin gyis/ bdag kyang ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par rang rgya bar 'gyur bar sems can thams cad dang thun
207b1(mdo sde): mong gi brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bdag gis kyang de lta de ltar brtsal lo 'bad do// bdag sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa la ni/ 
207b2(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba na gnas kyang bla'i/ bdag la phan par brtson na mya ngan las 'das pa ni ma yin no snyam du sems skyed par bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus
207b3(mdo sde): can yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snyems pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtsom na/ brtson 'grus de'i ro myang
207b4(mdo sde): bar mi byed de/ brtson 'grus des gzhan la mi spong bdagadal mi stong de/ de 'od snyam du shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang debazhin can su zhig bdag gi las la brtson pas gzhan la
207b5(mdo sde): spong snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snyoms pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
207b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe
207b7(mdo sde): na 'di lta ste/ bsod nams kyis brtan pa rnams yin no// skyo ba mang ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ mang du thos pa rnams yin/ ma log par gdams ngag
207b8(mdo sde): bsgom pa la brtson pa rnams yin/ chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la zhugs pa rnams yin/ dbang po rna ba rnams yin/ sems la mkhas pa rnams yin/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong / 
208a1(mdo sde): lamakhas pa rnams son/ des na pa rnams yin no// gas kyi bu la // pa byang chub sems dpa' ba ba rnams kyi brtan pa sam na/ 'dis byang chub
208a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' theg pa chen po la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtsegs shing / tshe rabs tha dad pa de dang de dag tu spyad pa legs par spyad pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba yin te/ de bram
208a3(mdo sde): ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/ rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu gang dang gang du skyes kyang / khyim de'i mi dad pa yin te/ de skyes kyang / 
208a4(mdo sde): rgyu de dag dang rkyen de dag de bas kyang 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang mi 'brasarab yin te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 
208a5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gam byang chub sems dpa' dag go// de skyes na skyon dge ba'i rtsa ba la goms pas 'di ltar dpyod do// kye ma'o skye dgu 'di ni sdug
208a6(mdo sde): bsngal ba'o// kye ma'o skye dgu 'di ni nyam thag pa'o// kye ma'o skye dgu 'di ni na ba'o// kye ma'o skye dgu 'di ni gnas pa'o// kye ma'o skye dgu 'di ni yun ring po nas nad par gyur pa'o// kye ma'o skye dgu
208a7(mdo sde): 'di ni gti mug gis ldongs pa'o// de yang 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i phyir te/ de bas na 'jig rten gnas pa de lta bu la/ bdag gis 'dod pa rnams la bsten pa ni bdag gi mi cha/ 'dod pa
208a8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su brtags pa te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rnam grangs du mar 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes pa 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa rnams ni gsal shing lta
208b1(mdo sde): bu'o/ 'dod pa rnams ni mtshon mdung thung lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni ral gri'i so lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni spu gri'i so lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni sbrul gyi mgo lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni dbung
208b2(mdo sde): rdos pa lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni rul ba'o// 'dod pa rnams ni dri nga'o zhes gsungs so snyam ste/ de de ltar skyo nas sgra dang / kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas dad pas khyim nas
208b3(mdo sde): khyim med par yang dag par rab tu 'byung ngo // de rab tu byung nas ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang / khong du ma chud pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / mngon du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus/ 
208b4(mdo sde): brtsams pa yin no// de rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi des kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i tshul du bshad pa dang / don dam pa'i bden ba'i tshul du bshad pa'i thos pa 'dzin to// de gnyis ka la
208b5(mdo sde): yang mkhas pas gdams ngag yang dag par sgom mo// gdams ngag ma log par bsgom pa la brtson pas chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la 'jug ste/ chos kyi rjes
208b6(mdo sde): su 'thun pa'i chos de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lto ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba
208b7(mdo sde): dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de lam khong du chud pas dbang po rno ba dang / dbang po gsal ba dang / de shes pa'i
208b8(mdo sde): dbang po can yin no// de dbang po rno zhing dbang po gsal la/ de shes pa'i dbang po can yin pas dben pa mang ba yin te/ de 'du ba thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong ngo // 
209a1(mdo sde): 'du 'dzi thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong ngo // smra ba la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / gtso ba'i/ 
209a2(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa dang / lha la rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong ngo // shes kyi khe 'dod pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa thams cad kyi thams cad du/ 
209a3(mdo sde): yongs su spong ste/ de lus dang sems rab tu dben pas sems la mkhas pa yin te/ de sems la 'di snyam du bdag gi sems 'di ci dge ba la spyod dam/ de ste mi dge ba 'am 'on te
209a4(mdo sde): lung du ma bstan pa 'am/ chos gang la spyod ces rnam par dpyod de/ gal te dge ba la spyod na/ de la sems dga' ba dang rangs pa dang mgu ba skyed do// dge ba'i chos de
209a5(mdo sde): dag kyang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos/ sum cu rtsa bdun no// 'on te mi dge ba la spyod na/ de la spyod pa mang ba dang / rtogs pa mang ba yin te/ 
209a6(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i chos de dag spangs pa la brtson pa yin no// mi dge ba'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug go/ de la 'dod chags rnam pa
209a7(mdo sde): gsum du rnam par rig par bya ste/ chen po dang / 'bring po dang chung ngu'o// de la 'dod chags chen po gang zhe na/ gang lus thams cad du khyab ste/ sems kun nas bzung zhing
209a8(mdo sde): gnas pa dang / gang gis de la gzhol zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems mi 'thob pa ste/ de la gzhol ba de la ngo tsha ba dang / 'dzem pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur te/ 
209b1(mdo sde): ji ltar na ngo tsha ba dang / 'dzem pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med pa yin zhe na/ de gcig pu klog du song ste/ de nyid rjes su rnam par sems de nyid rjes su rnam par rtog cing / de nyid la
209b2(mdo sde): legs par shin tu smon pa dang / de nyid la yang yon tan du lta ba yin te/ de ltar na de la ngo tsha med pa yin no// ji ltar na 'dzem pa med pa yin zhe na/ de rgyu de dang rkyen de dang / gzhi nges pa
209b3(mdo sde): ma'am bla ma lta bu gzhan dag dang bzod cing phyir bzlog pa dang / rgol bar byed cing des ngo mi tsha la de la yon tan du lta ba yin te/ de ltar na de la ngo tsha ba med pa yin te/ de rgyud dang rkyen
209b4(mdo sde): de dang gzhi des ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ de da ni 'dod chags chen po zhes bya'o// de la 'dod chag des 'bring po gang zhe na/ gang gis 'dod pa rnams la bsnyen
209b5(mdo sde): par gyur na/ bya ba grub kyi bar du rten gyi bya ba grub nasa'adod chags dang bral ba'i sems 'thob pa dang / 'gyod pa 'thob pa dang sems la mi che ba 'thob pa ste/ de
209b6(mdo sde): ni 'dod chags 'bring po zhes bya'o// de la 'dod chags chung ngu gang zhe na/ gang gis 'dod pa rnams bsnyen par gyur kyang / mnabs pa dang / phyugs pa dang / lus kyi reg pa tsam 'am/ 
209b7(mdo sde): tshig tu smra ba tsam 'am/ mthong ba tsam gyis tshim par 'gyur ba de ni/ 'dod chags chung ngu zhes bya'o// mdor na 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad la chags pa'i sems su gyur pa ste/ de ni
209b8(mdo sde): 'dod chags shes bya'o// de la zhe sdang gang zhe na zhe sdang yang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste/ chen po dang 'bring po dang chung ngu'o// de la zhe sdang chen po gang zhe na/ zhe sdang gi rnam pa gang gis
210a1(mdo sde): zhe sdang rngam/ 'khrugs gtum par gyur nas mtshams med pa lnga las gang yang rung ba la la byed pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba gang byas pa la mtshams med pa lnga
210a2(mdo sde): bsdoms pas kyang / grangs su yang nye bar mi 'gro/ cha dang bgrang ba dang dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba de lta bu byed de/ de rgyu de dang rkyen de dang / gzhi des lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba chen po
210a3(mdo sde): dag tu skye zhing gal te brgya la mir skyes na yang / gnag cing mig dmar la gtum zhing gnod sems mang bar 'gyur te/ de rgyu de dang rkyen de dang / gzhi des yang sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye
210a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de ni zhe sdang chen po zhes bya'o// de la zhe sdang 'bying po gang zhe na/ gang gis zhe sdang bar gyur te/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas na myur ba myur ba skyen pa skyen pa la gor la gor du
