236a2(mdo sde): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
236a3(mdo sde): dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / 
236a4(mdo sde): chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang // mig gi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched da dang / rna ba'i skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye
236a5(mdo sde): mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched la mi
236a6(mdo sde): gnas pa yin/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 'khor los sgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang / 
236a7(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag tu 'gyur ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dag tu 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag tu 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams/ 
236a8(mdo sde): dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag la yang gnas pa byed de/ de thams cad la mi gnas pas dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang / gcig pa dang / tha dad pa dang / de bzhin nyid la sogs par
236b1(mdo sde): rlom sems kyi rnam pa du mas ma gyur cing / dmigs pa med la rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa yang byed la/ 
236b2(mdo sde): phyogs bcu mtha' yang mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par thams cad du yang rgyu la
236b3(mdo sde): chos kyi lus kyis mi snang ba yang yin zhing / mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas med par spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul/ 
236b4(mdo sde): kun tu mu med pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag tu reg par byed de g.yob cing rgyu'o// rigs
236b5(mdo sde): kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang / chos mu med pa dag kun rdzob dang / don dam par kun/ nas mthong zhing rgyas par byed reg par byed/ rnam par
236b6(mdo sde): 'god cing ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag dang / 'khor ba thams cad kyi gnas dag tu yid kyi mgyogs
236b7(mdo sde): pa dang ldan zhing phyogs bcu thams cad kyi mthar thug pa'i spyod yul par 'gyur nas rgyu zhing 'gro ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spod yul kun tu mu med pa yin no// rigs
236b8(mdo sde): kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis snyems pa'i rtse mo 'thar zhing 'jig la rab tu rnyil bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni ri dang
237a1(mdo sde): khyim dang nags tshal gyi rtse mo dag 'dud par byed/ rab tu rnyil bar byed/ rnam par 'jig par byed/ 'thor bar byed/ mi sngar ba byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
237a2(mdo sde): rlung mar yang sems can nga rgyal dang rlom sems dang / dregs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtse mos snyems pa rnams/ gzugs dang dar la bab pa dang / longs spyod dang / dbang dang / stobs
237a3(mdo sde): dang / tshe dang nad med pa dang / 'tsho ba dang / bzo dang / thos pa dang / yid bzhungs pa dang / g.yog dang / smra mkhas pa dang / dpal che ba'i dregs pas myos pa dag dang / yang dag pa'i nan tan gyis
237a4(mdo sde): bdag stong pa rnams la de dang khyad zhugs pa'i phun sum tshogs ba bstan pa dang / chos bstan pas nga rgyal choms par byed cing dge ba dri ma med pa la sbyor bar byed de/ de ltar na byang
237a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis snyems pa'i rtse mo/ mthor zhing 'jig la rab tu rnyil bar byed pa yin no// / rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin
237a6(mdo sde): chen po kun nas skyed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni phyogs bzhi nas sprin gyi dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs can dang / zab cing gsal la mnyen zhing 'jam pa'i
237a7(mdo sde): 'brug sgra rgya mtsho'i dbyangs can krung ro sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin cing ying du 'ong ba'i dbyangs rjes su grag pa glog gi 'phreng ba'i rgyan gyi rnam par brgyan pa gang dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba
237a8(mdo sde): khrag khrig stong phrag brgya dag kun nas yongs su khebs par byas te/ 'gro ba thams cad dga' ba dang / lo tog dang / sdong po yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir/ char gyi rgyun rin po che rtag tu rgyun
237b1(mdo sde): mi chad par mngon par 'bebs pa'i sprin chen po kun nas spong ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang / lus sna tshogs kyi sprin sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa/ phyogs
237b2(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bar byed pa/ 'od zer kha dog mtha' yas pa'i klog gi 'phreng ba'i rgyan 'byung ba yang dag pa de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra yan lag stong
237b3(mdo sde): phrag drug cu pas sgrog pa snying rje chen po'i rlung mar gyis yang dag par 'thor ba/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi na mkha' khyab par byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams
237b4(mdo sde): thams cad kun nas/ khebs par byas shing / ngan song dang / mi khom pa la sogs pa nas/ sems can rnams rnam par bslang ste/ rnam pa thams cad du mtshan dang
237b5(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang po dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snang ba rnam bar dag pa yang byin gyis brlabs te/ bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag
237b6(mdo sde): kyang byin gyis brlabs nas/ lha dang / mi dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa mchog tu gyur pa dga' ba dang / bde ba mchog thob pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten
237b7(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i chos dkar po'i lo tog dang / rtsi chen po dang sdong po thams cad rnam par bskyed pa dang / thams cad du skyid par chos kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi phun
237b8(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / drud pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi char chen po mngon par 'bebs te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin chen po kun
238a1(mdo sde): nas skyed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper
238a2(mdo sde): na rlung mar dri zhim po'i char gyi rgyun gyi snying po can ldang na/ sems can thams cad kyi gdung ba yongs su zhi bar byas shing lus shin tu som pa dang / bsil bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems/ 
238a3(mdo sde): dpa'i rlung mar yang sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / ngan 'gro dang / ngan par lta ba dang / nyes byas dang / the tsom dang phongs pa mi bzad pa dang / yul la sred pa
238a4(mdo sde): dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang bral zhing phrad pa dang / nad rnams bcil nas dam pa ma yin pa'i chos la sred pa la so// rigs pa'i gdung ba dag dam pa'i chos kyi char dang 'dres pa'i bla na
238a5(mdo sde): med pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / smon lam dang / mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / 'grogs pa dang / bsta/ na pa don yod pa la sogs pas rab tu zhi bar byed de/ rigs kyi
238a6(mdo sde): bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed cing nyon mongs pa med pa'i sa la 'god pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems
238a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las 'thun par byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ dbugs 'byung ba dang / 
238a8(mdo sde): rngub pa'i rlung gi mthus sems can thams cad 'tsho'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas mngon par bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bstabs pa'i chos dkar po'i rlung mar nye bar
238b1(mdo sde): spyad pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad skyed pas kyang sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'di lta/ 
238b2(mdo sde): ste/  rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang / khor yug ri dag/ khor yug rin po che rnams dang / gling chen po bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa'i gser gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'byung gnas
238b3(mdo sde): bcas pa rnams dang / ri rab dang / ri rab chen po dang / de ma yin pa rin po che'i ri dang / gangs dang / ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba dang / grong rdal dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang dag dang / 'jam
238b4(mdo sde): bu'i gling dag dang / gling chen po bzhi dag dang / stong dag dang / stong gnyis pa dag dang / stong gsum gyi steng chen po dag dgod pa rnam par phye ba sna tshogs par sgrub bo// de bzhin
238b5(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang phyogs bcu kun tu sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung / bo phun sum tshogs pa nye bar bsgrub bo// skyeng ri yongs su
238b6(mdo sde): gzhog go// de la ji ltar gangs kyi ri phun sum tshogs pa de ltar 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar na gling chen po bzhi pa dang / ri rab phun sum tshogs
238b7(mdo sde): pa de ltar ni nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar stong
238b8(mdo sde): gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams phun
239a1(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa de ltar ni/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi na mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa shin tu rnam par
239a2(mdo sde): dag par grags pa/ mchod la dmigs pa thams cad yang dag par gnas pa rnams kyi thams cad mngon du byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa rtag tu mnyam
239a3(mdo sde): bar bzhag pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// de la rgya mtsho ltar ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho rnams blta'o// gling dang bar gyi gling dang / ri gzhan dang / gling chen po bzhi la sogs pa ltar ni sbyor ba
239a4(mdo sde): dang / gzungs dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / slob ma'i dge 'dun la sogs pa blta'o// grong rdal dang nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang ltar ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
239a5(mdo sde): zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bkod pa rnams blta'o// dpag bsams kyi shing gi nags tshal rnams ltar ni/ sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs
239a6(mdo sde): dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / ye shes snang ba dang / dbang dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs de mi 'jigs pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / 
239a7(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po la sogs pa dbang sgyur ba dam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i chos rnams blta'o// rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gang zhe na
239a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed dag na sems can gang ji snyed yod pa/ 
239b1(mdo sde): de dag thams cad stong gsum phrag bcu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ de lta bu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po nyid dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi bsod nam
239b2(mdo sde): kyi phung po ji tsam pa de bsdoms pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba chen po gcig cig ldan par gyur te/ rnam grangs des shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das te/ de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
239b3(mdo sde): khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de snyed cig 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de 'dra ba nyid dang so sor ldan par gyur la/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na mkha'i
239b4(mdo sde): khams kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na/ sems can yod do tsa dag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i dang / das po de lta bu sha dag dang / so sor ldan par gyur te/ de
239b5(mdo sde): bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis 'jig rten gyis khams de skad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams/ brgya byin gyi bas da nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa'i brgya byin sha stag du gyur la/ 
239b6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma'i steng du gtogs pa'i brgya byin rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de dang / brgya byin gcig cig ldan
239b7(mdo sde): bar gyur te/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad brgya byin de dang 'dra
239b8(mdo sde): ba sha stag du gyur la/ bgrang ba de nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad tshangs pa
240a1(mdo sde): chen por gyur la/ bsod nams de thams cad gcig du bsdoms pa dang tshangs pa chen po gcig ldan par gyur la/ tshangs pa chen po ji lta bar sems can thams cad kyang de/ 
240a2(mdo sde): bzhin du gyur te/ snga ma bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dag dang rang sangs rgyas dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po thob pa 'od zer gyi sprin chen po'i dbang bskur bas/ dbang bskur ba
240a3(mdo sde): dbang bcu thob pa sha stag du gyur te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu de lta bu sems can thams cad phyogs bcu'i mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams su gtogs pa dus gsum pa thams
240a4(mdo sde): cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de dus gsum gyi nam kha'i khams su gtogs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams nga su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab
240a5(mdo sde): brgyar bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig mngon par 'grub bo// ba spu'i khung bu thams da du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong grangs med pa
240a6(mdo sde): bcur bsgyur bas/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu las/ dpe byad bzang po re re mngon par 'grub bo// dpe byad bzang por gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de thams cad brjod du med pa bcur/ 
240a7(mdo sde): bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa dgu las mtshan re re mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu
240a8(mdo sde): zla ba nya ste/ dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor stong pas kyang lhag par mdzes pa'i 'od dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du med pa bye ba stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs
240b1(mdo sde): pa'i spyi gtsug 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing / bltar mi snang ba gtsug tor gyis yongs su brgyan pa mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag
240b2(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag stong drug bcu pa/ dmigs pa thams cad las gsung gi sgra mtha' yas pa 'byung ba lhun gyis
240b3(mdo sde): grub pas sems can thams cad bams pa yongs su tshim par 'gyur ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du go bar byed pa/ mngon par 'grub ste/ rigs kyi bu de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
240b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dang /  ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang ldan zhing kun tu rgyas par byed pa
240b5(mdo sde): bkod pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba/ yin te/ rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag pa bzung na/ gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings
240b6(mdo sde): kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/ thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams bcu pa/ chos kyi sprin la gnas pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i lus dang ngag
240b7(mdo sde): dang yid kyi rgyan 'chang ba dbang bcu la dbang sgyur ba sha stag tu gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las
240b8(mdo sde): byas pa'i snod rin po che sna tshog dang rna chogs zlas la6/ na mkha'i tshad tsam gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed so so nas thogs te/ phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i skal par yongs su bkang zhing skad cig skad cig du
241a1(mdo sde): blangs shing khyer yang spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gang ba 'am bri bar mi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams
241a2(mdo sde): brgya pa'i mtshan ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de las bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro can
241a3(mdo sde): dang / shin tu spang dka' dang / mngon du gyur dang / ring du song dang / mi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od de sa bcu gnyis po de dag go// de la
241a4(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang nga chub sems dpa'i byis pa'i spyod pa dang / log pa'i nan tan thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ 'jig rten gsum
241a5(mdo sde): po thams cad kyi brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / khyad zhugs shing 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa
241a6(mdo sde): thams cad du dpal dang ldan pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i
241a7(mdo sde): stobs kyi shugs 'chang ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par skad cig re re la 'gro zhing 'ong na/ dri zhim po dang 'od zer gyi dra ba'i tshogs chen po gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
241a8(mdo sde): kun tu 'byung ba/ pad+mas rkang pa yongs su brtan pa/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtha' dang mnyam pa'i stan gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad shin tu rnam par non pa'i lhag mthong rnam
241b1(mdo sde): par bsgoms pas/ thogs pa med cing yid du 'ong ba'i dmigs pa'i mtshan ma chen po bcu la sogs pa grangs med pa'i ltas bzang po mthong ba/ phyir mi ldog pa phyogs kyi nags tshal thibs po mtha'
241b2(mdo sde): yas pa thams cad du 'od kyi dra ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'gyed pas zhing dpag tu med pa'i rgyan byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi mnga' bdag dpag du
241b3(mdo sde): med pa snyed kyi bdag gi gzugs brnyan gyis dbang bskur ba yang dag par gnod pa'i dbang dang byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin po che char
241b4(mdo sde): gyi snang ba'i sgo dpag tu med pa thams cad gtan pa med par kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mchod sbyin chen po'i sprin gtong ba lhur byed pa/ blta na bzang zhing yid du 'ong
241b5(mdo sde): la mdzes shing dge la 'gro ba thams cad dang mi mthun pa med cing / don yod par bsam pa thams cad yin sa su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
241b6(mdo sde): med par rab tu g.yo bar byed cing 'gro ba ngan 'gro la sogs pa la sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su skyob/ mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang chos kyi sgo 'dzin nus/ ting
241b7(mdo sde): nge 'dzin gyi gzungs dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa grangs med pas rnam par rol pa chos mtha' yas pa la dga' zhing mos pas zang zing med par/ 
241b8(mdo sde): phyi ma'i mtha' bskal pa'i mthar thug par rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis 'grub pa'i dga' ba'i shugs kyi snang ba thob pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ther 'bum
242a1(mdo sde): dpag tu med par theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i bsgom pa sna tshogs yongs su rdzogs la gzhan gyi don gyi nan tan tshar phyin pa'i bsod nams dang / 
242a2(mdo sde): ye shes kyi tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa grub pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba brgya stong phun sum tshogs pa'i mos pa chen po'i yang chen pos spyod pa'i chos nyid kyis sa dang po de ma thag tu 'thob par gang
242a3(mdo sde): gnas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni mi'i kha dog las ni
242a4(mdo sde): 'das la/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rtenadapa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
242a5(mdo sde): thams cad las ni 'das pa yin/ don dam pa'i byangachub sems dpa'i sa ni ma thob pa yin no// sangs/ rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od ni mtha' dang dpung med pa ma lus pa/ 
242a6(mdo sde): dri ma med pa'i chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba ste/ kun tu shin tu lta ba sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do// de la ting nge 'dzin rnams gang zhe na/ 
242a7(mdo sde): bcu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rin po che chen po kun tu 'phags pa dang / shin tu gnas pa dang / 
242a8(mdo sde): mi skul ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid dang / don thams cad grub pa dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / da ltar gyi sangs
242b1(mdo sde): rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin te/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni mtha' yas so// gzungs ni bcu gnyis te/ bcu
242b2(mdo sde): gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang bskur ldan dang / ye shes ldan dang / sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa dang / mi zad pa'i za ma tog dang / 'khyil pa mtha' yas pa dang / rgya
242b3(mdo sde): mtsho'i phyag rgya dang / pad+ma bkod pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyi
242b4(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog rdzogs pa mngon dbar bsgrub pa'i gzungs te/ de dag la sogs pa snga ma bzhin
242b5(mdo sde): du sbyar ro// mngon par shes pa ni drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / pha/ rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rje su dran pa'i
242b6(mdo sde): shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul mngon par shes pa'i shes pa dang / zag pa zad par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste drug po de dag go// dbang ni bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe'i tshad
242b7(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par byin gyis rlob pas/ tshe la dbang ba dang / ting 'dzin brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i nges par rtog cing 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sems la dbang ba
242b8(mdo sde): dang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bkod pa'i rgyan du mas brgyan par byin gyis rlob pa ston pa'i tshul gyis yo byad la dbang ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du las kyi rnam par
243a1(mdo sde): smin pa byin gyis rlob pa ston pas las la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba ston pas skye ba la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
243a2(mdo sde): thams cad sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gang bar ston pas mos pa la dbang ba dang / dus dang zhing gang du 'dod par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par ston pas smon lam la dbang ba
243a3(mdo sde): dang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / chos kyi sgo snang ba mtha' dpung med pa yongs su ston
243a4(mdo sde): pas chos la dbang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stob su bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag pararig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang
243a5(mdo sde): po dang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa dang / dus thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi grangs la sogs pa skad gcig
243a6(mdo sde): gcig la yongasu shes pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pas/ ye shes la dbang ba ste/ bcu po de dag
243a7(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa'i stobs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / sbyor
243a8(mdo sde): ba'i stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / spyod pa'i stobs dang / theg pa'i stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / byang chub kyi stobs dang / 
243b1(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs
243b2(mdo sde): kyis thos pa 'dzin cing don bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / bdag med pa khong du chud pas gzhan gyis gtse ba'i mtshan ma mi 'byung zhing rang bzhin gyis spyod lam smad du med pa'i las
243b3(mdo sde): gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsrung ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang / chos bzung ba yun du mi brjed pa dang / thabs dang shes rab mthar phyin pas sems can sgrol
243b4(mdo sde): zhing dad pa ston pa dang / dge ba'i bar chad du mi 'gyur/ ba'i mi 'jigs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ da kyi sems ma nyams shing theg pa gzhan gyis mi 'byung
243b5(mdo sde): bar dbang yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can gyi don rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par thob par bya ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub
243b6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ma bstan pa'i sbyin pa
243b7(mdo sde): can rnams yin/ ma bstan pa'i tshul khrims can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i bzod pa can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i bsam
243b8(mdo sde): gtan can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i shes rab can rnams dang / bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can thams cad bsdud pa rnams dang / yongs su sngo ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams dang / 
244a1(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dbang gis theg pa'i mchog gis 'byung ba ston pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po las ma nyams pa rnams dang / 
244a2(mdo sde): 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo ston pa rnams dang / zung dang snrel zhi'i rgyud la mkhas pa rnams yin/ ye shes sngon du 'gro bas mngon par 'du mi byed cing kha na ma tho ba med par tshe
244a3(mdo sde): rabs thams cad du mngon par zhugs pa rnams dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dge ba bcu dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad bzod pa'i lus len
244a4(mdo sde): pas sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong/ dpa rnams dang / 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dga' dbar ston pa rnams dang / byis pa dang nyan thos mi bzad pa
244a5(mdo sde): ji snyed cig gi nang na yang dge ba mang po'i rin po che'i shing dpag bsams ltar brtan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yongs su ma nyams pa rnams dang / chos thams/ 
244a6(mdo sde): cad kyi thabs sbyin pas dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba bstan pa las mi ldog pa rnams te/ bco brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma
244a7(mdo sde): 'dres pa rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi las
244a8(mdo sde): kyi rgyu'i rnam par smin pa len pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa
244b1(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang
244b2(mdo sde): rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / shi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad par mkhyen
244b3(mdo sde): ba'i stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang
244b4(mdo sde): chub pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / zag pa thams cad zad par shes pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi
244b5(mdo sde): 'jigs pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi// 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
244b6(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa rnams so// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrol pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / bsnyel ba med pa dang // 
244b7(mdo sde): sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang / so sor ma rtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang / mos pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa
244b8(mdo sde): med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma
245a1(mdo sde): thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma
245a2(mdo sde): thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / lus kyi las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi
245a3(mdo sde): rjes su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste/ bco brgyad po de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// de la de bzhin
245a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu da bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
245a5(mdo sde): khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu bsam gyis mi khya ba pa'i rang bzhin 'byung ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni bdag med pa yin na/ 
245a6(mdo sde): sems can rnams ni bdag med par ma mos pas de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni sems can med pa yin na/ 
245a7(mdo sde): sems can rnams ni sems can du smra ba'o// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni srog med pa yin na/ sems can rnams
245a8(mdo sde): ni srog tu smra'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gang zag pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni gang zag la gnas so// 
245b1(mdo sde): zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni med pa yin/ sems can rnams ni yod par lta'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs
245b2(mdo sde): pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gnas med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni gnas la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// / 
245b3(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni gzhi med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni gzhi la dga'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni nga'ir bya ba med pa
245b4(mdo sde): med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni nga'ir bya ba la rten to/ zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa
245b5(mdo sde): yin na/ sems can rnams ni yongs su gzung ba la brtson no zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni dngos po
245b6(mdo sde): med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni dngos po la rten to// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa yin na/ 
245b7(mdo sde): sems can rnams ni skye ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'chi 'pho dang ma skyes pa yin na/ sems can
245b8(mdo sde): rnams ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mo mongs pa yin na/ sems can
246a1(mdo sde): rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs so zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po ste'o// chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin na/ 
246a2(mdo sde): sems can rnams ni 'dod chags par byed do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams
246a3(mdo sde): ni zhe sdang bar byed do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gti mug dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni gti mug par gyur
246a4(mdo sde): to zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'ong da ba med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'ong ba la gnas
246a5(mdo sde): pa'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshe gas pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'gro ba med pa yin na/ sems can rnams 'gro ba la gan
246a6(mdo sde): so zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni mngon par 'du
246a7(mdo sde): byed pa la spyod do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad spros pa med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni spros pa la dga'
246a8(mdo sde): zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni stong pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni lta ba la zhen te zhes de'i phyir sems can
246b1(mdo sde): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni mtshan ma spyod yul can no zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la
246b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni smon lham la spyod do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs
246b3(mdo sde): pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phan tshun rtsod pas yongs su zin cing gnod sems kyi tha ba dang / zhe sdang la zhugs par gzigs nas de dag la gnod sems kyi
246b4(mdo sde): tha ba dang / zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes/ sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phyin ci log
246b5(mdo sde): dang ldan zhing nyam nga bar zhugs pa/ lam gol ba la gan sa pa yin gyis de dag yang dag pa'i lam du gzung ba/ bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
246b6(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni brkam zhing 'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa ste/ cho ga mi shes shing gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa yin gyis de dag 'phags pa'i nor
246b7(mdo sde): dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i nor la dgod do zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
246b8(mdo sde): rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can de dag ni bu smad dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru la sred pas/ 'khor ba ste/ snying po med pa la snying por 'du shes pa yin gyis/ de dag la shin tu mi
247a1(mdo sde): rtag par bstan par bya'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mi rigs pas 'tsho
247a2(mdo sde): ste/ gcig la gcig 'drid par gnas pa yin gyis/ de dag la 'tsho ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// / 
247a3(mdo sde): kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chog mi shes pa ste/ rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang / tshigs su gcad pa la spyod kyang bdag cag ni chog shes pa snyam du 'dzin gyis de dag la gang 'di sdug bsngal shin tu
247a4(mdo sde): zhi zhing bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pas/ shin tu chog pa/ dar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khyim gyi gan
247a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyi snod shin tu nyon mongs pa la rtag tu dga' ba yin gyis de dag las byung zhing khams gsum pa/ las yang dag par 'das par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ 
247a6(mdo sde): zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni rgyus nye bar 'gro ba ste/ bsgrub pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na/ de la sems
247a7(mdo sde): can rnams ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba la le lo byed kyis de dag la rnam par grol bar lhur blang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams par chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de
247a8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// sems can rnams ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes dam pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'di btang zhing gang
247b1(mdo sde): 'di nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dman pa tshol ba yin gyis/ de dag la gang 'dis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dmigs par bya ba'i phyir/ rgya chen po la blo mos par bya'o zhes
247b2(mdo sde): sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye ste/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen
247b3(mdo sde): po skye'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig sems can dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang
247b4(mdo sde): ldan pa'i snying rje chen po sbyi na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bsod nams kyi zhing gzi ba dang chen pos rgyas pa phyir mi ldog pa sems can gyi don la
247b5(mdo sde): brtson par rig par bya'o// snying rje chen po'i chos kyi sgo/ 'i le'u 'di/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na/ srog chags stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/ bla na med pa
247b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// srog tshogs brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha'i bu stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig
247b7(mdo sde): rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// rigs kyi bu de ltar de dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang sgyur gyi chos rnam
247b8(mdo sde): par dgod pa ni dpag tu med grangs med de/ de dag phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pas bstan kyang mtha' med na/ sems can rnams kyi dga' ba
248a1(mdo sde): dang / dad pa dang rangs pa bskyed pa'i phyir phyogs tsam zhig bstan te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las 'thun
248a2(mdo sde): bar 'byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin nus pa yin zhe na/ rigs
248a3(mdo sde): kyi bu lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor mu med cing rgya che la brtan zhing sra bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs pa dang 'byung ba char sprin dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho dang gling chen po
248a4(mdo sde): bzhi par bcas pa/ ri rab dang ri btang bzung dang / ri btang zung chen po dang / gangs dang / khor yug ri dang / khor yug ri chen po dang / ri spos kyi ngad ldang dang / grong rdal dang / 
248a5(mdo sde): 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang gi rna/ ma par bcas pa dag yongs su 'dzin to// de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang gzungs
248a6(mdo sde): kyi rlung mar gyi dkyil 'khor mu med pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis phab pa'i gtan pa med pa'i chos kyi char gyi rgyun chen po thams cad yongs su 'dzin to// 
248a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad chags pa'i tshe/ ji skad du brjod pa'i ri rab dang / rgya mtsho dang / gling chen po bzhi pa dang / ri btang zung dang / ri btang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang
248a8(mdo sde): khor yug ri dang / khor yug ri chen po dang / ri spos kyi ngad ldang dang / grong rdal dang / 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang gi rnam pa lta bu bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan
248b1(mdo sde): dang / sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / dbang dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / 
248b2(mdo sde): snying rje chen po la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin to// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi phung po
248b3(mdo sde): brgya stong mu med pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yongs su 'dzin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin nus
248b4(mdo sde): pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam/ pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam dpar dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongasu 'god
248b5(mdo sde): pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni gzhal med khang dgod pa'i rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs thams cad kun nas gzhog par byed/ rnam par 'byed par
248b6(mdo sde): byed de/ nags tshal dang / shing dang yal ga dang / mdab ma dang / ldum bu dang / myu gu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / sdong po la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi yan
248b7(mdo sde): lag nyid lag rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs su rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yongasu gzhog cing rnam par 'byed de/ gsal bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang so so yang
248b8(mdo sde): dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes mthogs ma chags shing mtha' yas pas/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sgo sna tshogs nas
249a1(mdo sde): yong su gzhog par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ snang bar byed/ yongs su ston par byed/ thob par byed cing rnam pa 'di dag 'di sa ste/ chos 'di dag ni ngan stong
249a2(mdo sde): sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni bde 'gro sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni bdag por sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni sems can dmyal ba sgrub po// 'di dag ni byol song gi skye gnas sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig
249a3(mdo sde): rten sgrub bo// 'di dag ni mir sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni lhar sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni 'khor los sgyur bar sgrub pa'o// de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ 'di dag ni brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig
249a4(mdo sde): rten skyong ba sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni gzugs dang / g.yog dang yid gzhungs pa dang / dpal chen po bsgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni rig pa'o// 'di dag ni sgyu rtsal lo// 'di dag ni bzo'i/ 
249a5(mdo sde): gnas so// 'di dag ni bstan bcos sna tshogs la rnam pa thams cad du mkhas pa'o// 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ste/ nyan thos su 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi
249a6(mdo sde): theg pa ste/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni theg pa chen po ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bdag dang gzhan gyi don yang dag par 'thob par byed pa kun tu bzang
249a7(mdo sde): po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ 'di dag ni sa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / rigs pa rnams dang / dbang
249a8(mdo sde): rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
249b1(mdo sde): dang ma 'dres pa rnams so zhes rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med pas/ gzungs pad+ma bkod pa la sogs pa la mkhas pas chos bkod pa
249b2(mdo sde): rnam par bkod pa dag byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod par rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongasu 'god pa
249b3(mdo sde): yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsams kyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong
249b4(mdo sde): ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin zhe na/ rigasad kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni dpag bsams da kyi shing gi nags tshal dag las gang gis lha dang mi rnams
249b5(mdo sde): shin tu dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ mya ngan med par rnam par rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rtag tu n+d+ha/ na mi 'chad par kha dog dang stobs dang / mthu dang yid bde ba
249b6(mdo sde): las yongs su mi nyams pa de lta bu'i spos dang / me tog dang / rgyan dang / gos dang / sil snyan dang / rol mo'o sgra la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i char mngon par 'bebs/ yongs su skyed
249b7(mdo sde): cing 'byin par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
249b8(mdo sde): 'khor nas/ sems can dag la gang nas sems can de dag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / gzi
250a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dang / yongs su skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyams su myong bar byed pa dang / mi nyam pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / 
250a2(mdo sde): shes rab kyis snang bar gyur pas/ rtag tu khyad par gyi rnam par 'dong bar 'gyur ba'i mdo sde dang / dbyangs kyis bstang ba'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du
250a3(mdo sde): brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / 'di lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i snga dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / gtan la
250a4(mdo sde): bab par bstan pa'i sde dag dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos rin po che'i me tog la sogs pa'i char mngon par 'beb/ so// rjes su 'thun pa dang / rjes su mi 'thun pa dang / snrel
250a5(mdo sde): zhi dang / spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud la sogs pa'i gtam rnam par gde na mi za ba nye bar bsgrub bo// tha snyad kyi dmigs pa tham sa cad la bdag med pa zhi zhing rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid
250a6(mdo sde): rjod cing ston la rnam par byang bar byed do// chos thams cad sgo kun tu yang dag par gzhol ba yongs su ston to// sgyu ma'i rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa nye bar sbyor ro// ye shes
250a7(mdo sde): sgyu ma rnam par rgyas par byed do// chos thams cad la dga' bar rtse ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyis sems can rnams yongs su rgyas par byed do// 'dri ba thams cad kyi lung bstan pas
250a8(mdo sde): tshim par byed do// mtha' dang dpung med pa'i rdzu 'phrul la mkhas pa skyed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsams kyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos
250b1(mdo sde): kyi gtam yang dag par rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil
250b2(mdo sde): 'khor yongs su bsags pa ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'od dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang
250b3(mdo sde): dge ba'i 'khor yug gi ri la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na/ gdul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa bla na med cing lus med
250b4(mdo sde): ba'i gnas 'gyur bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni bskal pa'i mthar thug ste/ 'jig
250b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus na/ gang gis stong / gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye/ ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / ri rab dang / khor yug ri dang / 
250b6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho la sogs par bcas pa kun nas 'jig cing rnam par 'thor ba dang / dmig med par byed cing na mkha'i rang bzhin du byed pa de lta bur stobs kyi shugs thogs pa med par ldang ngo // 
250b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang bskal pa mang por tshogs bsags pa'i sems can bsod nams ye shes sna tshogs rnam par bkod pa'i ri mthon po dang ldan
250b8(mdo sde): ba rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs su bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med par rab tu bskor
251a1(mdo sde): pa'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pas/ chos kyi phung po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang gis 'dul ba chos snang ba'i lhag mthong dam pa dang ldan pa bzod par mi
251a2(mdo sde): nus pa'i 'du byed kyi stobs thams cad mnyam par gzhog pa tshul byas nas yang dag par sems nang du gnas pa'i ting 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa la brten te srid pa dang / phung po dang / khams
251a3(mdo sde): dang / skye mched kyi 'du byed kyi lus thams cad bshig cing rnam par gtor te lus med par byas nas/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun btags pa rnam par bshig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad
251a4(mdo sde): las yongs su 'das pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzugs med pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzug das thams cad yongs su bstan pa rnam par bshig pas
251a5(mdo sde): gnas gyur pa/ rnam par dag pa/ phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug pa ra gnas pa/ rnam pa thams cad du mtha' dang bral ba rnams thob par byed pa lta bu kun nas rab tu gtong ste/ 
251a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsags pa ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / 
251a7(mdo sde): ri rab dang / 'od dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / dge ba'i khor yug ri la sogs pas/ yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
251a8(mdo sde): dang 'dul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa/ bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'gyur bar ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos
251b1(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
251b2(mdo sde): a la la de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan zhing / sems can rlabs po che rnams yongs su tshim par 'gyur ba'i chos bcu po 'di bstan pa bcom ldan
251b3(mdo sde): 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi gang la la chos 'di dag la mos shing nan tan bgyid na/ de dag thams cad ji snyed du gsungs pa'i phun
251b4(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa/ bde ba dang bcas pa yid bde ba dang bcas dpar thob par 'gyur te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa zhig bgyid na yang
251b5(mdo sde): gzhan gyi don la gzhol zhing tshe 'di dang / tshe rabs gzhan rgya phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang thob par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu
251b6(mdo sde): de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sems can gang de lta bu'i chos rnams la nan tan du byed pa de dag ni/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / kun tu rnam par bltas pa
251b7(mdo sde): dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ro// gang spong ba'i skyes bu glen pa de dag ni mun
251b8(mdo sde): nas du ba nas pa te/ sdug bsngal thams cad la sten pa'o// lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya'o// / bam po bzhi pa/ 
252a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dri ma med pa rnams yin/ ma chags
252a2(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ zhi ba rnams yin/ shes rab mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ ye shes mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid rjes su song ba rnams yin/ chos
252a3(mdo sde): thams cad na mkha'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid du mos pa rnams yin/ so sor mi rten pa rnams yin/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yin/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las
252a4(mdo sde): 'das pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de ngag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' dang / mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos
252a5(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' dang / mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltaste yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs
252a6(mdo sde): rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / 
252a7(mdo sde): reg rnams dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / bde
252a8(mdo sde): ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang / smad pas chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos
252b1(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang sngun du/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zla blta bu rnams yin no// 
252b2(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa dang / mthong na dga' ba rnams dang / chos dkar po rnams skye bar byed pa dang / ches nag po rnams 'bri
252b3(mdo sde): bar byed pa dang / rab tu bsngags pa rnams yin/ lus yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ bzhon pa mchog la zhon pa rnams yin/ rtag tu brgyan pa rnams yin/ 
252b4(mdo sde): chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa rnams yin/ 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi dbu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can
252b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa nas/ ltar na 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba shar na 'di ltar
252b6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad lus bsil ba dang / yid du 'ongs pas rab tu sel bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na'ang 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i
252b7(mdo sde): gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa dang / yid du 'ong bas sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
252b8(mdo sde): dper na/ zla ba shar na 'di lta ste/ zhi ba dang / dang ba dang / sems shin tu dga' bar byed pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub
253a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' zla ba shar na'ang 'di lta ste/ dbang po rnam par gsal ba dang / sems kyi rgyud dang ba dang / spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / yon
253a2(mdo sde): tan phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' shing yid du 'ong ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo la zla ba nya ste/ rnam pa thams cad du
253a3(mdo sde): rgyas par gyur gyi bar du nyi ma re re zhing 'phel lo// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang thog ma sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang
253a4(mdo sde): chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du nyi ma re re zhing chos dkar po rnams 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyu dar te/ nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar de na
253a5(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba mar gyi ngo la bab pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kha dog dang snang ba dang / chu zheng
253a6(mdo sde): yang yongs su 'bri ste/ bco lnga la ji ltar rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi mngon pa de ltar 'bri'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang / nam 'jig rten las 'das
253a7(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes thob par gyur pa de ni/ de'i mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du rab tu 'bri ste/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi snying po la thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur
253a8(mdo sde): ba de ltar rab tu 'bri'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba shar na bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mi rnams kyis rab
253b1(mdo sde): tu bsngags par byed pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na yang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rab tu bsngags par bya ba
253b2(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba'i lus 'di ltar rang gi bsod nams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa ni yongasu dag pa ste/ rnyog pa med cing dang ba dang gsal
253b3(mdo sde): ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i lus kyang 'di lta ste/ chos nyid kyis mngon par grub pa rdzus te skyes pa/ pha mi'i bsog pa dang mer mar po las byung ba ma yin te/ 
253b4(mdo sde): yongs su dag la rnyog pa med cing dang ba dang gsal ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba/ da ni bzhon pa mchog la zhon te gling bzhir snang bar byed de/ 
253b5(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa mchog la zhon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par snang bar byed do// 
253b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu brgyan cing rgyan ma rnyings pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang 'di ltar yon tan gyi rgyan rnams kyis rtag tu
253b7(mdo sde): brgyan pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par lha'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba la mos pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang
253b8(mdo sde): rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa yin gyi/ 'dod pas dga' ba la dga' ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni 'phrul
254a1(mdo sde): che zhing mthu che ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang 'di lta ste/ bsod nams chen po dang / ye shes chen pos 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ 
254a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa nas 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang
254a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 'dra ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba
254a4(mdo sde): rnams yin/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams yin/ phyogs bcu thams cad du dalhan ner byed pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos mngon par shar
254a5(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ de dag gi zag pa nub par gyur pa rnams yin/ snang bar byed pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can ngan pa'i lus rnams zil gyis mnan te 'dug pa rnams
254a6(mdo sde): yin/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa kun ston pa rnams yin/ chos dkar po'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung bar byed pa rnams yin/ skye bo dge ba dga' ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi
254a7(mdo sde): bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba nas ji ltar skye bo dge ba dga' ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na mun pa mun nag
254a8(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par sel to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na'ang ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na
254b1(mdo sde): pad+ma rnam par 'byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar ba na yang 'dul ba'i sems can gyi pad+ma rnam par 'byed par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na phyogs
254b2(mdo sde): bcu thams cad du lhan ner byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang phyogs bcu thams cad du shes rab kyi gzi brjid dang / ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis rab tu lhan ner byed kyang
254b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma'i 'od zer dag nam snang ba de'i tshe na shar ces bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems
254b4(mdo sde): dpa' nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od zer rnams nam snang ba de'i tsha na/ dge ba'i chos rnams shar ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi
254b5(mdo sde): ma'i snang ba nam med par gyur pa de'i tshe nub ces bya'o// / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i nyon mo ngas pa rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du nam med par gyur
254b6(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe na/ zag pa zad ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la snang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
254b7(mdo sde): nyi ma shar na yang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba byed cing / gti mug gi mun pa'i rab rib kyi khebs pa rnam par sel to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma
254b8(mdo sde): shar na 'od thams cad kyi 'od med par byed kyang / nyi ma ni nges 'od thams cad kyi 'od mi snang bar bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi 'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyur ro// 
255a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang / mu stegs can ngan pa'i 'od dang / mu stegs can ngan pa'i sum thams cad yod med par 'gyur 'od ci/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma
255a2(mdo sde): ni ngas 'di dag 'od med par bya'o snyam du mi sems te/ 'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la
255a3(mdo sde): mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa legs par ston to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang bas mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa
255a4(mdo sde): legs par ston to// rigs kyi bu mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig bla dag so// rigs kyi bu mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lam ngan pa'i tshig bla dag so// / 
255a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na rmo brko las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang / dge ba'i chos kyi
255a6(mdo sde): las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na skye bo dge ba ni dga' bar 'gyur la/ mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can dag mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// 
255a7(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang skye bo dge ba rnams dang / mkhas pa rnams dang / shes rab kyi rang bzhin rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur/ lam ngan par zhugs pa
255a8(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / byis pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba
255b1(mdo sde): dang / bya ngan las 'das pa las phyir phyogs pa'i rnams ni mi dga' bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma rig pa'i mun pasel ba nas/ skye bo na/ 
255b2(mdo sde): ba'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma lta bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
255b3(mdo sde): ge lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang she na 'di lta ste/ bag mi tsha ba rnams yon/ mi brtabs pa rnams yin/ mi zlogs pa rnams yin/ seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams yin/ mi 'jig
255b4(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ nags tshal dang nags kyi mdab na rgyu ba rnams yin no// ri'i phug na gnas pa rnams yin/ len pa med pa rnams yin/ bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / 
255b5(mdo sde): stobs dang mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde rab tu 'jom pa rna mas yin/ dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog srung ba rnams yin/ no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
255b6(mdo sde): bag mi tsha ba nas dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog srung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni gar 'gro yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas bag mi che
255b7(mdo sde): zhing mi skrag par 'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas gar 'gro yang bag mi che zhing mi skrag par 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta
255b8(mdo sde): ste dper na/ seng ge ni wa thams cad kyi sgras mi brtabs pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis brtsad pas brgal kyang mi
256a1(mdo sde): mi brtabs shing rgod pa dang zhum par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni bsgugs na phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub
256a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' seng ge yang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis bskugs na mi zlogs shing mi zhum par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni sgra gang gis ri dgas phra mo thams cad
256a3(mdo sde): dang rngawa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu sgrog go// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra gang gis bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par
256a4(mdo sde): zhen pa mu stegs can gyi ri dgas rnams dang / gzhan mu stegs can gyi wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer par 'gyur ba de lta bu sgrog ste/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge ni
256a5(mdo sde): bdag tu 'dzin pa las bzlog par bya ba dang / sems can gzhan dag 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtogs pa/ ra de dag la gnod par bya ba'i phyir bdag med pa'i seng
256a6(mdo sde): ge'i sgra mi sgrog go// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni kun tu lta yang mi 'jigs pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i nan
256a7(mdo sde): tan la lta yang mi 'jigs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni rang bzhin gyi nags tshal dang nags tshal gyi mdab na rgyu ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems
256a8(mdo sde): dpa' seng ge yang rang bzhin gyis dben pa la mngon du phyogs shing nags tshal dang / nags tshal gyi mdab na spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni
256b1(mdo sde): ri phug na gnas pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang ye shes kyi brag gi ri phug na gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni mi len par 'gro/ 
256b2(mdo sde): ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang nyon mongs pa'i khur thams cad bor zhing len pa med par 'gro ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni gcig pu
256b3(mdo sde): gnyis su med pa bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang mthu thob pas pha rol gyi sde 'jom mo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang gcig pu gnyis su med par byang chub
256b4(mdo sde): kyi snying po la 'dug nas bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde 'jom mo// rigs kyi bu da 'di lta ste/ grong gi mdab gang na seng ge rgyu ba der ri dgas
256b5(mdo sde): phra mo dag gis lo tog rnams chud mi gson to// de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na 'dug pa der mu stegs can gyi ri dgas
256b6(mdo sde): phra mo dag gis dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog chung mi gzon to// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bag mi che ba nas/ dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog srung ba'i bar du yin no// rigs
256b7(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge lta bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dul ba rnams yin no// 
256b8(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems brtan pa rnams yin/ byang chub kyi sems kyi byi dor shin tu byas pa rnams yin/ dbang po bsdams pa rnams yin/ 
257a1(mdo sde): lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/ khur chen po khyer ba rnams yin/ sems can gyi don rnams la yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin/ yang dag pas
257a2(mdo sde): 'tsho ba rnams yin// tshul bcos pa dang kha bsag gi snyed pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo sgyu dang bral ba rnams yin/ drang ba'i rang bzhin can drang ba rnams
257a3(mdo sde): yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dul ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' cang shes
257a4(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa med cing kun nas ldang ba
257a5(mdo sde): thams cad dang bral bas lam gyi rgyun ma chad pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' mi bcig pa sa bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dbyings
257a6(mdo sde): kyi tshul rtogs pas chos thams cad kyi tshul mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/ dma' ba dma' ba'i yid kyis gdol bu lta bur 'jig rten na spyod pa rnams yin/ rtag
257a7(mdo sde): tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod snyoms blang bar 'du shes nye bar bzhag pas/ nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di ltar de mngon sum du shes
257a8(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur med pa rnams yin/ chos rang gis rig pa'i phyir the tsom med pa rnams yin/ rang gis lam mthong bas gzhan gyis mi
257b1(mdo sde): bkri zhing pha rol gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin/ rab tu zhugs pas 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
257b2(mdo sde): dpa' cang shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ ma gos pa rnams yin/ 
257b3(mdo sde): sdig pa chung ngu dang yang lhan cig mi gnas pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims kyi dri zhim pa rnams yi ni/ gtsang ba rnams yin/ bzhin 'dzum pa rnams yin/ mi rtsub pa rnams
257b4(mdo sde): yin/ mthong na bkra shis pa rnams yin/ blo rnam par bye ba rnams yin/ blo yongs su smin pa rnams yin/ shin tu yongs su bzung ba rnams yin no// 
257b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma gos po yin pa nas/ ji ltar na shin tu yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 
257b6(mdo sde): pad+ma ni chu'i nang nas 'byung yang mi 'chags par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chu las 'byung
257b7(mdo sde): yang mi 'chags par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i thabs dang shes rab kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni 'khor ba na spyod
257b8(mdo sde): kyang 'khor ba'i nyes padag gis mi gos te/ de'i thabs de ni shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad+ma la chu'i thigs pa chung ngu yang mi
258a1(mdo sde): chags so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la sdig pa chung ngu yang mi chags so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa'i phyogs nang du pad+ma skyes par
258a2(mdo sde): pa'i sa phyogs de dris khyab par 'dug go// de bzhin du yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa de thams cad tshul khrims kyi dris khyab par 'dug go// rigs kyi bu
258a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ pad+ma ni sa'i phyogs gar skyes pa'i sa phyogs de gtsang zhing bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong ba dang / yul gyi mi thams cad kyang 'du ba yin no// de bzhin du byang
258a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gar skyes kyang rung 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang / gtsang sbra kun spyod pas gtsang ba da yin te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zo dang / 
258a5(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams 'du ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
258a6(mdo sde): kyis dgongs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad+ma ni kha byen 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi yid du
258a7(mdo sde): 'ong bas 'dzum pa lta bur snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang khro gnyer med cing dbang po shin tu dang bas bzhin rtag tu 'dzum pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
258a8(mdo sde): dper na/ pad+ma ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing mi rtsub pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing das kyis smra ba yin/ mi brlang shing mu tshar
258b1(mdo sde): mi smra ba'i rang bzhin can yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad+ma ni rmi lam dang ltas dang / yud tsam dag la mthong na yang 'di lta ste/ don 'grub pa'i phyir bkra shis shing rab tu
258b2(mdo sde): bsngags pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba yang 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba la dus thams cad du yang bkra shis shing rab tu bsngags/ 
258b3(mdo sde): ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad+ma ni nam rgyas pa de na rnam par bye ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang na mi shes rab dang / byang chub kyi
258b4(mdo sde): yan lag gi me tog rgyas pa de na/ blo rdzir bye ba zhesabya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad+ma ni nam yongs su smin par gyur pa de ni/ bltas na mig
258b5(mdo sde): gi dbang po tshim par byed/ mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po tshim par byed/ bsnams na sna'i dbang / po tshim par byed/ myangs na lce'i dbang po tshim par
258b6(mdo sde): byed reg na lus kyi dbang po tshim par byed/ sems rab tu dga' bas yid kyi dbang po tshim par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam shes rab kyi snang ba
258b7(mdo sde): yongs su smin par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bltas na mig gi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ tshul khrims dang yon tan gyi dri
258b8(mdo sde): bsnams na sna'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ myangs pa na lce'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ reg pa dang bsnyen bkur byed na lus kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ yon
259a1(mdo sde): tan rjod pa rnam par bsams pas yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'das ste dper na/ bdu ni skye ba'i/ 'di lta ste/ bad
259a2(mdo sde): ma yin pa dag gis shin tu yongs su bzung ba yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de ma yin pa
259a3(mdo sde): gzhan brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag gis shin tu yongs su bzung ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa nas shin tu longs
259a4(mdo sde): su bzung ba'i bar du yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma de lta bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ 
259a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa tham sa cad yang dag par bsgrub po zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// 
259a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// sems can thams cad gdul lo zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// byang chub kyi snying por 'dug ste/ 
259a7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten du dge
259a8(mdo sde): sbyong 'am/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang chos dang ldan par sngon mo bskor ba'i chos kyi ni na la zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// 'jig rten gyi
259b1(mdo sde): khams mtha' yas mu med par song ste/ sems can gyi don bya ba'i dngos po de dang de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// shes rab kyi gru sbyar te/ 
259b2(mdo sde): sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las pha rol tu bsgral lo zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// mgon med pa dang skyabs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang rten med pa dang
259b3(mdo sde): dpung gnyen med pa dang / rtsa lag med pa'i sems can rnams kyi rtsa lag bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs par bcas pa'i 'jig rten
259b4(mdo sde): dang dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / lha dang / mi dang // lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog nyid bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi seng/ 
259b5(mdo sde): ge'i sgra bsgrag go// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rnam par rtse'o// glang po che'i lta stangs kyis blta babya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi che bas
259b6(mdo sde): sems can rnams gdul bar bya'i spyod pa ngan pas ma yin/ bka' ba spyod pas ma yin/ zhan pa'i spyod pas ma yin/ zhum pa'i spyod pas ma yin no zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// / 
259b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par
259b8(mdo sde): dag pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bsam pa mi g.yo bas bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa la sgyu med pas bsam pa shin tu gan
260a1(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi byang chub la yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub med la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / brtson 'grus chung ba
260a2(mdo sde): yid la byed pa mi skyed pas tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral bas dri ma thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ 
260a3(mdo sde): sgra'i spyod lam dang bral bas lus kyi tshul 'chos dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste yang dag pa'i don kun ston pas ngag gi tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyis 'du
260a4(mdo sde): 'ji med pa dang ngag gis 'dod pa chung ba dang sems kyi smon pa med pa'i phyir/ sems kyi tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ cung zad byas pa yang chung mi gson
260a5(mdo sde): na mang po lta ci smos te/ byas pa bzo ba rnams yin/ byas pa tshor ba rnams yin te/ dgos pa byas pa la mi smod mi sbyang yon tan ma yin par mi lta ste/ gzhan du na chung/ 
260a6(mdo sde): zad byas pa yang tshor zhing de la ston par byed/ gzeng stod par byed/ yang dag par dga' bar byed/ rab tu bsngags par byed/ de la yon tan du lta ba yin no// ji ltar lta ba de ltar byed pa
260a7(mdo sde): rnams yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis snyan par ston cing sems kyis mi mthun par sems pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis ston cing sems kyis nga
260a8(mdo sde): du bya ba'i sbyor ba mi byed/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis 'jam par smra zhing sems kyis zhe la non te shar gnyer ba ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis nges pa
260b1(mdo sde): ston cing sems kyis khon gyi mdud par 'dzin pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis ri mo bya ba ston cing sems kyis brnyas par byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
260b2(mdo sde): rnams tshul mi 'chos kha gsag mi byed/ ser sna dang phrag dog gis kun tu grags pa ma yin/ sgyu dang g.yos mi spyod/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'thab sman mi byed/ phan tshun du dpa'
260b3(mdo sde): ba 'jug pa ma yin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis kyang ri mo skyed pa yin/ ngagi gis kyang yang dag ba'i don smra/  las su yang sgrub bo// byang chub sems dpa' rnams de
260b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur ba'i phyir zhugs dpa ma yin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bstan pa la skur pa rnams yin no// ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
260b5(mdo sde): bstan pa la skur pa ma btab pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang/ chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogasapa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// skra dang kha spu bregs
260b6(mdo sde): gos ngur smrig dag gon nas/ yang dag par dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo // de rab tu byung ba na rgyal pos mnar ba med par rab tu 'byung / rkun pos
260b7(mdo sde): 'tshe ba med pa dang / bu lon gyis 'tshe ba med pa dang / 'jigs pas 'tshe ba med pa dang / 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pas skrag pa med par rab tu 'byung ngo // de dang de rab tu byung nas dge
260b8(mdo sde): ba ci yin zhes tshol ba yin te/ de dge ba ci yin zhes tshol bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par byed/ bsten par byed/ bsnyen bkur byed do// de dag las chos kyang nyan to// / 
261a1(mdo sde): thos nas kyang nan tan du byed nga rgyal gyi zil gyis mnon pa yin te/ deng rgyal dang bral bas ma log par 'dzin pa yin/ ma log par 'dzin pas lam shin
261a2(mdo sde): tu rtogs pa 'thob bo// de lam shin tu rtogs pas chos nyid 'thob bo// chos nyid thob pas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs
261a3(mdo sde): pa'i bstan pa la skur pa ma btab pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ 
261a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems nem nur med pa rnams yin/ no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
261a5(mdo sde): gsung gi gsang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi/ gsang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par/ bsgrub pa dang / byang chub dang de bzhin gshegs pa
261a6(mdo sde): 'byung ba dang / theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa dang / tshul sna tshogs bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
261a7(mdo sde): 'dul ba la mngon par dad ngo do// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad pa nas/ ji ltar sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba
261a8(mdo sde): la mngon par dad pa'i bar du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang zhi ba'i sku dang mi mnyam pa'i sku dang / 
261b1(mdo sde): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sku dang / tshad med pa'i sku dang / phal la med pa'i sku dang / rdo rje'i sku zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de
261b2(mdo sde): nem nur med the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i
261b3(mdo sde): gsungs gi gsang ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa mngon tu lung ston pa dang / gsang ste
261b4(mdo sde): lung ston pa dang / ldem po dag gis kyang sems can rnams da la lung ston mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul dpa 'am/ ca co med de/ de'i phyir de la brdzun du smra ba'i
261b5(mdo sde): nyes pa mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni skyon thams cad spangs pa/ dri ma thams cad spangs pa/ rdul thams cad spangs pa/ 
261b6(mdo sde): yongs su gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ zhi ba/ dang ba/ yongs su dag pa/ rnyog pa med pa rnam par gsal ba ste/ gang de bzhin gshegs
