261b7(mdo sde): pa rnams la 'khrul pa 'am/ ca co 'byung ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med do zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem
261b8(mdo sde): nur med the tsom med de de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon
262a1(mdo sde): bar dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pas ci dgongs pa'i don gang sems dang 'grogs pa/ 
262a2(mdo sde): sems la gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gyur pa ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems
262a3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyis shes par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rtag par bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las shin tu
262a4(mdo sde): 'das pa dpag tu med pa rgya che ba yangs pa na mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa/ rtog ge thams cad kyi yul las 'das par thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho
262a5(mdo sde): na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem// nur med the tsom med pa yin te/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dad do// 
262a6(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di byang chub kyi rgyu byang chub kyi gzhi byang chub
262a7(mdo sde): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can gyi don la mngon du phyogs pa dang / sems can gyi bya ba dang / sems can gyi byed pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba dang // 
262a8(mdo sde): mi skrag pa dang / khur chen po khyer ba dang / mthu brtan pa dang / brtul ba brtan pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
262b1(mdo sde): mthar gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i blo dang / mtha' yas pa'i blo dang / mi mnyam pa'i blo dang / phal la med pa'i blo dang / brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / ga
262b2(mdo sde): brtan pa dang / dam bcas pa las mi g.yo ba dang / dam bcas pa phal la med pa de dag thams cad rim gyis 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes
262b3(mdo sde): thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par sgrub pa la mngon
262b4(mdo sde): par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dang / ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang byang chub sems
262b5(mdo sde): dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas/ lha'i mig chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa sgrib pa med pa 'thob bo// lha'i rna ba dang / gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon
262b6(mdo sde): gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa dang / dus gsum pa skad cig gcig pa dang ldan pas shes pa/ chags pa med
262b7(mdo sde): pa/ thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa 'thob bo// de'i phyir sems can gyi khams la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lta ste/ sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa// 
262b8(mdo sde): ngag gi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba rnams te/ log par lta ba'i las dang / chos yang
263a1(mdo sde): dag par blangs pa'i phyir/ rgyu de dang rkyen de dang / gzhi des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o// sems can
263a2(mdo sde): 'di rnams ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi legs pa spyod pa dang ldan pa yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba
263a3(mdo sde): rnams te/ yang dag par lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir/ rgyu dang rkyen de dang / gzhi des lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha'i nang du skye'o snyam nas
263a4(mdo sde): de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams nga la bltas te/ sems can gyi khams de nyid dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i las rnams rnam par lta'o// de yang 'di snyam
263a5(mdo sde): du sems te/ sngon bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas gang 'di ltar bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas nas/ gzhan yang rnam par sangs rgyas par bya'o zhes
263a6(mdo sde): dam bcas pa'i bdag gi smon lam de yongs su rdzogs so// bdag gi brnag pa de yongs su rdzogs so snyam mo zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu'o snyam
263a7(mdo sde): ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med the tsom med do// gang la byang chub sems dpa' de rnam par sangs rgyas pa de ni byang chub ces bya'o// bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas pas des na rdzogs/ 
263a8(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas shes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gcig gi
263b1(mdo sde): tshul bstan pa la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di theg pa ni gcig kho na ste/ 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de
263b2(mdo sde): kho na'o// 'di ni mi sla ba'o// 'di ni de bzhin no// ma nor ba'o// gzhan ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa gzhan rnams kyang 'di las 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam
263b3(mdo sde): bu'i gling na gang gling yod pa rnams ming gis tha dad par shes mos kyi/ 'on kyang de dag ni 'dzam bu'i gling du 'du'o// 'dzam bu'i gling la ston to// 'dzam bu'i gling gi grangs su 'gro'o// de'i
263b4(mdo sde): phyir na gling gcig kho na ste/ 'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling ngo // / de bzhin du theg pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs/ pa'i theg par 'du'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa la
263b5(mdo sde): gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa las byung ngo // de'i phyir theg pa ni gcig pa kho na ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de
263b6(mdo sde): nem nur med the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di
263b7(mdo sde): snyam du sems so// gang 'di mdo sde de dang de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa tshul sna tshogs bshad pa thob pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o 'di ni mi slu ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
263b8(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston to snyam te/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang/ 
264a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dang // ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs sgra'i dbyangs zab mo sa
264a2(mdo sde): mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
264a3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyi dbyangs kyang zab cing snyan pa yin na/ bskal pa brgya stong du mar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lta ci smos snyam ste/ gnas
264a4(mdo sde): 'di la de nem nur med the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon par dad do// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang
264a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du// 'dul ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems/ so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa dang bag la
264a6(mdo sde): nyal mkhyen te/ sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang / 'dul ba tha dod pa rnams la gsung sgra'i dbyangs gcig brjod pas/ the tsom gcod cing yongs su smin pa ji lta bzhin du sems can rnams
264a7(mdo sde): 'dul lo// sems can rnams kyang so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to// snyam byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam
264a8(mdo sde): par mi rtog go zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med the tsom med de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems
264b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad ngo // rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems nem nur med pa rnams yin/ 
264b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i 'thung gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/ zab cing
264b3(mdo sde): gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ rgya che zhing tshad med pa rnams yin/ bags kyis gzhol ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i ro dang lhan cig mi 'dug pa rnams yin/ ro gcig pa
264b4(mdo sde): rnams yon/ chu bo kun zeng pa rnams yin/ dus las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'byung po mang po'i gnas sa/ gyur pa rnams yin mo zad pa rnams yin/ rigs
264b5(mdo sde): bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po cher 'brulaganas su gyur pa yin pa nas/ ji ltar na mi zad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 
264b6(mdo sde): mtsho chen po na rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas te/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi thams cad kyis rin po che blang bas mi bzang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon tan
264b7(mdo sde): rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te// sems can thams cad kyi smon tan rin po che blang bas mi zad do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing
264b8(mdo sde): gting dpag dka' ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa yang zab cing sems can thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba
265a1(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di lta ste/ chu tshad med pas na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa
265a2(mdo sde): yang 'di lta ste/ blo tshad med pas na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po na bags kyis gzhol/ bags kyis 'bab/ bags kyis bab bo/ 
265a3(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bab bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
265a4(mdo sde): dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig/ da mi 'dug go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chos nyid do// de bzhin du byang chub sems
265a5(mdo sde): dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i ro dang mi dge ba'i grogs po/ rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid do// 
265a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po chu bo ji snyed 'bab pa de thams cad kyang ro gcig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste lan tsa'i ro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos
265a7(mdo sde): dkar po rnams ji skad sdung pa de thams cad ro gcig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i ro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni chu bo tshad med pa kun
265a8(mdo sde): zed kyang de la bri ba'am/ gang bar yang mi mngon no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu bo tshad med pa kun zed kyang de la bri ba 'am/ gang ba ro mo mngon no// 
265b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las mi yol lo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'dul bar bya ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus las mi yol
265b2(mdo sde): lo rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni 'byung po mang po'i gnas so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad dang chos dkar po thams cad kyi
265b3(mdo sde): gnas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi chu bcus kyang mi zad pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams
265b4(mdo sde): cad la chos ston pa mi zad pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa nas mi zad pa'i bar du yin no// rigs
265b5(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs/ kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo/ 
265b6(mdo sde): zhib pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad brtag pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam
265b7(mdo sde): pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du khong du chud pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ rten
265b8(mdo sde): cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' bo la mkhas pa rnams yin/ las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ smras pa'i don shes pa rnams yin/ 
266a1(mdo sde): don sang dag 'ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa rnams yin/ de khon la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba
266a2(mdo sde): ba la mkhas pa yin pa nas/ ji ltar na de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste 'did chags
266a3(mdo sde): kyi mes kun tu 'bar ro// rab tu 'bar ro// kun tu rab tu 'bar ro// kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ zhe sdang gi dub 'khrigs pa'i du ba 'tshubs pas rnam par rmongaso// kye ma'o// 
266a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ gti mug gi mun dpas mun nag tu gyur to snyam mo// de na 'di ltar sems da can 'di dag ni ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam sems te/ 
266a5(mdo sde): de dag gi 'byung ba yongs su tshol zhing chos thams cad la rtog go// chos thams cad la rtog pas chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad
266a6(mdo sde): kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos rnams sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab
266a7(mdo sde): tu shes pas/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab
266a8(mdo sde): la rnam par sems so// de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba za'i mo la rnam par sems pas/ las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par rtog ste/ de 'di snyam du dngos po med pa'i chos
266b1(mdo sde): rnams la/ las sna tshogs snang ba ni ngo mtshar to snyam du sems so// de ltar de blo zhib mo dang ldan pas sangs rgyas rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsungs pa tsam gyis
266b2(mdo sde): don shes so// des don shes pas don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs so// don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pas de kho na mthong ngo // de de kho na mthong bas sems can rnams 'khor
266b3(mdo sde): ba'i btson ra nas thar bar byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa nas de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de
266b4(mdo sde): dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnam ras yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// 
266b5(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bdag med par 'jog go// chos thams cad sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med
266b6(mdo sde): dang byed pa po dang / tshor ba po med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa dang / gsog gsob ste dbang phyug med pa dang / stong pa yang dag pa ma yin pa kun btags pa
266b7(mdo sde): dang rkyen las byung bar 'jog ste/ rigs kyi bu de la chos thams cad bdag med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// chos thams cad sems can med
266b8(mdo sde): ba srog med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po med
267a1(mdo sde): pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa dang / gsog gsob ste dbang phyug med pa dang / stong pa yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa dang / rkyen las byung / 
267a2(mdo sde): ba'o zhes bya ba 'di rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang chos nyid dang 'thun pa ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid las mi
267a3(mdo sde): 'khrul pa de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid la 'bab pa de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid ston pa de ni rigs pa'o// de yang de dag la spobs pas na de'i phyir rigs pas spobs pa rnams shes
267a4(mdo sde): bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
267a5(mdo sde): dpang gros ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// bcu dang zhen 'di lta ste/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi zad ba rnams yin/ slebs brdzun chags
267a6(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi btabs pa rnams yin/ spobs pa ma zhum pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi skrag pa rnams yin/ spobs pa phalal med pa rnams yin/ stobs pa zom gyis
267a7(mdo sde): mnon pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mthara' las pa rnams son/ sos yang dag par rig pa zab pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chas bcu pa de dag dung ldan na/  byang chub
267a8(mdo sde): ses dab tshul tsha mas pacan rnams san no/ gas kyi bu tshas bcung ldanas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dag pa rnangs pa sa rnams yin no//  tsu ma
267b1(mdo sde): lta ste/ 'dar 'dar po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ mi 'khrul pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ mi zhan pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ yeng yeng po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams
267b2(mdo sde): yin/ de dag gi spobs pa don dang bral ba ma yin/ tshig 'bru dang bral ba ma yin/ sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin/ dus dang bral ba ma yin/ rtsub pa ma yin/ mi gsal ba'i spobs pa ma yin no// 
267b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa 'dar 'dar po ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'khor gyi 'jigs pa'i bag tsha ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
267b4(mdo sde): spobs pa ni 'khrul pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo ba/ na zhing mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnam das kyi spobs pa ni mi zhan pa rnams yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
267b5(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor gyi nang du phyin na mi 'jigs mi skrag ste/ seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag mi dngang pa yin
267b6(mdo sde): no/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yang yeng po med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i spobs pa ni yang
267b7(mdo sde): yeng por 'gyur ba yin te/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni don dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/ 
267b8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos nyid ma thob pa rnams kyi ni don dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ chos nyid thob pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni tshig 'bru dang bral ba ma
268a1(mdo sde): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu bstan bcos kyi phyogs 'ga' shes pa rnams kyi ni tshig
268a2(mdo sde): 'bru dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
268a3(mdo sde): sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu sbyor ba la mi mkhas pa rnams kyi ni sbyor ba dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ sbyor ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni ma yino/ 
268a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni/ gang phyis da smra bar bya ba de ni sngar smra ba 'am/ gang sngor smra bar bya ba/ de phyis smra ba lta bur dus dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
268a5(mdo sde): zhe na/  byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dus shes pa min/ tshad shes pa yin/ dus shes pa yin/ byang chub sem/ sa dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba mi
268a6(mdo sde): snyam pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngag gi gnas ngan len dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gnas ngan len dang bcas pa rnams kyi spobs pa ni rtsub pa yin gyi/ gnas ngan len dang
268a7(mdo sde): bral ba rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi gsal ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dbang po rtul po rnams kyi spob
268a8(mdo sde): pa ni mi gsal ba yin gyi/ dbang po rnon po rnams kyi ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams yino// / 
268b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'jam par smra ba rnams yin// 
268b2(mdo sde): bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin/ don du smra ba rnams yin/ chos su smra ba rnams yin/ mtshungs par smra ba rnams yin/ mi ngom pa rnams yin/ brnyas pa dang bral ba
268b3(mdo sde): rnams yin/ nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med pa rnams yin/ 'khrug pa med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa sna tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jam par smra ba ni/ 
268b4(mdo sde): 'jam par smra bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' ni bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa yin te/ mdang bzang pos sems can rnams mgu
268b5(mdo sde): bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' don tu smra ba ni tshig ran pas sems can rnams 'gu bar byed do// byangachub sems dpa' chos su smra ba ni phan par smra bas sems
268b6(mdo sde): can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs par smra ba ni sems can thams cad la mtshungs par chos ston pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang
268b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mi ngom pa ni nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa dang bral zhing spyod pa mtshungs pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i rnyas pa dang
268b8(mdo sde): bral ba ni ri mor byas shing chos bstan pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med pa yin/ ngang tshul nges pas sems can rnams
269a1(mdo sde): mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa med pa ni bzod pa mang bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// rags kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spong sa/ 
269a2(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs can ni dga' ba'i tshig gis sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed
269a3(mdo sde): pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshig gzung ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snod du ma
269a4(mdo sde): gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos mi ston te/ zhe 'grus dpa rnams la ma yin/ glan ka tshol ba rnams la ma yin// mu stegs can rnams la ma yin/ ri mo med pa rnams
269a5(mdo sde): la ma yin/ ma dad pa mang ba rnams la ma yin/ g.yo dang sgras glags pa rnams la ma yin/ 'chol ba'i bsamab can rnams la ma yin/ rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang / 
269a6(mdo sde): phrag dog dang / ser snas glags pa rnams la ma yin/ sems can glon pa rmongs pa lugs ltar lkug pa'i rang bzhin can rnams la chos mi ston to// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub
269a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna yang med/ chos la slob dpon 'chab pa yang med/ sems can rnams la ri mor mi byed pa yang med/ sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa yang med
269a8(mdo sde): mod kyi sems can 'di dag ni de bzhini gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'i snod du ma gyur pa'o zhes btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad
269b1(mdo sde): rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na sems can ci 'dra ba rnams la sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
269b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu sems can dad pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to// sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa rnams dang / snod du gyur pa rnams dang / 
269b3(mdo sde): sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa'i rnams dang / g.yo med pa rnams dang / sgyu med pa rnams dang / spyod lam mi 'chos pa rnams dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti la chags pa dang bral ba rnams dang
269b4(mdo sde): bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes nga gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa rnams dang / tshul bzang po dang ldan pa rnams dang / legs par ston nus pa rnams
269b5(mdo sde): dang / dbang po rno ba gang bshad pa'i don rig par 'gyur/ ba de thob par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin byed
269b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu dag la/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
269b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' tshig gzung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos rjod pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yang
269b8(mdo sde): dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi dmigs so// pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang pha
270a1(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi dmig so// byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ chos ston kyang byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi
270a2(mdo sde): dmig so// nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston kyang nyon mongs pa spangs pa yang mi dmigs so// skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa'i phyir chos ston kyang skyo ba dang 'dod chags
270a3(mdo sde): dang bral ba dang 'gog pa yang mi dmigs so// rgyun tu zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ chos ston kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa yang mi
270a4(mdo sde): dmigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba yang mi dmigs/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang mi dmig/ des so// dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir
270a5(mdo sde): chos ston kyang dgra bcom pa dang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu/ yang mi dmigs so// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ chos ston kyang rang sangs rgyas dang
270a6(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yang mi dmigs so// bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir/ chos ston kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa yang mi dmigs las kyi rnam par smin pa/ 
270a7(mdo sde): yang 'jog mod kyi/ las ngang las kyi rnam par smin pa yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos gang ming gang gis rjod pa de ming nges yod pa ma yin no// 
270a8(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid ni yi ge'i rang bzhin ma yin/ yi ge rnams ni chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ma yin mod kyi kun rdzob kyi bden pa la rten/ tha snyad la brten brtags pa la
270b1(mdo sde): brten te/ ming med pa'i chos rnams la ming du 'jog ste/ ming de yang gsob bo gsog go// gang gsob dang / gsog de la don dam pa med do// gang la don dam pa med pa de brdzun te/ slu bar
270b2(mdo sde): chos so// gang brdzun zhing slu ba'i chos de ni byis pa'i skye bo slu ba'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos rjod pa rnams yin no// / 
270b3(mdo sde): dkon mchog sprin/ bam po lnga pa// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di
270b4(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi rje su'ang 'brang la/ gzugs las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
270b5(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ 'dod pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung // chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ gzugs kyi khams
270b6(mdo sde): las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ gzugs med pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ chos las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang
270b7(mdo sde): la chos las 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur/ chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ sems can gyi phyir yang mi 'brang / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ chad par lta ba'i phyir yang mi 'brang / 
270b8(mdo sde): chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ lam las kyang mi 'byung ste/ de ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi phyir ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu pa de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
271a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no// / 
271a2(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ shes rab can rnams yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa thams cad
271a3(mdo sde): dang bral ba rnams yin/ shin tu yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pa rnams yin/ stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ dmigs par lta ba
271a4(mdo sde): dang bral ba rnams yin/ lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/ de kho na mthong ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byangang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i bshes
271a5(mdo sde): gnyen tshol te/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong nas dga' zhing rangs te/ de la ston par 'du shes skyed cing de la brtan te gnas so// de dge ba'i bshes gnyen la
271a6(mdo sde): brten pas na/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// brtson 'grus brtsams
271a7(mdo sde): pas na sgrib pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa med cing lam gyi rgyun ma chad pas shin tu yongasu dag cing lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 
271a8(mdo sde): de shin tu yongs su dag pas gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pa yin no// de gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pas stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba yin no// stong pa nyid la sgom pa
271b1(mdo sde): mang bas dmigs pa'i lta bar mi 'gyur ro// de dmigs pa'i lta ba dang bral bas lam du 'jug go// de lam du zhugs pas de kho na mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad
271b2(mdo sde): rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de kho na zhes bgyi ba de ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ de kho na zhes bya ba 'di ni yang
271b3(mdo sde): dag pa'i don gyi tshig bla dgas so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang mi slu ba de ni yang
271b4(mdo sde): dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi slu ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkanga' stsal pa/ de ni de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin
271b5(mdo sde): nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ci/ lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
271b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos 'di ni so sor rang gis rig pa yin 'di ni yo ga dag gis gdams par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di ni yi ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa
271b7(mdo sde): smra ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ tshig gi sbed yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ ngag gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ spros pa thams
271b8(mdo sde): cad dang bral ba/ blang ba dang dor ba thams cad dang bral ba/ phye ba dang btsums pa thams cad dang bral ba/ rtog ge thams cad dang bral ba/ brtag par bya ba ma yin pa
272a1(mdo sde): rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma dang bral ba/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul las yang
272a2(mdo sde): dag par 'das pa/ byis pa'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ bdud thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag par
272a3(mdo sde): 'das pa/ rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ gnas pa ma yin pa mi gnas pa/ zhi ba 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul te/ de dag nyid kyi so so rang
272a4(mdo sde): gis rig pa dri ma med pa gos pa dang / rnam par dag pa gya nom pa mchog dam pa/ phul brtag pa brtan pa/ ther zug mi 'jig pa'i chos can yin te/ de bzhin gshegs
272a5(mdo sde): pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung / chos kyi dbyings 'di ni 'dug pa kho na'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid thos nas/ sems can dag kyang
272a6(mdo sde): chos nyid 'di kho na la rab tu dgod do snyam ste/ don gang gi phyir 'bad cing rtsol ba dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dka' ba brgya dag byed pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// 
272a7(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings shes bya'o// gnyis su med pa'i
272a8(mdo sde): dbyings shes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ji ltar mngon du bgyi ji ltar khong du chud par bgyi/ bcom
272b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis mngon du bya'o// rang gis rig par khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad
272b2(mdo sde): rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyis mngon tu bgyi ba de/ rang gis rig pa khong du chud pa nyid ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
272b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyis ni chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo // lus kyis ni mngon tu byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad
272b4(mdo sde): rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu gang dag gis thos pa las byung ba 'am/ bsam pa las byung ba'i shes pas khong du chud par gyur pa de rang
272b5(mdo sde): gis rig pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin te/ thos pa tsam 'am/ bsam pa tsam gyis ni rang gis rig
272b6(mdo sde): pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'brog chen por sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la mi la la zhig shar phyogs
272b7(mdo sde): nas nub phyogs su 'gro la/ de nas mi gzhan zhig nub phyogs nas shar phyogs su 'ong ste/ de yang sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs par gyur nas skom gyis nyen pa de/ 
272b8(mdo sde): shar phyogs nas 'ong ba'i mi de la 'di skad ces smras pa/ kye skyes bu kho bo sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs te skom gyis nyen na/ gang na mtsho 'am/ lteng ka 'am/ rdzing gang chu
273a1(mdo sde): ba sil ba dang rnyog pa med pa gsal bas gang ba yod de/ gang du bdag tsha ba dang skom pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i lam bdag la ston cig ces zer la/ shar
273a2(mdo sde): phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i mi de yang lam shes pa lam la mkhas pa/ lam mthong ba lam gyi mtshan ma mthong ba zhig yin te/ des de na chu'i nyes pa dang bral ba'i chu sngan chad mthong la
273a3(mdo sde): sngon myangs shing sngon yang zhugs pa yin te/ des mi de la 'di skad du kye grogs po la ma 'di nas lam kha brag mthong gi bar du song la/ kye skyes bu khyod kyis g.yon gyi lam bor te
273a4(mdo sde): g.yas kyi lam nas nags tshal sngon po dang nags tshal de'i da dbus na/ mtsho 'am/ lteng ka 'am/ rdzing chu bsil zhing dang brnyog pa med pa gsal bas gang ba
273a5(mdo sde): mthong gi bar du song la/ der skyes bu khyod skom pa dang / tsha ba med par byos shig ces zer na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su
273a6(mdo sde): gdungs te/ skom gyis nyen pa'i mi des/ chu thos ma thag dang / bsams pa tsam gyis tsha ba med par 'gyur ram/ skom pa dang bral bar 'gyur ram/ chu de'i bsil ba yang
273a7(mdo sde): rang gis rig par 'gyur ram gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das mi de nam der phyin nas/ des chu der zhugs te 'tshal bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ 
273a8(mdo sde): mi de tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// skom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro// des bsil ba yang rang gis rig par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du
273b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu thos pa tsam dang / bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so// de la rigs kyi bu 'brog ces bya ba de ni 'khor ba'i 'brog gis tshig bla dgas so// mi sos
273b2(mdo sde): ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs shing skom gyis nyen pa zhes bya ba de ni/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung bas yongs su gdungs shing yul gyi srid pas nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshig bla dgas
273b3(mdo sde): so/ lam shes pa'i mi zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la mkhas pa chos myong ba chos rang gis rig pa rnams kyi tshig bla dgas so// chu bsil zhing
273b4(mdo sde): dang la rnyog pa med pa/ gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ni don dmapa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// yang rigs kyi bu dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems
273b5(mdo sde): gal te de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs ste 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi mdun du 'di lta ste// lha'i bdud rtsi dri zhim pa dang gtsang ba dang / gya nom pa
273b6(mdo sde): dang shin tu zhim pa dang / reg na bde ba las brtsams te bsngags pa brjod rigs kyi bu de ji snyam sems ci sems can de dag gis lha'i bdud rtsi de'i bsngags pa rang
273b7(mdo sde): gis rigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu lta bas na/ khyod kyis rnam grangs
273b8(mdo sde): 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam 'am/ bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di/ 
274a1(mdo sde): ste dper na/ mi zhig gis shing rtog gis rnam par sngon sems can sus kyang ma myangs pa zhig myangs par gyur la/ nges mi gzhan zhig gi mdun du shing rtog
274a2(mdo sde): gi rnam pa de'i bsngags pa 'di lta ste/ kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang / ro phun sum tshogs pa dang / dri zhim pa las brtsams te/ brjod na rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ tsi mi des
274a3(mdo sde): shing tog gi ro de rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ khyod kyis rnam
274a4(mdo sde): grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam 'am/ bsam pa tsam gyi/ sa so so rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi/ nus par rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
274a5(mdo sde): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol ba bcom ldan 'das legs par gsungs so// bde bar gshegs pa shin tu legs par gsungs so// 
274a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi tshul 'di su dag gi rnar thos par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di khong du chud pa nyid du rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
274a7(mdo sde): 'das rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di thos par bgyi ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te// 
274a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di thob par bya ba la/ 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la
274b1(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ 
274b2(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ tshul khrims kyi phung por stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung
274b3(mdo sde): po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ shes rab kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong
274b4(mdo sde): ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ stong pa'i stong pa de nyid kyang rab tu shes/ don dam pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes te/ de'i rgyu dang de'i rkyen de dang gzhi des stong
274b5(mdo sde): pa nyid du dmigs pa dang / stong pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid la gnas pa'ang mi dmigs rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi des med par yang mi ltung
274b6(mdo sde): ngorigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma mang
274b7(mdo sde): pa la gnas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ phyi rol gyi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/ nang gi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams
274b8(mdo sde): yin rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rgyu ba thams cad dang
275a1(mdo sde): bral ba rnams yin/ dmigs par bya ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa rnams yin/ rnam par shes par bya ba'i
275a2(mdo sde): dngos po mi dmigs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
275a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan ma ma mchis pa la gnas pa yang de 'dra na/ de bzhin
275a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi ci 'dra bar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
275a5(mdo sde): bsam pa'i yul dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes su bsams na/ sems can thams cad mos par 'gyur gyi// de bzhin
275a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i chos nyid kyi pha rol tam tshu rol mthong bar mi 'gyur/ mi dmigs te/ tha mar na dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin
275a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni zab cing gting dpag dka' la bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tu med pa rgya che ba na mkha' dang 'dra ba rtog ge pa thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa/ dmigs pa can thams
275a8(mdo sde): cad kyi yul las 'das pa ste/ de ni brtag pa 'am/ bsam pa 'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ tshad gzung bar mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ 
275b1(mdo sde): gsol pa/ gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
275b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phyes khyod dris shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib
275b3(mdo sde): pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bdag bstod na ni bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa'i chos su gsungs na/ de ji ltar chos kyi rje/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la
275b4(mdo sde): bdag la bstod pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/ stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyis dri ba tshul bzhin du dris so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir
275b5(mdo sde): legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ bcom
275b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'di dag la ci nas kyang / phan pa dang bde ba dang / 
275b7(mdo sde): chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag stod pa ma gtogs par/ nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pa dang rnyed pa'i zil gyis non pa dang / bkur bsti'i zil gyis non pa dang / grags pa 'dod
275b8(mdo sde): pa dang shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i phyir tshul 'chos pa 'am/ kha gsag med cing yang dag pa ma yin par bdag bstod pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin
276a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa la dga' ba dang dad pa dang / rangs pa nye bar gzhag pas chos bston pa'i skal ba yod par 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur te/ 
276a2(mdo sde): de yang de dag la yun ring por don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 
276a3(mdo sde): sems can 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ma 'tshal ta ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi
276a4(mdo sde): zhing 'di'i sems can rnams ni rgya chung ngu la mos pa/ dman tshegs la mos pa/ shes rab chung ba/ dad pa chung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus brtan pa dag ste/ de
276a5(mdo sde): dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba mi shes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag nyid bad ga gi yon tan gyis bsngags pa brjod pa mdzad de// 
276a6(mdo sde): de'ang nan gyi sgrub bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sman pa mkhas pa zhig yod la sems can rnams kyang nad kyis nyen par gyur/ sa'i phyogs de na'ang / sman pa de gcig pur
276a7(mdo sde): zad de rnga gnyis su med la/ de'i yon tan gyi che ba sus kyang mi shes pa dang / de nas sman pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni sdug bsngal ba nad kyis nyen pa/ sman
276a8(mdo sde): la mi mkhas pa gnod pa la sten pa yin gyis/ bdag gis de dag gso bar bya'o snyam nas/ sman pa des sems can de dag gi mdun du/ kye sems can dag bdag ni sman pa sten
276b1(mdo sde): nad la mkhas pa'o// nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa'o// sman la mkhas pa'o zhes bdag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa bdag nyid kyis brjod pa dang / sems can de dag 'di ni sman pa'o zhes bya bar
276b2(mdo sde): shes shing / yid ches par gyur nas sman pa de la rten to// de nas sman pa de sems can de dag gso zhing nad de zhi bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ sman pa de bdag la bstod
276b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa yang sman pa'i rgyal po chen po bla na med pa ste/ 
276b4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i nang la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nad gso ba la/ mkhas pa/ chos kyi sman pa chen po stobs pa yin
276b5(mdo sde): kyang nga nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis mi shes te/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nang par gyur pa'i sems can rnams gzigs nas/ 
276b6(mdo sde): de dag gi mdun du bdag gi yon tan dang bsngags pa bdag nyid brjod de/ de nas nyon mongs pa'i nad par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngag
276b7(mdo sde): pa'i che ba thos nas yid ches par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la rten to// de nas de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po chen po chos kyi sman de dag gis nyon
276b8(mdo sde): mongs pa'i nang rab tu zhi bar mdzad de/ chos kyi sman chen po de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa dang / byams pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sogs pa ste/ 
277a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas/ bdag la bdag nyid stong pa mdzad do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
277a2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa la smon kyang sbyin pa la mi gnas pa rnams yin/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / 
277a3(mdo sde): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / khams gsum po dang / byang chub dang lam dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la smon kyang mya ngan las 'das pa
277a4(mdo sde): la mi gnas pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir/  zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas thams cadad dang bral ba ste/ mi gnas par 'jig rten thams cad du
277a5(mdo sde): rnam par spyod do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu
277a6(mdo sde): chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i bdag nyid can yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nyi tshe ba med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ tha dad pa med pa'i
277a7(mdo sde): byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ chos kyi byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ nges par rtog pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod pa med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa
277a8(mdo sde): rnams yin/ phan pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod sems med pa'i byams pa dang
277b1(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams yin/ phyogs bcu kun tu khyab pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag
277b2(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// 
277b3(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can sdug bsngal ba dang / skyabs med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / rten med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dag mthong na/ byang chub tu sems bskyed/ 
277b4(mdo sde): ngongang byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ chos nyid thob de bar bya ba'i phyir 'bang rtsol/ brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ dadaka' bar spyod pa brgya dag kyang byed do// de dag chos thob
277b5(mdo sde): nas sems can rnams la phan par byed do// 'di lta ste/ sems can ser sna can rnams sbyin pa la gzhon/ par byed/ tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams tshul khrims
277b6(mdo sde): lang gnod sems can rnams bzod pa la/ le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la/ sems 'khrug po rnams bsam gtan la/ sems can shes rab 'chal pa rnams mthong nas
277b7(mdo sde): shes rab la gzhog par byed kyang / sems can gyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba dag gis nyen cing / byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu tshu cu po de dag dang / 
277b8(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no// bcu
278a1(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ni 'khor ba'i brtson ra rab tu 'bar ba nas byung ba'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag gis 'khor ba'i dbyang thag yun ring po nas
278a2(mdo sde): thogs pa chod do zhes dga' ba skyed do// bdag ni rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs mang po'i chu srin gyis dkrug pa'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal to zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do// bdag gis yun ring
278a3(mdo sde): po nas bsgreng ba'i nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bskal lo zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do// bdag gis nyon mongs pa'i ri rnams ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ ji ltar rdul kyang mi sdong ba de ltar
278a4(mdo sde): bcom mo zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag nyid ni dbug das phyin pa yin gyis da ni gzhan yang dbugs dbyung bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag nyid ni 'jig
278a5(mdo sde): rten gnas pa yun ring po nas gnyid la sred pa'i snyoms pas yongs su zin pa gti mug gis bsgribs pa'i nang na/ sad pa yin gyis da ni gzhan yang rnam par sad par
278a6(mdo sde): bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag nyid ni ngan 'gro dang ngan song dang log par ltung ba thams cad las rnam par grol ba yin gyis da ni gzhan yang ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung
278a7(mdo sde): ba thams cad las rnam par grol bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par yun ring po nas 'khyams te/ grogs med cing gnyis su med par gar yang
278a8(mdo sde): 'khyam zhing lam la mi mkhas la lam la mi shes shing yul mi shes pas lam stor ba rnyed do zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer dang nye bar gyur to/ 
278b1(mdo sde): zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'/ 
278b2(mdo sde): btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ mig gis rnam par
278b3(mdo sde): shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams kyis smras par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma byung bar mi 'gyur ba rnams dang / de bzhin du rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang / snas
278b4(mdo sde): rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang / lus kyis rnam pa/ shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par
278b5(mdo sde): shes par bya ba'i chos rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams kyis smas par mi 'gyur/ gnod par
278b6(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ rma byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ 'du
278b7(mdo sde): byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis smas par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bya ba byas pa'i
278b8(mdo sde): sems can rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ de dag la dga' ba dang dad pa dang / rangs pa skyed cing de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bsgral bar bya ba
279a1(mdo sde): de dag nyid rgal bar gyur te zhes btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la
279a2(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ shi 'pho'ang ston/ skye ba
279a3(mdo sde): 'ang ston/ btsas pa dang byis pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyis nang na rtse ba'ang ston/ mngon par byung ba yang ston/ dka' ba spyod pa'ang ston/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'ang ston/ bdud 'dul ba
279a4(mdo sde): yang ston/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang ston/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'ang ston/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang ston to// de nas bcom
279a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen gang gis byang chub sems dpa' dga'
279a6(mdo sde): ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas shi 'pho ston pa nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho
279a7(mdo sde): brang dam pa nas/ sems can gang dag rtag par 'du shes pa yod pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad las khyad zhugs pa 'jig rten thams cad las
279a8(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags pa 'jig rten kun gyi phul du byung ba mi nyam pa/ 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyis ma gos ma chags pa/ shi 'pho bar mthong na rtag pa'i 'du shes ldog cing mi
279b1(mdo sde): rtog pa'i 'du shes 'byung ste/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes la gnas pas/ bag yod pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa na/ sems can gang dag bag med par
279b2(mdo sde): spyod pa yod pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba yod/ dad pa yod/ rangs pa yod kyang yul la mngon par zhen pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung du mi 'dong mi sten bsnyen bkur
279b3(mdo sde): mi byed cing / de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' yang bzhugs la bdag cag kyang 'khod de dus kyang ring du yod kyis 'dong bar bya'o snyam du sems pa/ de dag gis bag
279b4(mdo sde): med pa zlog pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' 'chi 'pho ston te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' shi 'pho mthong nas/ skyo ba la gnas par 'gyur zhing de dag skyo bar
279b5(mdo sde): gyur nas/ bag med pa mi byed de/ bag yod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag skyo bas
279b6(mdo sde): 'dul ba yod pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug pa'i mthu mthong na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
279b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug bzhin du chos ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa'
279b8(mdo sde): btsas pa dang / byos pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyi nang ni 'dug pas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams
280a1(mdo sde): bsrung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyi nang na 'dug pa ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub
280a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba dang / rab tu 'byung bas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba ston cing rab tu
280a3(mdo sde): 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin la sogs pa spyod pa dman pa la mos pa/ byang chub sems dpas dka' ba'i spyad pas yongs
280a4(mdo sde): su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang / mu stegs can gzhan tshar gcad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa ston to// rigs
280a5(mdo sde): kyi bu sems can gang dag gis yun ring po nas bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i tshe/ mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya'o zhes smon
280a6(mdo sde): lam btab pa yod pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po 'gro ba ston la/ de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba la so so'i tshul bzhin du mchod pa byed do// 
280a7(mdo sde): de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang
280a8(mdo sde): rgyags pa dang / dregs pas rlom pa yod de/ de dag de las bzlog pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing / bdud btul ba ston to// sems can gang
280b1(mdo sde): zhi ba la gnas pa de dag de las gong du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ston te/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mngon par
280b2(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sgra sna tshogs dang / ca co sna tshogs gang yod pa de dag thams cad med cing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i khams
280b3(mdo sde): kyang zhi bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis mthu de mthong nas bdag cag kyang de ltar byang chub kyi snying po la 'khod do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
280b4(mdo sde): rgya bar bya'o zhes smon lam 'debs so// rigs kyi bu sem das can gang sten par bkur ba dang / ston par khas 'che la/ de dag gis 'byung ba dang / phyi ma'i chos
280b5(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa yod pa de dag tshar gcad pa dang / sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin cing snod du gyur pa rnams la lam bstan pa'i
280b6(mdo sde): phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ ka shi ka'i grong rdal du song nas lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyis 'khor lo skor ro// 
280b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas 'dul ba yod de dag 'dul ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ston te/ rigs kyi
280b8(mdo sde): bu 'di ni rgyu 'di ni rkyen te/ des byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas/ shi 'pho ston cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston te/ rigs kyi bu
281a1(mdo sde): chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ 
281a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mi dge ba'i chos las phyir ldog pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas
281a3(mdo sde): bslab pa bcas pa las mi 'da' ba rnams yin/ ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams yin/ bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin// 
281a4(mdo sde): shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ smon lam phun sum nga tshogs pa rnams yin/ skyo ba mang ba rnams yin/ brtson
281a5(mdo sde): 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dra/ bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye zhing de dag tu
281a6(mdo sde): skyes nas kyang / tshor ba mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yun ring por gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la
281a7(mdo sde): gnod pa'i sems skyed par 'gyur ba de lta bur mi 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa yin te/ de ltar na de ni sems can
281a8(mdo sde): dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las 'da' ba gang gis dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 
281b1(mdo sde): de dag tu skyes nas kyang dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong bar 'gyur ba med do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni gang ser snar 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dang rkyen de dag gni des yi dgas kyis
281b2(mdo sde): nang du skye zhing de dag tu skyes nas kyang yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal mi bzang ba rtsub pa myong bar 'gyur bar med do// byang chub sems dpa'i ni gang du skyes pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs
281b3(mdo sde): pa 'thob pa'i rkyen dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i log par lta ba'i rigs su mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sngon spyad pa ste/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa yin
281b4(mdo sde): pas de dag yang dag par lta ba'i rigs su skye ba yin te/ de dag tu skyes nas kyang rkyen phun sum tshogs/ par 'gyur zhing / rkyen de dag de bas kyang 'phel ba dang
281b5(mdo sde): rgyas pa dang rangs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa/ ni dbang po ma tshang ba'i rnam pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du mi rung bar 'gyur bar dbang po
281b6(mdo sde): dang mi ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bsod nams bya ba la brtson zhing bsod nams kyis brtan pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam chos
281b7(mdo sde): sam dge 'dun la bya ba gang byas shing bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / mang du byas pas/ dbang po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i bya ba de dang de dag byed cing
281b8(mdo sde): dbang po phun sum tshogs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams mtha' 'khob kyi yul gang na sems can blun po rmongs
282a1(mdo sde): pa lug ltar lkug pa'i ngang tshul can/ skal ba med pa legs par bshad pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don shes par bya ba'i mthu med pa/ sangs rgyas
282a2(mdo sde): kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa/ mar mi 'dzin pa/ phar mi 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa bram zer mi 'dzin pa dag gis nang du mi skye'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus kyi yus
282a3(mdo sde): gang na sems can dbang po rno ba dbang po gsal ba/ mkhas pa mkhas par bkur ba/ skal ba yod pa/ legs par bshad pa dang / nyes par bshad pa'i don yongs su shes par bya/ 
282a4(mdo sde): pa'i mthu yod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa/ mar 'dzin pa dang / phar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/ bram zer 'dzin pa dag gi nang du
282a5(mdo sde): skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon gyi shes rab dang ye shes kyi/ stobs kyi mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang na gnas pas sangs rgyas skyes
282a6(mdo sde): pa du ma 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi don 'grib par 'gyur ba/ lha tshe rings po'i nang du mi skye'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams nyid du gang
282a7(mdo sde): sems can gdul bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas skyes pa mnyes par byar yod par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
282a8(mdo sde): gang na sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa dang / chos mi thos pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byar med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu mi skye'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
282b1(mdo sde): ni dkon mchog gsum phun sum tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
282b2(mdo sde): gnas de lta bu dag thos kyang skyo ba mi mang ba dang / chu rgod kyi ngang tshul can ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gnas 'di lta bu dag thos ma thag tu skye bar 'gyur te skyo bar gyur
282b3(mdo sde): nas mi dge ba'i chos 'di dag spang ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i chos rnams brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa brgyad
282b4(mdo sde): rnam par spangs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sem/ sa ma stor ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 
282b5(mdo sde): g.yo dang sgyu med de drang zhing gya gyur med la sems dang ba rnam sa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang de 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la yid gnyis dang ner nur dang
282b6(mdo sde): the tsom med pa rnams yin/ chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyis ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las kyi mtha'
282b7(mdo sde): dang bral ba rnams yin/ ji skad du smras pa de lta bur byed de mi slu ba rnams yin/ theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin/ de yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la
282b8(mdo sde): chos mtshungs pa'i 'du shes kyis zhes dang bcas ri mo dang bcas pa rnams yin/ theg pa chen po la gzhol theg pa chen po la 'bab pa/ theg pa chen po la bab pa rnams yin
283a1(mdo sde): chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston par 'du shes pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed pa rnams yin te rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan
283a2(mdo sde): nabyang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs dran pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta
283a3(mdo sde): ste/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa rnams yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ 'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/ 
283a4(mdo sde): sgrib pa med pa rnams yin/ dga' ba mang ba rnams yin// sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ sems mnyam parabazhag pa rnams yin/ rdzus te skye ba rnams yin/ rnam
283a5(mdo sde): par shes pa ma rmongs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi busangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dam pa'i chos la rim gro yod cing / 
283a6(mdo sde): bkur bsti yod pa yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la rim gro yod cing bkur bsti yod pa yin te/ rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi des lus dang srog la mi lta bar
283a7(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing 'chang ngo klog go// kun chub par byed do// gzhan la yang rgya cher ston to// de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson pas/ 'di lta ste lus dang ngag
283a8(mdo sde): dang sems kyi tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas 'gyod pa med pa yin te/ de yang rim gro med pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims yongs su dag
283b1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro// 'gyod pa med pas sgrib pa med pa yin/ sgrib pa med pas dga' ba mang ba yin/ dga' ba mang bas sgom pa mang ba yin/ sgom pa mang bas sems mnyam par bzhag
283b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// sems mnyam par bzhag pas 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/ 'gro ba yongs su dag pas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ rdzus te skyes pas rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa
283b3(mdo sde): yin no// rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa'i phyir tshe rabs dran pa yin te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran no// gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang bcu dang nyi shu dang sum cu dang bzhi bcu
283b4(mdo sde): dang lnga bcu nas tshe rabs brgya stong du ma'i bar du rjes su dran no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs dran pa rnams yin no// 
283b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dang/ 'a dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mthong ba
283b6(mdo sde): dang thos pa dang dran pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ chos mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ dge 'dun mchod cing bsnyen bkur dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas dang
283b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus par smra ba dang / phyag bya ba dang ldan pa dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang gdud pa'i las dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ mang du thos pa'i gang zag chos sku
283b8(mdo sde): ba rnams dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par thar
284a1(mdo sde): pa'i sgo gsum mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mnyan pa
284a2(mdo sde): dang ma bral ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu tshes bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan
284a3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pas sdig pa'i
284a4(mdo sde): grogs po yongs su spangs par rig par bya'o// lta ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / cho ga nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'tsho ba
284a5(mdo sde): nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'du rje/ la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / le lo can gyi gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'khor
284a6(mdo sde): ba la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / byang chub la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / khyim pa dang sten pa rnam par spangs pa dang / nyon mongs pa
284a7(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par spangs pas/ sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs par rigs par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ngas gnas 'di dag rnam par spangs pa'i tshe
284a8(mdo sde): gang zag de dag la zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o// khong khro ba'i sems dang / brnyas pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'i/ des 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sems can
284b1(mdo sde): rnams ni khams so sor sten te/ sten par gyur nas chung za bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal gyis/ de bas na bdag gis ston pa yongs su spang bar sems nye bar bzhag par bya'o// 
284b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
284b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chos nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe ni 'di lta ste/ lus mnyam pa rnams yin/ lus yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ lus rma med pa rnams yin/ 
284b4(mdo sde): lus legs par sgrub pa rnams yin/ chos kyi lus rnam sa yin/ lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ lus bsam gyis mi khyab
284b5(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ lus zhi ba rnams yin/ lus na mkha 'a dang mtshungs pa rnams yin/ ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag
284b6(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom
284b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang dang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sa dang / 
284b8(mdo sde): po la byang chub sems dpa' lus mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi mi mnyam pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mnyam pa nyid du
285a1(mdo sde): gyur pa'i phyir ro// sa gnyis pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ lus yongs su dag pa 'thob bo// sa gsum pa la byang chub
285a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' khro ba dang gnod sems thams cad bral ba'i phyir/ lus rma med pa 'thob bo// sa bzhi pa la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir/ lus legs
285a3(mdo sde): par grub pa 'thob bo// sa lnga pa la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ chos kyi lus 'thob bo// sa drug pa la brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag
285a4(mdo sde): dka' ba'i chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba 'thob bo// das bdun pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa dang
285a5(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa yang dag par grub pa'i phyir lus pas ma gyis mi khyab pa thob bo// sa brgyad pa la spros pa thams cad dang bral ba dang nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir/ 
285a6(mdo sde): lus zhi ba 'thob bo// sa dgu pa la lus tshad med pas khyab pa'i phyir lus na mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'thob bo// sa bcu pa la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi lus 'thob bo// 
285a7(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes par bya ba thams cad yang dag par grub pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyi
285a8(mdo sde): lags de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi chos nyis la tha dad du bgyi ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rigs
285b1(mdo sde): kyi bu lus tha dad pas tha dad du bya ba med de/ yon tan gyi mthus ni tha dad du bya ba yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan
285b2(mdo sde): 'das ji ltar lus tha dad pas tha dad du/ bgyi ba ma mchis la/ yon tan gyi mthus tha dad du bgyi ba ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
285b3(mdo sde): lus lus shes bya ba 'di ni tha dad pa med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus su brjod pa'i mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro// yon tan dang mthu'i mtshan nyid ni tha dad par blta'o// / 
285b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel dpas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang lta bur yon tan gyi mthu'i mtshan nyid tha dad du blta bar bgyi/ 
285b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bas na don 'di nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir khyed// la dpe bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ byi dor
285b6(mdo sde): ma byas pa'i nor bu rin po che dang / byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rinamacan 'di lta ste/ nor bu rin po che nor bu rin po che zhes bya bar nor bu rin po che'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ ji ltar byi dor
285b7(mdo sde): byas pa'i nor bu rin po che mthu dang yid du 'ong bas khyab par byed pa ltar ni/ byi dor ma byas pa ma yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che yang de bzhin gshegs/ 
285b8(mdo sde): pa'i sku nor bu rin po che dang bcas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
286a1(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che'i drung du yongs su dag pa zhes mi brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po cheni sems can gyi khams chad med/ 
286a2(mdo sde): pa dang / na mkha'i khams tshad med pa'i 'od kyis khyab par byas te gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni shin tu yongs su dag pa dang dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir te/ byang chub sems
286a3(mdo sde): dpa' lus nor bu rin po che ni/ de tsam du khyab par byed pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de ltar dri ma'i lhag ma las pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na tshes gnyis kyi
286a4(mdo sde): zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba nas/ zla ba nyi'i bar gyi zla dab yang zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ chos gnyi sa kyi zla ba ci 'dra ba de lta bur zla ba nya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
286a5(mdo sde): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bcas te lus kyi grangasu 'gro mod
286a6(mdo sde): kyi byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i drang na/ lam mer mi 'gyur/ lhan ner mi 'gyur/ lhang nger mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba nya ba'i drung na
286a7(mdo sde): tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyang lus su brjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid gcig mod kyi yon tan gyi mthu'i mtshan
286a8(mdo sde): nyid kyis ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje lta bur sra ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug
286b1(mdo sde): gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin// khro ba dang gnod sems kyi thab dri ma dang nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang lnga ba phyin ci log dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten gyi chos brkyang / 
286b2(mdo sde): po dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ sems can gyi sdug bsngal gyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ skye ba dang rga ba dang
286b3(mdo sde): na ba dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad dang bdud kyi ris su
286b4(mdo sde): gtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 'dod pa la spyod pa thams cad
286b5(mdo sde): kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu tshes bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus rje// rje ltar sra ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang
286b6(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bkur ba rnams yin/ mchod par 'os pa rnams yin/ phyin par byed pa rnams yin
286b7(mdo sde): brten par bya ba rnams yin/ nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba rnams yin// rgyags shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tshogs shin tu bsags pa rnams yin/ mi ngoms
286b8(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ thog mar 'gro ba rnams yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas par bya ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na
287a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba yin pa nas/ ji ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe
287a2(mdo sde): na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni rgyal po dang rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag gis bkur ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang sangs
287a3(mdo sde): rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams kyis bkur ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi
287a4(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa rnams yin no// de debazhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang slob pa dang mi slob pa dang / gzhan yang lha dang klu dang
287a5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag gis mchod par 'os pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper
287a6(mdo sde): na/ ded dpon chen po ni 'brog dgon par 'dron po mang po mtshan pas gtses pa dag legs par bde zhing yongs su mi skyo bar phyin par byed pa yi no// de bzhin du byang chub sems
287a7(mdo sde): dpa' ded dpon chen po yang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po'i nang na/ sems can 'dron pa mang po nyon mongs pa'i mtshan pas gtses pa legs par 'de zhing yongs su mi
287a8(mdo sde): skyo bar phyin par byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po la brten ni/ sdug bsngal ba dang / 'phongs pa dag 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
287b1(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po la brten na/ mu stegs can gzhan spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa rnams 'brog dgon pa chen po nas 'thung bar 'gyur ro// 
287b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni rgyal po dang las byed pa'i mi dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin no// de bzhin
287b3(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams nye bar 'tshe ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni nam
287b4(mdo sde): phyogs su 'gro bar chas te/ 'dron pa mang po dang ldan dacig tu grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'brog/ dgon par zhugs pa de'i tshe/ grong khyer chen por phyin gyi
287b5(mdo sde): bar du rgyags phun sum tshogs pas 'brog dgon pa de nas legs par bde zhing yongs su skyo ba med par 'byu nga bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded
287b6(mdo sde): dpon chen po yang / nam sangs rgyas kyis bsten pa'i phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod cing / sems can 'dron pa mang po de de/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen por 'jug par 'dod la
287b7(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya bar 'dod pa de'i tshe/ bsod nams kyi rgyags kyi tshogs shin tu phun sum tshogs par 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta
287b8(mdo sde): ste dper na/ dod dpon chen po ni 'chi ba'i yo byad 'di lta ste/ gser dang nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru la sogs pa mang po bsags
288a1(mdo sde): shing phyogs su 'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang nam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por mngon par zhug
288a2(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshogs shin tu bsags shing 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni nor bsags pas chog mi shes pa yin no// de bzhin
288a3(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang chos kyi nor bsags pas chog mi shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni 'di lta ste nor phun sum tshogs
288a4(mdo sde): pa dang / gtso bo dang / dbang yod pa dang / ngag mnyan dbas 'dron pa mang po thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin/ no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po
288a5(mdo sde): yang 'di lta ste/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ye/ ngas kyi gtso bo dang / chos la dbang ba dang / ma logapar smra bas sems can 'dron pa mang po thams cad kyi
288a6(mdo sde): thog mar 'gro ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
