314b7(mdo sde): kyang 'gag par 'gyur ro// mya ngan las 'das pa dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas
314b8(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar ci bdag
315a1(mdo sde): bram ze'i rigs sam/ 'on te rgyal rigs sam/ 'on te khyim bdag gi rigs sam/ ci mtho zhing phyug po 'am/ 'on te dma' zhing dbul ba'i rigs su skyes sam/ 
315a2(mdo sde): gang du skyes snyam yongs su rtog ste/ de gal te rigs mtho zhing phyug par skyes na yang / de rigs kyis dregs par mi byed do// 'on te dma' zhing dbul ba'i rigs su skyes par gyur na yang / 
315a3(mdo sde): bdag 'di lta bu'i rigs su skyes pa las/ bdag gis sngon las 'dren mar byas so zhes de snyam du sems skyed cing / de de'i rgyus skyo ba mang ba yin te/ skyo ba mang bar gyur nas rab tu
315a4(mdo sde): 'byung ngo // rab tu byung nas kyang bdag ci'i phyir rab tu byung zhes yongs su rtog ste/ bdag ni rang rgal nas/ gzhan dag kyang bsgral bar bya/ rang grol nas gzhan dag kyang
315a5(mdo sde): dgrol bar bya'o zhes nas rab tu byung ngo snyam nas/ da de'i phyir le lo la mi rten cing snyom las mi byed de// de bdag rab tu byung nas/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos gang
315a6(mdo sde): dang gang nub cing yongs su zad do// kun byang bar gyur ces yongs su rtog ste/ de sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos shig spangs par gyur na/ de la dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa skyed do// gang ma
315a7(mdo sde): spangs pa de dag ni spang ba'i phyir rtsol zhing 'bad do// de bdag rab tu byung nas dge ba'i chos gang dang gang 'phel ba dang rgyas pa dang / rgya cher gyur ces snyam du yongs su rtog ste/ de'i dge
315a8(mdo sde): ba'i chos gang dag 'phel ba dang rgyas pa dang rgya cher gyur pa de la dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa skyed do// gang de ltar ma gyur pa de dag 'phes pa dang rgyas pas/  rgya cher bya ba'i phyir rtsol zhing 'bad // 
315b1(mdo sde): de bla ma la rten na dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel bar 'gyur/ sdig pa rnams ni 'grib par 'gyur ro snyam yongs su rtog ste/ de rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi des mkhan po nyung du thos pa 'am/ mang du thos
315b2(mdo sde): pa 'am/ shes pa 'am mi shes pa 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims 'chal pa yang rung ste/ de la ston pa'i 'du shes skyed do// de ji ltar na ston pa la dga' zhing dad pa nye bar
315b3(mdo sde): gnas pa de bzhin du mkhan po la yang byed do// de slob dpon rnams la rim gro yod cing rjes yod pa yin te/ de 'di ltar slob dpon rnams la brten na/ bdag gi byang chub kyi phyogs
315b4(mdo sde): yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs par 'a/ gyur ro// nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa rnams ni spangs par 'gyur ro snyam du yongs su rtog ste/ de dag la mkhan
315b5(mdo sde): por 'du shes bskyed cing dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangasapa 'thob pa dang / dge ba'i chos rnams la de dag dang / 'thun par spyod pa yin/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams la mi
315b6(mdo sde): 'thun par spyod pa yin te/ de 'di snyam du bdag gi ston pa gang zhes yongs su rtog cing de 'di snyam du yongs su sems te/ bdag gi ston pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad
315b7(mdo sde): thugs su chud pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la thugs rtse ba/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas chen po ste/ lha dang mi dang lha yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi ston pa'o// 
315b8(mdo sde): snyam ste/ de rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi des dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa skyed do// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das de yin pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa
316a1(mdo sde): legs par rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das des bslab pa'i lam gang bcas pa de las kyang bdag gis srog gis phyir yang 'da' bar mi bya ste/ de ltar na
316a2(mdo sde): bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de la rim gro dang rjes su 'brang bar byas par 'gyur ro// de 'di snyam du bdag su'i bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod ces sems shing de 'di snyam du sems te/ 
316a3(mdo sde): bdag ni bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong ba dang yul gyi mi rnams kyi bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod kyis/ bdag gis ci nas kyang de dag gi bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod pa dang / don
316a4(mdo sde): che ba dang / mthu che ba dang / bdag gis kyang yul 'khor dgyi bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod par yongs su sprad pa de ltar bya'o snyam mo// de 'di snyam du bram ze dang / rgyal
316a5(mdo sde): rigs dang grong ba dang / yul gyi mi 'di dag 'du shes ci dang ldan zhing bdag la bsod snyoms ster snyam zhing / de 'di ltar rjes su sems te bram ze dang / rgyal
316a6(mdo sde): rigs dang grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi 'di dag ni bdag la dge sbyong gi 'du shes dang ldan/ dge slong gi 'du shes dang ldan/ sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes pa dang ldan zhing bdag
316a7(mdo sde): la bsod snyoms sbyin par byed kyis/ ci nas kyang bdag gis dge sbyong gi yon tan yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba dang / dge slong gi yon tan dang sbyin pa'i gnas kyi yon tan
316a8(mdo sde): rnams yang dag por blangs te gnas par bya ba de ltar spyad do snyam mo// de 'di snyam du bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i skye ba 'khor ba las rgal bar gyur tam zhes sems
316b1(mdo sde): shing de 'di snyam du bdag gis dge slong gi tshul thob pa 'di ni rgal ba dang po'o// bdag dge slong gi yon tan dang ldan pa 'di ni rgal ba gnyis pa'o// bdag le lo med cing chos nyid thob pa'i phyir
316b2(mdo sde): ci nas kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i skye ba'i 'khor ba las rgal bar 'gyur ba de ltar brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas par bya'o snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar yongs su rtogs pa'i
316b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ 
316b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten shes pa rnams yin no// / bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ khengs pa dag la dpa dab rnams yin/ nga rgyal can dag la nga rgyal med pa rnams
316b5(mdo sde): yin/ gya gyu can rnams la drang po rnams yin/ brdzun du/ smra ba dag la bden par smra ba rnams yin/ kha mi mkhas pa dag la snyan par smra ba rnams yin/ brtsub pa dag
316b6(mdo sde): la 'jam pa rnams yin/ khro ba dag la bzod pa mang ba rnams yin/ gtum pa dag la byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin/ sdug bsngal ba dag la snying rje ba'i bdag nyid can rnams
316b7(mdo sde): yin/ ser sna can dag la bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten shes pa rnams yin no// / 
316b8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye'o// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ skyon med pa dang / sra sre med pa'i tshul khrims
317a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pas tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad la sbyor ba mnyam pas/ sems snyoms pa rnams yin/ dge ba
317a2(mdo sde): rtsa ba mi chung bas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gos pa med pas rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang / grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa'i sems yongs su spangs pa rnams yin/ 
317a3(mdo sde): nem nur med pa'i sems dang ldan pas dad pa rnams yin/ sems le lo med pa dang ldan pas/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ sems mi g.yeng ba dang ldan pas bsam gtan phun
317a4(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rang de bzhin can ma yin pas mang du thos pa rnams yin/ shes rab rno bas dbang po mi rtul ba rnams yin/ gnod
317a5(mdo sde): sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pas byams pa'i bdaganyid can rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan
317a6(mdo sde): 'das ci chos de dag tshogs pas skye bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te la la ma tshang yang skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos tshogs pa de dag las gang gi
317a7(mdo sde): chos gcig cig skyon med cing ma 'dres la/ sra sre med de/ yongs su dag cing yongs su byang bar yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de la/ rigs kyi bu chos de dag thams cad yongs su
317a8(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir chos de dag tshogs pas skye'i/ ma tshogs pas ni ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
317b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye'o// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
317b2(mdo sde): gzugs byed pa dang / mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la spos kyi thug pa 'bul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag la khrus kyi spos
317b3(mdo sde): chu 'bul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la phyag dar dang skyang nul bya ba 'bul ba dang / pha ma dag la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon dag la lus
317b4(mdo sde): kyi rim gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa tshungs par spyod pa rnam des la lus kyi rim gro byed cing / de yang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis te/ zang zing dang bcas pas ma yin la/ dge
317b5(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'di ltar/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad/ mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye/ bar gyur cig ces yongs su sngo zhing / de yang bsam
317b6(mdo sde): ba thag pa nas sems pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
317b7(mdo sde): dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nye bar len pa med pa rnams yin/ 'du 'dzi med par spyod pa rnams yin/ yul la rgyab kyis
317b8(mdo sde): phyogs pa rnams yin/ yul la srid pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ yul gyis nyes pas mi gos pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims bcas pa la rim gro byed cing brtson pa
318a1(mdo sde): dang / shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin/ gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal chang ngan ngon dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ngan ngon dag gis chog shes pa rnams yin/ 
318a2(mdo sde): lhung bzed dang chos gos dang yo byad la sogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ rtag par 'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan zhing yul rnams las skyo ba rnams yin/ dben pa la dga' zhing rtag tu bsgom
318a3(mdo sde): ba la brtson pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas byung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang
318a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa rnams yin no//  / bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ gzhog slongs kyi
318a5(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'thob kyis 'jal ba'i rnyed/ pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ mi rigs par 'tshal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos ma yin pa'i rnyed
318a6(mdo sde): pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnyed pa la zhen pa med pa rnams yin/ rnyed pa la chags pa med pa rnams yin/ yongs su yi 'chang
318a7(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin med pa rnams yin/ chos kyi rnyed pas chog shes pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral
318a8(mdo sde): ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir/ lus kyi tshul 'chos pa mi byed/ ngag gi tshul 'chos pa mi byed/ sems kyi tshul 'chos pa
318b1(mdo sde): mi byed do// ji ltar na lus kyi tshul 'chos pa mi byed pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i bdag po mthong na/ spyod lam mi 'chos so// ji ltar na spyod lam mi 'chos
318b2(mdo sde): she na/  gnya' shing gang tsam lta ba dang / skyo bar lta ba dang / sgrib pa med par lta bas/ gom pa bags kyis ngal nas 'dor zhing / 'deg pa ma yin te/ de ltar na lus kyi tshul 'chos pa mi
318b3(mdo sde): byed do// ji ltar na ngag gi tshul 'chos pa mi byed ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir bcom sbyangs shing smra ba ma yin/ 'jam por smra ba ma yin/ dga' bar smra bar ma
318b4(mdo sde): yin rjes su 'brang ba'i tshig rjod pa ma yin te/ de ltar/ na ngag gi tshul 'chos pa mi byed do// ji ltar ni sem ngas kyi tshul 'chos pa med ca na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni
318b5(mdo sde): sbyin pa byed pa 'am/ sbyin pa'i bdag pos rnyed pas bsta/ bas na/ tshig gis 'dod pa chung bar ston cing sem sa kyis 'dod pa skyed pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta
318b6(mdo sde): ste/ tshig gis 'dod pa chung la/ sems kyis rnyed pa 'dod pa 'di ni nang gi gdung ba yin te/ de ltar na sems kyis tshul 'chos pa mi byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos
318b7(mdo sde): pa dang kha gsags gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na gzhog slongs kyi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa 'am/ sbyin bdag mthong na/ bdag
318b8(mdo sde): gos kyis phongs so// bdag lhung bzed kyis phongs so// bdag na ba'i gsos sman gyis phongs so zhes gzhog slongs mi byed cing / sbyin pa byed pa 'am/ sbyin pa'i bdag po la mi spong
319a1(mdo sde): dang tshig tu mi brjod de/ de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhog slong gi rnyed pa dang bral bayin no// ji lta ldan thob kyis 'jal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhen/ 
319a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa dang sbyin bdag mthong na/ bdag sbyin pa'i bdag po che ge mo zhig gis dngos po che ge mo zhig byin te/ de la bdag gis kyang phan pa che ge mo zhig byas so
319a3(mdo sde): zhes des kyang bdag la tshul khrims dang ldan par rigs ste/ mang du thos pa'o// 'dod pa chung ba zhes 'di dang 'di byin no// bdag gis kyang de la snying rje ba'i sems nye bar bzhag ste/ blangs so
319a4(mdo sde): zhes de skad kyi tshig mi brjod do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thob kyis 'jal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rigs par 'tshal
319a5(mdo sde): ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub seM/ sa dpa' ni lus la rba thung ba dang / sems la ma / bar rnyed par tshol ba ma yin no// de la lus kyi mam
319a6(mdo sde): sna steng rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed par phyir drug pa dang kun tu rgyug pa dang 'chal ba'i tshul khrims la spyad pa'o// sems kyi rma ni 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa la smon pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan
319a7(mdo sde): gyis rnyed pa dag la gnod sems mang ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rigs par 'tshal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin par
319a8(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' srang la sgyu med pa dang gcal ba la sgyu med pa dang / yid brtan pa la gnod par byed pa med pa dang g.yos
319b1(mdo sde): rnye pa mi sgrub pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhen
319b2(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang mchod rten gyi dang 'dres pa 'am/ chos kyi dang 'dres pa 'am/ dge 'dun gyi dang 'dres pa 'am/ ma byin par ma gnang ba de dag mi len cing bdag gir
319b3(mdo sde): mi byed/ chags pa'i sems mi skyed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa la zhen pa med pa yin/ 
319b4(mdo sde): zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa rnyed kyang / bdag gir mi byed/ nor du mi rtsi tshogs su mi byed cing / dus dus su dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / pha ma dang
319b5(mdo sde): mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / gnyen pa shes dang / snag gis gnyen mtshams dag la gtong zhing dus dus su bdag kyang yongs su spyod la/ yongs su spyod pa'i tshe
319b6(mdo sde): chags pa med pa dang / zhen pa med par yongs su spyod do// rnyed pa ma rnyed na yang skyo ba'i sems mi skyed cing yongs su yi mi 'chad de/ sbyin pa byed pa dang / sbyin bdag rnams la ma dang
319b7(mdo sde): par mi 'dzin pa yin te/ de chos dang 'thun par rnyed pa/ dge 'dun gyir gtogs pa de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa/ byang chub sems dpas ma smad pa lhas bstod pa tshangs
319b8(mdo sde): pa mtshungs par spyod pas mi dbye bas chog shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
320a1(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' yid yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi rgyu sems can gyi phyir 'khor ba na gnas
320a2(mdo sde): pas yongs su mi skye'o// sems can gyi rgyu sems can gyi phyir 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis yongs su mi skyo'o// sems can gyi don rnams la yongs su mi skyo'o// sems can gyi dgos pa
320a3(mdo sde): rnams la yongs su mi skyo'o// sems can gyi bya ba rnams la yongs su mi skye'o// gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa rnams la lam ston pas yongs su mi skyo'o// de dag dad pa mi byed do// byang chub
320a4(mdo sde): kyi phyogs kyi chos yongs su bsdu bas kyang yongs su mi skyo'o// / byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya bas kyang yongs su mi skye'o// bsam pa mya ngan las 'das par
320a5(mdo sde): gyur kyang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du mi lta yi byad chub la gzhol/ byang chub la 'bab byang chub la bab ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ 
320a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yid yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa rnams yin/ 
320a7(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bag med pa thams cad dang bral zhing bag yod par spyod pa rnams yin/ lus kyis shin tu bsdams shing lus kyi ngan du spyad pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/ ngag gis
320a8(mdo sde): shin tu bsdams shing / ngag gi ngan du spyad pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/ yid kyis shin tu bsdams shing yid kyi ngan du spyad pa mi spyod pa rnams yin no// 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs
320b1(mdo sde): shing mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin/ rigs par smra zhing mi rigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos su smra zhing chos ma yin pa la smong ba rnams yin/ smang ba'i
320b2(mdo sde): las rnam par spangs shing dge ba'i las kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la sun mi 'byin cing / nyon mongs pa dri nga dang bral ba rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs
320b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos nyid yongs su mi spong zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la srung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa
320b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi dbu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhi na 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin// bcu gang zhe na 'di
320b5(mdo sde): lta ste/ dbang po shin tu dang ba rnams yin/ dbang po yod sa su dag pa rnams yin/ dbang po gsal ba rnams yin/ dbang po dri ma med pa rnams yin/ dbang po yongs
320b6(mdo sde): su byang ba rnams yin/ gnod sems dang bral ba rnams yin/ bag la nyal ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ thab dang mdud par 'dzin pa dang bral
320b7(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ khong khro ba dang bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin no// byang chub
320b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don ji lta bu lags pa bdag gis 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang
321a1(mdo sde): po 'angs su dag pas na/ bzhin 'dzum pa lags/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bas na// khrog ma mangs pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ 
321a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang po yongs su dag pas na/ bzhin 'dzum pa yin/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bas na/ khro gnyer med pa yin/ 
321a3(mdo sde): no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba ni 'dod chags kyi mes rab tu 'bar ba'o zhes yang dag
321a4(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// zhe sdang gi mes rab tu 'bar ba'o// zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti mug gi mes rab tu dkrugs pa'o zhes
321a5(mdo sde): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dus byas ni mi rtag pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal ba'o zhes yang
321a6(mdo sde): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'jig rten ni stong pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
321a7(mdo sde): du rab tu shes so// 'jig rten ni spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad ni rkyen las byung ba'o// zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
321a8(mdo sde): du rab tu shes so// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de yang thos pa dang bsam pa dang / bsgom pas shes kyi/ sgrar brjod pa tsam gyis ni ma
321b1(mdo sde): yin te/ de ltar shes nas kyang / snying rje ba'i sems brtan pa nye bar bzhag ste/ sems can rnams kyi don du rtsol zhing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom mo// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan
321b2(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di
321b3(mdo sde): lta ste/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig ci bsten pa 'khrug par gyur pa dang / sems can rnams lam ngan par zhugs pa dang / ye shes kyi
321b4(mdo sde): sgron ma mya ngan las 'das ste/ ston pa med pa'i tshe/ mdo sde rgya chen po rgya chen po don tshe zhing mthu che ba/ dam pa'i da chos thams cad kyi ma mo dang 'dra ba dag 'dzin cing klog la/ 
321b5(mdo sde): kha thon byed cing kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan la yang rjod cing sten la yang dag par ston cing / gsal bar byed pa dang / de la zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams la dga' ba
321b6(mdo sde): dang dad pa dang rangs par byed cing / de dag la phan 'dogs pa dang / zang zing med pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston par 'du shes
321b7(mdo sde): skyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos la bdud rtsir 'du shes skyed pa dang / bcud kyis len tu 'du shes skyed pa dang / rtsi'i 'du shes skyed pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs
321b8(mdo sde): su tshol ba dang / brtsal nas kyang nan tan gyis sgrub pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin no// 
322a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams yin no// bcug she na/ 'di lta ste/ lus mtshan gyis rgyan gyis brgya
322a2(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ lus dpe byad bzang po'i me tog rgyas pa rnams yin/ dbang po rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan zhing shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs
322a3(mdo sde): pas bstan pa'i gnas la rjes su rten pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhud pa'i lam rjes su thob par byed pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud
322a4(mdo sde): pa'i chos rnams khong du chud par byed pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten sdug bsngal ba yongs su skyong ba rnams/  yin/ 'phags pa'i tshul la shin tu bslabs pa rnams
322a5(mdo sde): yin tshangs pa'i gnas rnams la shin tu mthar phyinapa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa/ 'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang na gnas pa rnams
322a6(mdo sde): yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po'i sras yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin dang / 
322a7(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong bas bsu ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad kyis mi sprul pa rnams yin
322a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi tshul la zhugs pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin
322b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis chos la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin/ shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin
322b2(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/ mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
322b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bas bsu ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba shes
322b4(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can// 'dod chags kyi bsam pa can yang dag pa ji lta da ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang gi bsam pa can dang / 
322b5(mdo sde): gti mug gi bsam pa can dang / dam pa'i bsam pa can dang / ba ra ma'i bsam pa can dang / zhan ba'i bsam pa can dang / dge ba'i bsam pa can dang
322b6(mdo sde): brtan pa'i bsam pa can dang / yun ring po'i bsam pa can dang / sems gtum pa'i bsam pa can yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing / de yang sems can gcig
322b7(mdo sde): la ji ltar shes pa bzhin du sems can gyi khams kun la yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
322b8(mdo sde): bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams yin no// 
323a1(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'
323a2(mdo sde): gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs/ rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nyan thos
323a3(mdo sde): kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ nyan thos kyi gzugs/ brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ brgya byin gyi gzugs/ bdud kyi gzugs kyis 'dul
323a4(mdo sde): ba'i sems can rnams la/ bdud kyi gzugs/ tshangs pa'igazugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ tshangs pa'i gzugs/ bram ze'i gzugs kyis 'dul
323a5(mdo sde): ba'i sems can rnams la/ bram ze'i gzugs/ rgyal rigs kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnamasal/ rgyal rigs kyi gzugs/ khyim bdag gi gzugs
323a6(mdo sde): kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ khyim bdag gi gzugs nye bar ston to// rigs kyi bu de ltar rnam pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dang de
323a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams nye bar ston to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams yin no// 
323a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nges pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ drang ba rnams yin/ 'jam pa rnams yin/ gya gyu med pa'i sems dang / 
323b1(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ mi brlang
323b2(mdo sde): ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ rtsub pa spangs pa rnams yin/ bzod pa mang ba rnams yin// des pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu ches bcu po de dag dang ldan na// 
323b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nges pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lta ba yongs su dag pas
323b4(mdo sde): lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims phun sum tshe gus pa rnams yin/ cho ga yongs su dag pa rnams yi na/ tshul dang cha 'thun pa'i spyod yul du spyod pa rnams yin/ 
323b5(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs pa med par spyod pa rnams yin/ khong yangs pa rnams yin/ tshangs pa tshungs par spyod pa la/ rjed/ ba rnams yin/ skal ba mnyam pa rnams yin/ lam
323b6(mdo sde): gcig tu zhugs pa rnams yin/ ston pa gzhan med pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
323b7(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ phan pa'i sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud do// bde ba'i sbyin pa dang mi zad
323b8(mdo sde): pa'i sbyin pa dang / phan par smra ba dang / don du smra ba dang / chos su smra ba dang / rigs par smra ba dang / don du bya ba dang / zang zing gis don 'thun pa dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis don 'thun pas
324a1(mdo sde): sems can rnams sdud do// rigs kyi bu phan pa'i sbyin pa ni gang chos kyi sbyin pa'o// bde ba'i sbyin pa ni gang zang zing gi sbyin pa'o// mi zad pa'i sbyin pa ni gang lam gyi
324a2(mdo sde): lus sbyin pa'o// phan par smra ba ni gang dge ba'i rtsa ba bstabs pa'o// don du smra ba ni gang yang dag pa'i bstan pa'o// chos su smra ba ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang 'thun par bstan
324a3(mdo sde): pa'o// rigs par smra ba ni gang don yang dag par chud mi gson pa'o// don bya ba ni gang mi dge ba'i gnas nas bslang ste/ dge ba'i gnas su 'jog pa'o// zang zing gis don 'thun pa ni gang bza'
324a4(mdo sde): ba dang bca' ba dang bldag pa dang / btung ba dang bzhib pa dang / gos la sogs thun mong du yongs su spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis don 'thun pa ni gang gser dang
324a5(mdo sde): nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang rta dang glang po che dang / shing rta dang bzhon pa thun mong du spyod pa
324a6(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
324a7(mdo sde): tshul shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ spyod lam rab tu zhi ba rnams yin/ spyod lam sgra med pa rnams yin/ spod lam yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ blta na dga' ba
324a8(mdo sde): rnams yin/ blta na 'jam pa rnams yin/ blta bas tshig mi shes pa rnams yin/ blta ni yid du 'ong ba rnams yin/ blta na sems can thams cad khong khro ba med par 'gyur
324b1(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ blta na sems can thams cad sems tshims par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ blta na sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de/ 
324b2(mdo sde): dag dang ldan/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul shis pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas bca' ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems
324b3(mdo sde): can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa dag las yongs su srung ba yin/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas 'don pa rnams yin/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba rnams yin/ 
324b4(mdo sde): mgon med pa rnams la gnyen du gyur pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa rnams la sman par gyur pa rnams yin/ rten med pa dag la rten pa rnams
324b5(mdo sde): yin/ gnas med pa dag la gnas rnams yin/ skyabs med pa dag la skyabs rnams yin/ gling med pa dag la gling rnams yin/ dpung nyen med pa dag la dpung snyan
324b6(mdo sde): rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas bca' ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsi'i rgyal
324b7(mdo sde): po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po blta na bzang zhes bya ba de ni rtsa bas kyang sems can nad pa rnams nye
324b8(mdo sde): bar 'tsho'o// sdong po dang / ya ga rnams dang lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / mthong ba dang / bsnams pa dang / myangs pa dang / rig pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba
325a1(mdo sde): yin te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs nyid kyi dang 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams
325a2(mdo sde): sbyin pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / yon tan gyi ro myangs dang / bsnyen bkur bya/ 
325a3(mdo sde): bos kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ 
325a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnam das yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog gsum la ci nus su bya ba byed pa dang / sems can nad pa
325a5(mdo sde): rnams la rtsi sbyor ba dang / sems can bkres pa dang / skom pas nyen pa rnams la zas dang / skom gyi sbyin pa dang / rlung dang / lhags pa dang / nyi mas nyen pa'i sems can
325a6(mdo sde): rnams la dgab pa sbyin pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon rnams la gus par rim gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams gus par smra phyag 'tshal/ ldang thal mo sbyor zhing
325a7(mdo sde): 'dud par byed pa dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang / bskyed mos tshal bya ba dang / dus dus su nor dang / 'bru dang mdzod dang / bang ba gtong ba dang / bran po dang bran mo
325a8(mdo sde): dang las mi dang zho shas 'tsho ba la bgo ba shas yongs su skyong ba dang / dus dus su tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu/ 
325b1(mdo sde): po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu
325b2(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yongs su 'dri'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang
325b3(mdo sde): mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos nyan to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin
325b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byed do// / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su
325b5(mdo sde): rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rnams la rim gro
325b6(mdo sde): byed/ bkur bsti byed/ sti stang byed/ mchod pa byed pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba ston to// 
325b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi
325b8(mdo sde): zhing du mar yang chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo // sangs rgyas
326a1(mdo sde): kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang sems can 'dul ba ji snyed kyi sprul pa 'gyed kyang / de dag sprul pa 'gyed pa'i tshe/ rtog pa med
326a2(mdo sde): cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang lta bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa 'gyed
326a3(mdo sde): na/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir/ dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba ni gling bzhi snang bar
326a4(mdo sde): byed cing / sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yin kyang // nyi ma dang zla ba ni bdag cag gis snang bar byed do// / bdag ni sems can la phan 'dogs pa'o zhes mi rtog
326a5(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon gyi las rnam par smin pa'i mngon par 'du byed pas/ zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis kyi bya ba de lta bu 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin du
326a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang sprul pa 'gyed na/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ bsgrim pa dang mngon par 'du bya ba mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas/ 
326a7(mdo sde): mngon par 'du bya ba rnams mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir te/ sngon byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de ci nas kyang rnam par rtog pa med par yang
326a8(mdo sde): sprul pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar smon lam btab/ de lta de ltar mngon par 'du byas pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
326b1(mdo sde): sprul pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams
326b2(mdo sde): yin no/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa shin tu grub pas sbyin pa shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims shin tu grub cing tshul khrims kyi phung po skyon med pa dang ma
326b3(mdo sde): 'dres pa dang / sra sre med pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa dang / yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba dang ldan pas/ tshul khrims shin tu phun sum
326b4(mdo sde): tshogs pa rnams yin/ bzod pa shin tu phun sum chog/ das pa rnams dang / brtson 'grus shin tu phun sum/ tshogs pa rnams dang / bsam gtan shin tu phun sum
326b5(mdo sde): tshogs pa rnams dang / shes rab shin tu phun sum tshogs marnam pa dang / thabs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / smon lam shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / 
326b6(mdo sde): stobs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / ye shes shin tu grub cing thun mong ma yin pa'i ye shes nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa/ sa dang po la gnas
326b7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yan chad/ sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes las 'das pa dang ldan pas/ ye shes shin tu rdzogs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos/ 
326b8(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs
327a1(mdo sde): 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu 'gul te/ rab tu g.yos par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen
327a2(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab dag gam/ ri btang zung ngam/ ri btang zung chen po dag gam/ khor yug gi ri 'am/ khor yug gi ri chen po dag gam/ de ma yin pa
327a3(mdo sde): rin po che'i ri dang / ri nag po de dag thams cad kyang / yul ga ya ga la ba dang / ga ya mgo'i ri ga la ba de logs su/ bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir 'dud par gyur to// 
327a4(mdo sde): gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na me tog gi shing ngam/ 'bras bu'i shing ngam/ de spos kyi shing ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom
327a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir ga ya mgo 'i ri ga la ba de logs su 'dud par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa
327a6(mdo sde): 'bul ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang na bza' dang / rgyan gyi bye brag sna tshogs kyi phung po ri rab tsam byas pa gyur to// brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
327a7(mdo sde): brgya stong du ma yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyar ba byas te/ 'dud cing bcom ldan 'das la me tog man da' ra ba/ man da' ra ba chen po dag 'thor bar gyur to// lha'i bu
327a8(mdo sde): brgya stong du ma yang na mkha'i dkyil na gnas te/ gos g.yob cing ca co dang gzha brgya stong byed par gyur te/ lha'i me tog gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor bar gyur pa kye ma'o/ 
327b1(mdo sde): deng ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas gnyis skyes par gyur to// kye ma'o chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor to// sems can gang gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 'gyur ba de dag kyang bsod
327b2(mdo sde): nams dang ldan zhing / dge ba'i las byed pa ste/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pa yin no// gang 'di la dad pa rnyed pa de dag lta smos kyang ci dgos shes
327b3(mdo sde): de skad du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// lto 'phye chen po brgya stong du ma yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la/ chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir/ 'brug ltar sgra 'ur 'ur 'byin/ sgrog par byed/ 
327b4(mdo sde): shin tu sgrog par byed cing / spos kyi sprin sna tshogs mdo/ ngan par sprul te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / ga ya mgo'i ri la spos chu'i char mngon par
327b5(mdo sde): 'bebs kyang / sems can rnams la gnod par mi snang ngo // lha'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar glu'i nga ro sgra 'byin par gyur to// dri za 'am/ 
327b6(mdo sde): mi 'am ci brgya stong du ma yang snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis glu len cing / ga ya mgo'i ri dang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la skor bar byed par gyur to// gnod sbyin bye/ 
327b7(mdo sde): ba brgya stong du ma yang pad+ma'i char mngon par 'bebs par gyur to// bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi brgya stong du ma yang me tog dang / bdug spos dang / 
327b8(mdo sde): spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi
328a1(mdo sde): zhing du ma dag nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos dgab pa bya ba'i phyir/ so so'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dag nas/ 'od zer mang po bkye bar gyur
328a2(mdo sde): to// 'od zer de dag kyang kha dog sna tshogs gzugs sna tshogs snang bar sna tshogs can sha stag ste de 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang
328a3(mdo sde): dngul gyi kha dog ste/ de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la skor bar byed cing / mun pa thams cad rnam par sel bar gyur te/ 'khor nas ga ya mgo'i ri la
328a4(mdo sde): bskor ba byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yang bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// rlung yang bde bar langs par gyur to// chos kyi rnam
328a5(mdo sde): grangs 'di bshad pa dang / mchod pa mngon par 'du bya ba 'di byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
328a6(mdo sde): bo/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang chos rnams la rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba chos kyi mig rnam par dag go// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kyang sngan chad ma
328a7(mdo sde): bskyed pa las byang chub du sems bskyed to// de nas yang ga ya mgo'i ri la gnas pa'i lha mo mi 'chi ba zhes bya ba dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas te/ 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'dus
328a8(mdo sde): shing / 'dug 'dug pa las/ de stan las langs nas bdag gi gnas su song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa blangs nas/ phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das
328b1(mdo sde): la bkur bstir byas/ btsun par byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas/ sti stang byas/ rim gror byas so// bkur sti dang btsun pa dang / ri mo dang / mchod pa dang / sti stang dang / rim gror byas nas/ bcom ldan
328b2(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs gzhan de dang de dag la ga ya mgo' ri 'di nyid du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ sangs rgyas stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis den 'di nyid
328b3(mdo sde): dag dang tshul 'di nyid dag dang / tshig dang yi ge 'di nyid dag gis bstan pa bdag gis mngon par dran no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi 'chi ba de ltar khyod kyis dkon mchog
328b4(mdo sde): 'byung ba de lta bu thos par gyur pa ni khyod kyis thob par bya/ ba legs par thob bo// de nas 'khor der tshogs pa'i nang na/ lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur to// lha mo
328b5(mdo sde): 'dis de srid cig nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos la/ de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la bsnyen bkur/ byas kyang 'dis bud med kyi lus las ma bsgyur snyam pa dang / 
328b6(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das
328b7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar lha mo mi 'chi ba 'dis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba thob la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed du mang ba zhig bsnyen bkur
328b8(mdo sde): bgyis na/ bud med kyi lus ma bsgyur ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la sems can gyi don ni rgyu'o// sems can gyi don ni
329a1(mdo sde): rkyen no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu lha mo mi 'chi ba ni/ rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba ste/ rigs kyi bu lha mo ma
329a2(mdo sde): 'chi bas gang yang dag par len tu btsud pa dang gzeng bstod pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas ni bgrang ba las 'das pa zhig ngas mngon
329a3(mdo sde): ba ra shes te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na lha mo mi 'chi ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba ste/ rigs kyi bu lha mo mi 'chi ba 'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ 
329a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas da kyang / mi 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
329a5(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur/ ra ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha mo mi 'chi ba la bka' stsal pa/ mi 'chi ba khyod kyis rang gi sangs
329a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing ston cing / de nas lha mo mi 'chi ba gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa gyur te/ lha mo mi 'chi ba gzugs thams
329a7(mdo sde): cad yongs su ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag mthil lta bur mnyam zhing / bai DUR+Ya'i gzhir snang
329a8(mdo sde): bar gyur te/ ri nag po med cing shing tha mal ba med la gnas gnas dag na yang dpag bsam kyi shing sha stag snang bar gyur to// gnas gnas dag na chu mig dang mtsha'u dang lteng ka dang
329b1(mdo sde): rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba dag snang bar gyur to// mi phal ba med par snang bar gyur to// de na bud med kyi sgra yang mi grag par gyur to// gnas dang gnas dag na pad+ma
329b2(mdo sde): shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam dag snang bar gyur to// pad+ma de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyil mo krung du 'khod pa sha stag snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
329b3(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'chi ba de yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par snang ste/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig
329b4(mdo sde): brgya stong du mas bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas mdun du bdar te/ 'di ltar chos nyid 'di kho na la brtsams nas chos ston par snang bar
329b5(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas lha mo mi 'chi ba yang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g.yas/ phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// / 
329b6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam
329b7(mdo sde): 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ glog gam/ kun chub par bgyid dam/ kha ton bgyid dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid na/ de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skye bar 'gyur
329b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sbyin pa
330a1(mdo sde): lhug par byin te/ de ltar sbyin pas bskal pa brgya stong mang por byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris/ legs
330a2(mdo sde): par zhus te/ sems dad pas sems dad pa la byin na/ de bas kyang 'di bsod nams mang du skyed do// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni phran tshegs ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa ni rdzu 'phrul che
330a3(mdo sde): ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i sems can rnams kyis/ zang zing ni rnam pa du mar myong gi/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi ro ni nam yang ma myong ste/ 'jig rten
330a4(mdo sde): ba ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod pa
330a5(mdo sde): bas gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan la yang rgya cher ston na/ de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang
330a6(mdo sde): du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams ni 'di las byung ngo // rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs
330a7(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu la bkod pa bas/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ 'dzin tam
330a8(mdo sde): 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan la yang rgya cher ston na/ de bas 'di bsod nams mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos nyid 'di la brten na/ nyan thos dang rang
330b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// chos nyid 'di la brten na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// chos nyid 'di la brten na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
330b2(mdo sde): te/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ba dang / klags pa dang / spel ba dang / kha ton byas pas/ mdo sde thams cad bzung ba dang / klags pa dang spel ba dang / kha ton byas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i
330b3(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos thams cad kyi ma mo ste/ rigs kyi bu chos nyid 'di ma thob par chos nyid rgya chen po thob par mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
330b4(mdo sde): 'dul ba'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gci dag tu bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas
330b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bar+N+Na da te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang / chos nyid 'di thos
330b6(mdo sde): pas skye ba'i 'khor ba chen po bas par bgyis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// de nas yang bcom ldan
330b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis 'khor mang po de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag sa phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa dang ston pa'i sa phyogs de byang chub kyi snying por gzung bar bya'o// ches
330b8(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gzung bar bya'o// mchod rten chen por gzung bar bya'o// bdag cag gi ston pa gnas 'di na bzhugs par gzung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
331a1(mdo sde): chos nyid ni byang chub bo// chos nyid 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'o// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku ste/ rigs kyi bu dag chos
331a2(mdo sde): mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod par 'gyur ro// sa phyogs gang na chos smra ba de gnas pa de la yang mchod rten du 'du shes skyed par bya ste/ chos smra ba de la yang bla mar 'du shes
331a3(mdo sde): bskyed par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed pa'o// lam ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// chos smra ba de mthong na dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa bskyed par bya'o// rim gro
331a4(mdo sde): byas te stan la bdar bar bya'o// chos smra ba de'i bsngags pa bskyed par bya'o// legs so zhes brjod pa mang bar bya'o// / rigs kyi bu dag ngas bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las
331a5(mdo sde): lhag par chos smra ba de'i bsngags pa brjod kyang / chos smrab de la cung zad kyang phan par byas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ bkur bstir bya
331a6(mdo sde): ba dang / btsun par bya ba dang / bsngags pa brjod pa ni gyi na chud zad du zad do// rigs kyi bu dag gal te chos 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis smra ba de 'ong ba'i
331a7(mdo sde): lam rang gi khrag gis chag chag byas kyang chos smra ba de la phan pa chung zad kyang byas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul bzung ba
331a8(mdo sde): 'di ni dka'o// rigs kyi bu dag chos smra ba des kyang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / yang dag par ston pa'i tshe/ 'jigs pa med par bya'o// ma zhum pa dang snga ma
331b1(mdo sde): gong ba dang / zhe ma 'gras pa'i sems dang gos gtsang ma bgos te dad pa bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis bsngags pa brjod kyang mi snyems pa dang / nga rgyal du mi bzung bar bya ste/ bdag mi stong gzhan
331b2(mdo sde): mi smod cing / des zang zing med pa'i sems kyis ri mor byas te/ chos bstan par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
331b3(mdo sde): 'das dog sa'i phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa 'am/ bstan par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang / chos smra ba de la sman par bgyi ba'i
331b4(mdo sde): slad du/ bdag cag dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas/ te mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dko'u shi ka legs so legs so// khyod kyis de ltar gyis
331b5(mdo sde): shig / ko'u shi ka khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid yongs su bsrung bar bya'o// de nas bcomaldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
331b6(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ming ci zhes bgyi/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i
331b7(mdo sde): phyir khyod kyis rnam grangs 'di dkon mchog sprin ces bya bar yang zung shig/ yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ ye shes sgron ma zhes bya bar yang zung
331b8(mdo sde): shig sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad
332a1(mdo sde): rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 
332a2(mdo sde): gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu la sogs pa/ lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag dang / de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phya
332a3(mdo sde): chen po brgyad stong dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog s+ho// // zhu chen
332a4(mdo sde): / gyi lo tsa ba ban de bai ro tsa na rak+Shi ta dang / d+harma tA shi'i las zhus te gtan la phab pa/ skad gsar bcas kyis kyang bcos lag so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dz+nyA na ka sU tra bud
332a5(mdo sde): d+ha a ba dA na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa/ shes ldan gyi mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis
332a6(mdo sde): thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das yum gyi don du lha rnams kyi gnas su sum cu rtsa gsum na/ shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung na/ la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs so// der lha'i bu
332a7(mdo sde): zhig la lnga ltas ngan pa lnga byung ste/ phreng rgyan rnyis pa dang / gos rnyings pa dang / lus dri nga bar gyur pa dang / mchan khung nas rdul 'dzag pa dang / rang gi stan la dga' ba med par gyur to// skye ba yang
332a8(mdo sde): mthong ste/ yangs pa'i phag gi mngal du skye ba mthong ngo // des de mthong nas mya ngan gyis thebs/ smre sngags 'don/ brang rdung zhing du la/ shin tu mong mong por gyur to// de nas lha'i bu gzhan zhig/ 
332b1(mdo sde): lha'i bu de ga la ba der song song ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu khyod 'chi bas 'jigs sam/ smras pa lha'i bu bdag 'chi bas 'jig so// lha'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag lha rnams kyi nang du sum cu rtsa
332b2(mdo sde): gsum 'dir lha'i bza' ba ni zos/ lha'i btung ba ni 'thungs/ lha'i bgo ba ni bgos na/ de nas phyir yangs pa'i phag gis mngal du skye ba mthong ste/ der bdag bshang ba za zhing mchi bar 'gyur te/ 
332b3(mdo sde): lha'i bu de lta bas na bdag 'chi bas 'jig so// smras pa lha'i bu khyod 'chi bas ma 'jig shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
332b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de/ yum gyi don du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas 'di na/ shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi drung na/ la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs ste/ ji ste lha'i
332b5(mdo sde): bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la phyag tshol dang / bcu/ ma ldan 'das de 'dir gshegs te/ des khyod ngan song rnams las grol bar mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu
332b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen pos sems can yongs su ma btang ba yin no// de nas lha'i bu de stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
332b7(mdo sde): lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas chad du brjod pa 'di lan gsum brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshalo// 
332b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshalo// bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de 'dir gshegs su gsol// bdag ngan song du skye ba rnams las grol
333a1(mdo sde): bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ lha'i bu de dag ga la ba der gshegs te/ gangan ba sham
333a2(mdo sde): pa de la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu khyod 'chi bas 'jigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
333a3(mdo sde): 'gum pas 'jigs lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yangs pa'i phag gi mngal mi sdug par skye ba mthong lags te/ der bdag skyes nas bshang ba la 'tshal zhing mtshon gyis 'gum par
333a4(mdo sde): 'gyur lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ bdag 'gum pas 'jigs lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
333a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu khyod 'chi bas ma 'jigs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams mi 'gro mi 'ong gi bdag nyid kyi las kyis 'ong zhing 'gro ste/ lha'i bu khyod tshur
333a6(mdo sde): shog/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song shig/ chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song shig/ de nas lha'i bu de stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
333a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo// bdag sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o// chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de la tshigs
333a8(mdo sde): su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig sangs rgyas la ni skyabs song ba// / de ni ngan 'gror 'dir ni mi 'gro ste// lha'i bdag nyid dngos po spangs nas su// mi'i bdag nyid
333b1(mdo sde): dngos po len par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga'i bu de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ sang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag
333b2(mdo sde): par dga' ba'i bar du mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te bzhud do// bcom ldan 'das bzhud nas ring po ma lon par/ lha'i bu de 'chi ba'i dus byas so// dus byas nas de ma thag tu sangs
333b3(mdo sde): ba der tshong dpon zhig gi chung ma dam pa'i mngal du skyes so// de zla ba dgu 'das nas khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po/ rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa
333b4(mdo sde): zhig btsas par gyur to// de btsas ma thag tu tshig 'di skad ces sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod
333b5(mdo sde): do/ de nas de'i pha dang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ khye'u 'di ni sangs rgyas shes/ chos shes dge 'dun shes te/ 'di ni shes pa dang ldan no snyam du 'du
333b6(mdo sde): shas skyes so// de nas khye'u shes ldan gang gi tshe/ lo brgyad lon palta bur gyur pa de'i tshe/ li tsa byi gzhon nu rab tu mang po rnams kyis lhan cig tu mdun du bdar nas skyed
333b7(mdo sde): mos tshal gyi gzhi mdo nas byung ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yangs pa'i tshal chen po na khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzangs na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus
333b8(mdo sde): kyi tshe/ smad g.yogs dang chos gos gsol lhung bzed bsnams te/ yangs par bsod snyoms la phyir gshegs so// bcom ldan 'das de mdzes pa nas/ 'od ldan pa'i
334a1(mdo sde): bar du gyur pa/ khye'u shes ldan gyis mthong ngo // mthong nas/ de bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dga' bar gyur to// sems dga' nas/ bcom ldan
334a2(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khye'u
334a3(mdo sde): shes ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// bdag gis sngon gyi tshe dran te// sdug bsngal rnams las rab bkrol zhing // ngan song ltung ba las ni bdag/ 'jig
334a4(mdo sde): rten mgon gyis gol bar mdzad// mi mchog thug ni brtse dgongs te// bsod snyoms 'di ni bzhes par mdzod// / bdag gi gdugs tshod 'di dag na// grol bar mdzad nas
334a5(mdo sde): deng bzhengs la// sang ni bdag gi pha ma yi// sdum par 'dren pas brtser dgongs te// dge slong kun dang thabs gcig tu// gdugs tshod dag ni gsol bar mdzod// bcom
334a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das cang mi gsungs par gyur pas// khye'u shes ldan gyis gsol ba gnang ngo // de nas khye'u shes ldan/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas/ pha ma ga
334a7(mdo sde): la ba der song ste/ pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms phul lags te/ sang yang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so// de nas khye'u
334a8(mdo sde): shes ldan gyi pha ma mgu zhing dga' la/ yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ de'i mtshan mo bza' ba dang bca' ba ro dang ldan pa zhim pa mang po mngon
334b1(mdo sde): bar bshams nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po thams cad phyag dar byas te/ dar gyi lnga ldi btags/ pog por nas spos kyis gdugs/ spos chus chag chag btag/ me tog gis
334b2(mdo sde): mdzes par bkram te/ de'i mtshan mo 'das nas dus la bab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod la bab ste/ gdugs chod
334b3(mdo sde): sbyar lags so zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i snga dro/ smad g.yogs dang / chos gos gsol/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis mdun du bdar cing
334b4(mdo sde): dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/ shes ldan gyi da pha ma'i khyim ga la der gshegs nas gdan bshams dpa de la bzhugs so// de nas khye'u shes ldan bcom ldan
334b5(mdo sde): 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang gdan la bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag gis bza' ba dang bca' ba ro dang ldan bzhim zhing mang ba dag legs par brims/ legs par
334b6(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol bar rigs nas/ so so so so la ras bcos bu zung dang so so la lham zung dag phul lo// bcom ldan 'das la chos gos sar pa
334b7(mdo sde): gsum dang / chags sar pa zung dag gsol to// gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor to// gang mngon par gtor ba de dag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan
334b8(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyi gtsug gi zad kar khang pa brtsegs pa bkram/ blta na sdug pa/ gru bzhi pa/ gnas bzhi dang ldan pa zhig 'dug par gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa
335a1(mdo sde): der de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung bcas te chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa des mthong ngo // de nas khye'u shes ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
335a2(mdo sde): gzugs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de 'dra ba mthong nas/ mgu zhing dga' ba nas/ yid bde ba skyes pa'i bya du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
335a3(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des na/ bdag da ltar gyi bcom ldan
335a4(mdo sde): 'das bzhin du/ sangs rgyas su gyur cing / chos ston pa yang gyur cig/ dge 'dun yongs su sbyong bar yang gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u shes
335a5(mdo sde): ldan gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud de/ 'dzum ba mdzad pa nas/ spyi gtsug gi nang du nub pa'i bar du mdzad pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong
335a6(mdo sde): steng don med pa mi mdzad do snyam pa'i bar du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ 'di lta shes
335a7(mdo sde): ldan gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pas na/ bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu dag tu log par ltung bar mi 'gyur la/ de nas de ma thag tu rnam par 'dren par nye bar skye 'gyur te/ 
335a8(mdo sde): mtshan ni mkhyen gtso rgyal po zhes bya sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyin rtogs pa brjod pas mkhas rnams yang dag 'ga' byed cing / mo mkhas pa/ 
335b1(mdo sde): mang gis thos nas dge ba mang po byed 'gyur te// rgya mtshom pas gtugs dpag med lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas pa/ rab tu dang bas yon rnams phul ba'i 'bras bu chung
335b2(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas khye'u shes ldan dang / dge slong de dag dang lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
335b3(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon 'du byed de/ 'phags pa sa sargyas kyi gas pa la san kya / sa/ la me yin pa 'ang
335b4(mdo sde): kar ming bya dang / sarba ldade ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba darnye pal 'jigs kyis bsgyur ci zhus te gtan la / rgyag skad du/ shA
335b5(mdo sde): na a bdun ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gyi sngo'i rdegs pa brjod pa/ dkan mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gling gzhi mnyan du yong ban ste/ de das bcom ldan 'das
335b6(mdo sde): rgyas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gal te ji ltar ngas ston pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la/ sbyin pa'i 'go ba sha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes bzhin du
335b7(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyis kyang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la/ sbyin pa'i bgo ba sha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes su zin na ni/ de stan kham gyi tha ma dang kham kyi 'jug
335b8(mdo sde): lus pa/ gang yin pa de las kyang / gal te yon gnas len po po rnyed na/ de la ma byin nam bgo bsha' ma byas kyi bar du za bar mi byed la/ de dag gi sems kyang ser sna skyes
336a1(mdo sde): pas kun nas bkris shing 'dug par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la/ sbyin pa'i bgo ba sha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa
336a2(mdo sde): yang shes bzhin du/ sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang mi shes la/ sbyin pa'i bgo ba sha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang mi shes pas ni/ de'i phyir de dag ni kun tu 'dzin
336a3(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyis ma byin pa 'am bgo bsha' ma byas par za bar byed la/ de dag gi sems kyang ser sna skyes pas kun tu dkris shing 'dag go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
336a4(mdo sde): stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad du gsungs nas/ gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// / bgo ba sha' dag gi rnam par smin// ji ltar don chen gyur
336a5(mdo sde): pa dengadrang srong che rnams gsungs pa bzhin// sems can rnams kyis shes na ni// ma byin par du mi za zhing // ser sna can du mi 'gyur la// de dag kun tu 'dzin pa'i
336a6(mdo sde): sems/ nams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur na// gang phyir byis pa gti mug gis// bsgribs pa rnams kyis ma shes pas// de phyir kun tu 'dzin sems kyis// rtag tu ma byin za bar byed// 
336a7(mdo sde): de dag ser sna skyes nas kyang // sems ni kun nas dkris shing 'dug/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo 'di bshad pa de'i tshe/ sa rnam pa drug du g.yos par gyur cing // bcom ldan
336a8(mdo sde): 'das nyid kyi sku las 'od zer rnams byung bar gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu mthong ba na ngo
336b1(mdo sde): mtshar skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rgyu ma mchis rkyen mchis par ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
336b2(mdo sde): rnams 'di lta bu'i rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul ston par mi mdzad na/ btsun pa 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul gyi rgyu gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag tshe
336b3(mdo sde): 'phrul 'di byung ba'i rgyu mnyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo// dge slong dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o// dge slong
336b4(mdo sde): dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal po'i pho brang a ri shwash+ma zhes bya ba/ 'byor pa/ rgyas pa bde ba 'o// legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ 'chur
336b5(mdo sde): dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bdun pa/ gru bzhi pa rnam par 'byes pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rta babs bsgreng ba
336b6(mdo sde): byung bar gyur te/ rgyal po'i pho brang der rgyal po dpal gyi sde zhes bya ba stobs kyis 'khor lo sgyur ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa lta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa
336b7(mdo sde): mchog dang ldan pa/ rang bzhin gyis skye ba dran pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag po byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to// rgyal po dpal
336b8(mdo sde): gyi sde'i mthus shing rnams rtag tu me tog dang / 'bras bur ldan zhing lha rnams dus dus su yang dag par 'bebs la/ lo tog shin tu phun sum tshogs par gyur to// sems can
337a1(mdo sde): rnams kyang nad med par gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyang phan pa dang byams pa'i sems kyis gnas so// rgyal po de'i btsun mo dam pa rgyal ba'i 'od ces
337a2(mdo sde): bya ba/  gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad tshang ba/ yul gyi bzang mo// rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang / sdug pa dang phangs
337a3(mdo sde): pa zhig byung bar gyur to// dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la dpya dang / sho gam dang / gru btsas med de/ zhing gi 'byor pa dang ldan pa/ skye bo rnams ni
337a4(mdo sde): ba khyim pa rnams dang ldan pa'i yul dang / grong khyer/ dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho// brang byung bgyur to// dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde byang chub
337a5(mdo sde): sems dpar gyur te/ thams cad ster ba/ thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba dang / gtang ba chen po la zhugs nas tha na rang gi sha yang
337a6(mdo sde): gtong ste/ des ma byin pa dang / yongs su ma btang ba ci yang med do// dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i rgyal po'i pho brang a ri shI'i shar phyogs kyi grong khyer gyi mthar sbyin gtong
337a7(mdo sde): gi gnas byas te/ sbyin pa ni gtong / bsod nams ni byed do// lho dang / nub dang / byang gi grong khyer gyi sgor sbyin pa ni gtong / bsod nams ni byed do// sum mdo dbus na yang sbyin/ 
337a8(mdo sde): ba ni gtong / bsod nams ni byed do// 'di ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / mar me dang / 'phreng ba dang / 
337b1(mdo sde): dang byug pa dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / rgyab rten dang / gnas dang / gzugs rnams dang / shing rta dang / glang po dang / rta dang rgyan rnams dang / gser gyi snod dngul gyi phye mas yongs
337b2(mdo sde): su gang ba rnams dang / dngul gyi snod gser gyi phye mas yongs su gang ba rnams dang / ba lang gser gyi rwa dang / dngul gyi rmig pa brtags pa/ khar ba'i bzho snod dang / ris zung gis bkab pa
337b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / gzhon nu ma rnams dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas/ sbyin pa ni gtong / bsod nams ni byed te/ dge slong dag ci tsam du rgyal po dpal gyi sdes ci tsam gyis 'dzam bu gling
337b4(mdo sde): ba'i mi thams cad phyug pa dang / nor mang ba dang / longasaspyod che bar gyur pa de tsam du sbyin pa rnams sbyin no// yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang a ris shwa'i grong khyer na bye ba phrag dgu
337b5(mdo sde): bcu rtsa drug gi mi rnams gnas te/ rgyal po dpal gyi sde/ de dag thams cad kyi sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong bar gyur/ to// gzhan yang 'di skyes pa dang / bud med rnams kyis
337b6(mdo sde): mthong ba na/ ngoms par mi 'gyur ba'i dga' ba thob bo// dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i blon po stong phrag bcu gnyis yod de/ blon po de rnams kyi mchog blo gros chen po zhes bya ba
337b7(mdo sde): mkhas pa gsal ba/ blo dang ldan pa/ thams cad la dbang byed pa/ rgyal po yongs su skyob par byed pa/ rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / phangs par gyur pa
337b8(mdo sde): zhig byung bar gyur to// des 'di'i gzugs dang kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs mthong ba na/ ngoms pa med de/ skad cig kyang 'di dang mi 'bral lo// dge slong dag rgyal po
338a1(mdo sde): dpal gyi sdes 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par sbyar te/ shes ldan dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams dge ba
338a2(mdo sde): bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la rten cig/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di rnams yang dag par zung shig ces dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par sbyor te/ dge slong dag rgyal po dang
338a3(mdo sde): gyi sde de lta bu'i gdams ngag rjes su ston par gyur to// 'di lta ste 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i dus su gang 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i mi gang la la dus byas te/ lus zhig nas de lha'i ris drug
338a4(mdo sde): tu skye bar gyur to// gang phal cher ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rigs su skyes so// yang de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba lha'i tshogs
338a5(mdo sde): kyis kun tu gang ngo // de nas der go skabs med par gyur du dang / blta na sdug gi/ phyi rol yongs su 'du dang / shing rta sna tshogs can dang / dga' ba'i tshal la sogs
338a6(mdo sde): pa'i skyed mos tshal rnams su gnas par gyur to// de nas sngon skyes pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i tshogs kyis yang dag pa'i 'byor pa de mthong ste/ rab tu dga' nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
338a7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka gang du ri'i rgyal po ri rab de nyid/ lha'i bu de dag gis gang ste/ lha'i tshogs ni 'phel bar gyur/ lha ma yin gyi tshogs ni 'grib par 'gyur ba'i ngo
338a8(mdo sde): mtshar 'di dag gzigs so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu rnams las thos nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad la blta bar bsams pa dang / ci tsam na ri'i rgyal por
338b1(mdo sde): rab lha'i tshogs rnams kyis kun nas gang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis sems can 'di snyed cig 'dir skyes par gyur snyam nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling
338b2(mdo sde): thams cad la blta bar brtsams pa dang / ci tsam na rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i mthu'i yin par mthong ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sems rab tu dga' bas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams
338b3(mdo sde): la smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed rnams nyon cig/ 'dzam bu gling dbang phyug rgyal po'o// dpal gyi sde zhes rnam grags pa// rtag tu chos la gzhol ba dang // rgyal po chen po chos la gnas// 
338b4(mdo sde): thog ma bar dang mthar dge zhing // sems can kun la phan bar dga'// gtso bo ma rnams dge ba la// rtag tu yang / dedag sbyor bar byed// rtag tu snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ 
338b5(mdo sde): phyi rol dngos po rab gtong zhing // de'i sha yang slong ba la/ rjes su brtse ba nyid kyis ster// nang ngam yang na phyi rol la / de ni yongs su 'dzin med par// rjes brtse nyid kyis
338b6(mdo sde): gtong byed cing // byang chub mthar dbyung ba la brtson// des ni rnam dag gser bzhin du// 'gro ba thams cad rab bsgrubs pas// rgyal po de yi mthu yis ni// thams cad mtho ris la
338b7(mdo sde): gzhol 'gyur// rgyal po blo gros che nga yi// mthu yis su yang dmyal ba dang // yi dgas dang ni dud 'gro yi// skye gnas rnams su skye mi 'gyur// de yi gzi brjid mthu yis ni/ 
338b8(mdo sde): thams cad snang bar 'gro ba dang // sbyin dang tshul khrims dga' 'gyur bar// dga' ba'i tshal na dga' bas rtse// dpal gyi sde la rjes bsten par// gus dang bcas par
339a1(mdo sde): gyur pa 'di// lha yi 'jig rten nyams dga' bar// de yang dga' ba rnam par snang // de nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha de rnams kyis tshig thos pa dang / yid
339a2(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / sems par gyur te/ dga' ba'i sems su gyur cing / 'di skad ces kyang smras so// gang rgyal po 'di yan lag dang nying lag kyang sbyin par gtong 'dod par rtsol ba ni ngo
339a3(mdo sde): mtshar che'o// 'on kyang 'di ltar yan lag dang nying lag ster ba 'di ni dka' ba ste/ bdag dang mnyam par phangs pa gzhan med pas/ de ci ltar na bdag nyid chen po 'di rang gi lus kyi
339a4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba la mi sems par yan lag tsung pagatsun pasapar gyur te/ 'di ni rjes su dpag par nus pa ma yi na no// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed rnams de
339a5(mdo sde): skad ma smra shig/ rgyal po 'di ni mthu che ste/ rdzu 'phrul che snying rje che bas tha na rang gi sha yang gtong ste/ 'di yongs su ma btang ba ci yang med do// ci tsam na dus gzhan
339a6(mdo sde): zhig gi tshe/ btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od stan chen po la nyal ba na/ tho rangs kyi dus su rmi lam bzhi rmis te/ dpal gyi bstan las bdag nyid phab nas slar yang bteg par mthong ba dang / ra
339a7(mdo sde): gi mig phyung ste/ slar yang skyes par mthong ba dang / bdag nyid kyi dpung pa g.yas pa 'di bcad des la ltung ba yang skyes par mthong ba dang / mi ma yin pa dngul gyi rngo gcag pa'i
339a8(mdo sde): mdog 'dri ba zhig gis rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i dpung pa g.yon pa med la phyung ste/ phrogs nas slar yang skye bar rmis so// gnyid sad pa dang / 'jigs par gyur/ spu zing zhes byed/ 
339b1(mdo sde): de nga 'am lha la sdug bsngal 'ba' shig 'byung bar mi 'gyur grang zhes bsams nas/ des rgyal po dpal gyi sde la smras so// de rmi ltas la byang ba yin pas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dis rmi lam ji
339b2(mdo sde): lta bu mthong ba las na/ ring po mi thogs par chung ma 'di nyid slong ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ smras pa/ ma 'jigs shig/ sgyu ma lta bu'i rmi lam sems pas ci zhig bya/ dpal gyi stan la
339b3(mdo sde): bdag nyid gnas par khyod kyis ma mthong ngam/ mig mi nyams par de bzhin du 'dug pa dang / bdag nyid kyi dpung pa g.yas pa de bzhin du yod pa dang / nga'i yang dpung pa g.yon pa gnas bzhin/ 
339b4(mdo sde): ba nyid ces des dbugs phyung ba dang / cang mi smra bar 'dug dgo// ci tsam ni mtshan mo gnyis pa la blon po'i mtsha dag blo gros chen po zhes bya ba'i rmi lam du rgyal po dpal gyi
339b5(mdo sde): sde'i rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i khang bzangs mod la zhig pa dang / rin po che rnams sha za mthong na 'jigs su rung ba rnams kyis phan tshun khyer ba dang / slar
339b6(mdo sde): yang khang bzangs so sor sbyar bar rmis so// sad pa dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / yi mug ste spu zing zhes byed pa dang / bsams pa sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa dang / 
339b7(mdo sde): lha dpal gyi sde'i sku lus slong bar mi 'gyur grang / lha yang thams cad stsol pa/ thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ chags pa med par gtong ste/ 'di lta ste dman pa dang / long ba dang
339b8(mdo sde): bkres pa dang / sdug phongs pa rnams la 'di yongs su mi gtong ba ci yang med do// rgyal po dpal gyi sde la ni zhu bar mi bya ste/ shin tu spro ba skye bar mi 'gyur grang / de nas des
340a1(mdo sde): gsang ste mtshan mkhan thos nas/ dam pasgo ste zhes smras pa/ shes ldan ngas 'dis bu'i rmil ma rmis pa'i 'bras bu jilta bur 'gyur ba khyod kyis lung
340a2(mdo sde): sngon cig mtshan mkhan gyis smras pa/ rmi lam ci 'dra ba 'di las ring po mi thogs par lha'i skulas slong ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rmi lam bstan pa 'di lta bu de thos pa dang / blon po chen
340a3(mdo sde): blo gros chen po sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs shing / mig mchi mas gang ba dang / lag pa 'gram pa la gtad te/ sems khongs su chud pas gnas nas/ dpal gyi sde byams pa dang / snying
340a4(mdo sde): rje'i bdag nyid can sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa/ yon tan du ma dang ldan pa la/ mi rtag pa'i stobs te/ de bar gnas pa ni hacang myur ches so// de nas nub gsum
340a5(mdo sde): pa la blon po stong phrag bcu gnyis la rmi lam rmis te/ khri yis rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i gdugs dang cod pan phrog/ sa te/ slar yang byin pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyi mgo
340a6(mdo sde): bcad nas slar yang byung ba dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyi mig phyung nas slar yang skyes pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyi rkang pa dang lag pa rnams bcad
340a7(mdo sde): nas slar yang skyes pa dang / rgyal po dpal gyi sde seng ge'i khri las babs nas slar yang 'dzeg par rtsom par rmis pa dang / 'jigs shing skrag la yi mug nas/ rgyal po dpal gyi sdes
340a8(mdo sde): chen po skyong bar mdzad pa/ byams pa'i bdag nyid can snying rje che ba/ sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa la mi rtag pa'i stobs nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur grang
340b1(mdo sde): bdag cag rnams lha dang lhan cig gnas pa las tha dad par gyur pa dang / so so ba dang / bral ba dang / bye bar mi 'gyur grang 'jam bu'i gling ba'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen med par mi 'gyur grang
340b2(mdo sde): de rnams kyis mtshan mkhan rnams bos nas smras pa dang / de rnams kyis ci tsam na thams cad 'di bzhin du 'gyur zhes lung bstan to// 'di lta bu'i rmi lam bstan pa thos pa dang / grong khyer/ 
340b3(mdo sde): a ris shA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams nyams thag pa'i nga ros ngu bar brtsams so// thos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas/ 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi thams cad mya ngan drag po'i sdug bsngal
